name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Anime Songs Collection
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

The Anime Songs Collection contains 9 songs: "Aozora No RHAPSODY", "Monster", "I'm invincible", "GO!!!", "God knows...", "New Genesis", "Dai Zero Kan", "Chu, Tayousei" and "RPG".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tanasurga
summary: Tanasurga is an Narrative driven RPG where you play as mecha mercenaries in alternate WW2 setting. Build your own mecha, recruit and lead a team of pilots with different characteristics and skills. Gain riches and determine how the war unfolds between 3 main factions.

name: Tales of Aravorn: An Elven Marriage
summary: In the first spin-off of the VN/RPG Loren The Amazon princess, play as Elenor or Saren again and travel to Triberg to make sure that the arranged elven marriage between Lydia and Marian goes smoothly. Be careful: the demons are planning something...

name: Tails of Iron & Tails of Iron 2: Standard Bundle
summary: The Rats exact revenge against the Frogs & Dark Wings with this ‘Tails’ bundle.

name: Tattoo Shop Simulator
summary: Run your dream tattoo shop! Provide tattoo and piercing services, customize your shop, and manage staff. Unlock new skills and roam the living city freely on your motorcycle. Buy real estate, fight off thugs, and grow from a small shop into the city's biggest brand!

name: Tales Beyond The Tomb: Route 86
summary: A psychological horror anthology inspired by real-life cases. In Route 86, a group of friends ends up in a remote nightmare. Explore, hide, and survive in this first-person experience with multiple playable characters and rising tension.

name: TankTrouble Classic
summary:
TankTrouble Classic is the iconic arcade-style tank game, where you drive in a maze and shoot a variety of wall-bouncing projectiles at your enemites.

In singleplayer mode, TankTrouble Classic pits you against Laika, a fierce cyborg dog that's sure to challenge your skills.
You can also challenge a friend or two in local multiplayer warfare!

name: Tales From The Dragon Mountain: The Strix
summary:
Mina Lockheart's dreams became unbearable nightmares. She dreamt about her grandmother Kate and their old family house being eaten by flames. One day, Mina decided to travel back to their family estate to make peace with her own memories and feelings of loss and loneliness.

But after she arrived, not even in her wildest dreams she could imagine what will happen and where the events will take her. What started as a simple trip of search for inner peace, turned out to be the greatest, unimaginable adventure of her life.

name: Tales of Tomorrow: Experiment
summary: ToT: Experiment is a sci-fi short story game set on a remote ship wandering through space. Without any memories or recollection of his past our hero is tasked by the ship AI - EVE to perform daily tasks, that will help to maintain the ship.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Vocaloid Songs Collection
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

Vocaloid Songs Collection contains 9 songs: "Good-bye Declaration", "Lagtrain", "Luka Luka★Night Fever", "Lower one's eyes", "DARLING DANCE", "Yoidore Shirazu", "ASUNO YOZORA SHOKAIHAN", "Venom (feat. flower)" and "A Tale of Six Trillion Years and a Night".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tales of the Orient: The Rising Sun
summary: Travel to the Edo period in Japan and help Satsu and Miyamoto in an epic adventure to preserve ancient Japan. Prove your skills in Challenge mode with limited moves. Experience the excitement of building an ancient Japanese village in this engaging Match 3 game.

name: Tank Operations: Diary of the War
summary: Experience World War II's defining battles from a new perspective! In Tank Operations: Diary of the War, you command Allied forces through intense, turn-based warfare. Master battlefield tactics, upgrade your troops, and face an expansive campaign.

name: Tankegeddon!
summary: Prepare to turn the battlefield into your playground in TANKEGEDDON!, a toy-inspired tank shooter bursting with explosive action and charm.

name: Tap Zoo
summary: Create and care for your very own zoo! Collect hundreds of animals and mix and match them to build the most beautiful zoo.

name: Tactical Genius
summary: "Tactical Genius Online" is a turn-based strategy game with the focus on multiplayer, in which the gameplay is broken up into two phases: concurrent planning and execution. Players give orders to their units, and only when everyone has finished their moves, the turns are put into action.

name: Tales of the Rays: Mirrage Prison
summary:
Mirrage Prison is the first major update for Tales of the Rays and start of a new story scenario.

This update added the scenario change option to the world map, so players who hadn't completed the first story arc could start the second right away. It also added Mirror Equipment, Mirrage Artes and the Tower of Eternal Origins.

The main character from the first story arc is swapped when playing through the new story missions, Ix to Kocis, keeping his levels and equipment but having separate outfits.

name: Take the Veil
summary:
Take The Veil is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam.
You play as a psychic goat named Ulysses as he arrives at an abandoned campsite. After encountering some strange crosses, he finds an empty caravan to stay in. From here, he enters the Fourth Dimension with the goal of pulling the ethereal crosses. This game contains dialogue and there are a number of NPCs the player can talk to. There are no effects to be gotten.

name: Tales of Lagoona: Orphans of the Ocean
summary:
Help Islabelle the mermaid save her orphanage in Tales of Lagoona: Orphans of the Ocean, a delightful search endeavor. The New Anemone Orphanage has fallen on hard times and is in trouble of shutting down. Islabelle is doing everything she can to save the children's home and has devised a plan to raise the money needed for repairs.

-explore a wonderful underwater world in this hidden object treasure
-meet a host of loveable characters as you accept fun side quests
-play and solve over 150 delightful puzzles
-earn unique trophies and unlock stunning wallpapers

name: Take7
summary: Remove numbers by selecting squares of numbers where their sum equals seven. Avoid blocking yourself by carefully choosing what part of the grid to clear. Think carefully, compete against friends in the daily challenge, finish the harder gem levels or go as far as you can in endless mode.

name: TapKO
summary: Tap, punch and knockout your foes to become the greatest boxer in the league!

name: Tales of Fear: Episode Zero
summary: Can you tell the difference between reality and tale? Experience three short horror stories and gather clues as to which are true and which are just part of our imagination. Immerse yourself in the protagonist's perspective and discover eerie tales from around the world.

name: Tainted Ground
summary: A first-person psychological horror game where you wake up in a remote cabin. Survive paranormal events, explore the forest to find sacred tools to defend yourself from the dark secrets hidden within, and escape the cursed woods before they consume you.

name: Tall Order
summary: Tall Order is a fastpaced VR game, well suited for social play in the living room. Experience the rush of climbing or swing like spiderman. If that's not enough, play with your friend on the same PC.

name: Tales of SclObonia
summary: Embark on a turn-based RPG adventure with Kam and Simon who are summoned to the land of SclObonia. The two cousins must meet the inhabitants of the new-found land, unravel secrets long forgotten, and battle savage monsters and fathomless legions if they’re to ever find a way back home.

name: Tank War Nexus
summary: In tankWar Nexus, you will fight with different enemies, bosses and challenges that only true heroes can withstand. Are you a hero? Test your ability on TankWar Nexus!

name: Tales Beyond the Tomb: Pineville Night Stalker
summary: After her mother's unexpected death, Megan receives a call about a mysterious inheritance awaiting her in the town of Pineville. With her work friend, Lenny, she embarks on a journey that should be simple, but quickly turns into a web of danger and deception.

name: Taxi 3
summary:
Taxi 3 is a Racing game, developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 2003.

The game is based on the 2003 French action comedy film.

name: Tag of Driving
summary: Tag of Driving is an offline car game with action-packed chase gameplay. Choose your role as the pursuer or the chasee, and prove your driving skills in tense situations.

name: Taxi!
summary: Combining elements of arcade simulation and strategic management, Taxi! puts you in control of an up and coming cab firm based in any one of three 3D cities. You'll begin with a rundown old taxi, picking up passengers and fulfilling a variety of dispatch missions until you manage to muster up enough cash to upgrade your cab and invest in new vehicles.

name: Taisen Bomberman Cross
summary: The seventh game in the Taisen ☆ Bomberman series. It is an expanded version of Taisen Bomberman +, adding a cross-play compatibility between different mobile phone carriers (i-Mode, EZweb, Yahoo! Keitai).

name: Tarthenia
summary: Debbie Johnson thought her days of adventure were over. But when an evil warlock intervenes on behalf of his cousin, Esmeralda, she is whisked away to the island of Tarthenia. A place beyond the realm of imagination; where beauty and danger go hand in hand. And in order to save not only her life, but her sister's as well, Debbie will have to use every ounce of ingenuity she possesses. Can she thwart the plans of a madman bent on revenge? Only time will tell!

name: Target Party
summary:
Welcome to Target Party, the first-person platform game that will make you feel the adrenaline of speed and the art of speedrunning! Face a fast-paced challenge as you dash through action-packed, thrilling levels with only one goal in mind: destroy all the targets before you reach the finish line, and do it at full speed!
Explore different strategies and routes, perfect your jumps and spins, and discover hidden shortcuts as you dive into the challenging world of Target Party. Master the mechanics and compete with players from around the world in online leaderboards to prove who is the true king of the party.
Join the party and discover why Target Party is the first-person platformer that will keep you glued to the screen, enjoying dizzying thrills with every jump, every shot and every second it takes to reach victory!

name: Tales of Hearts R
summary:
An updated remake of Tales of Hearts: Anime Movie Edition, which originally released exclusively in Japan for the Nintendo DS.

With the overhauled "Aerial Chase Linear Motion Battle System," send enemies flying and dash after them! Experience the ultimate version of the story with both the old cutscenes of the original game as well as new animated cutscenes. Journey together with new playable party members!

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Yume no Owari ni
summary: The first game in the Jinguuji Saburo series was released on the NES in 1987. The series told the different cases of a 32 years old detective named Saburo Jinguuji out to solve deadly crimes, that is supported by a cast which includes his assistant Yoko Misoni and local police inspector Sanzo Kumano.

name: Taste of Blood
summary: A real-time strategy game with a simple economy, designed so you can focus on the battle and crush your enemies.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun!
summary: Enjoy the cult classic arcade rhythm game from Japan in the comfort of your own home! Play to the beat using your own drum with a wide variety of new songs and challenge your friends to prove who has the best taiko skills. Use motion controls to enjoy Taiko like never before! Unlock beloved characters to help you on your journey to become a legendary taiko drummer! Utilize the interactive features of the Nintendo Switch to connect, share, and play with family and friends.

name: Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack
summary: Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack is a sci-fi puzzle-platformer of cataclysmic proportions. You're a Blob of alien origin with mutant powers and an insatiable appetite. To the great horror of your former captors (and all of humanity), you have escaped into the world.

name: Tag
summary: TAG is local multiplayer game of catch! Square up against one, two or three of your friends and chase each other around one of three different levels! There are shortcuts you can take to bounce yourself up and away from the chaser as well as a sneaky teleport that can only be used once before it disappears so you can mislead the chaser and waste their time! Who will come out on top?

name: Tales of Fandom Vol. 1: Cress Version
summary: Tales of Fandom Vol. 1 is a compilation game for the Sony PlayStation. It includes gameplay that features characters and elements from Tales of Phantasia, Tales of Destiny, and Tales of Eternia. The game is set up as an adventure game with actual gameplay elements to explore and unlock extra bits. Some elements in the game include exploring, playing a puzzle game like the Craymel Lab, a scene maker where characters can play out a created scenario, and an extensive gallery. It was released on January 31, 2002 and only sold in Japan.

name: Taco Break
summary: Taco Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Taco themed items with a unique Chili Pepper paddle and ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels.

name: Tank Ball
summary: Tank Ball is a Popular Multiplayer game created by Maid Marian. The game features different rooms just like Sherwood Dungeon, and also features different team colors. It is most easily compared to the battle arena in Sherwood. Teams are identified by the colors red, blue, green, and white. The newest version of tankball is Tank Ball 2. Unlike the previous version, Tank Ball 2 has new power ups, landscape, and has patched up many hacks such as invincibility. The land features of the game are very similar to those of Sherwood, having similar rocks, trees, and water. The controls in Tank Ball are simple: use the arrow keys to move, and the ctrl key to shoot. Tank Ball does have a current problem with hacking.

name: Tapestry
summary:
It is a symbol and a tool. It is your past and your future. It is all things, in time. You, Timothy Hunter, have lived, and like all things mortal you have died. But the aftermath of that lifetime is anything but simple...

Faced with creatures beyond your ken, the fruition of whose inscrutable motives hinge on your decisions, what will you do? Will you face who and what you once were? Or will you try to change things for the better? Or the worse?

name: Tales of Spark: Probation
summary: Dear players, step into the world of "Tales of Spark: Probation" as a young swordsman! This is a game with real-time combat, abundant treasures, rich storyline, and diverse character builds. Of course, the challenges are also immense. Wishing you good luck on your journey!

name: Tales of Monkey Island: Chapter 2 - The Siege of Spinner Cay
summary: Freshly escaped from the winds of Flotsam Island, this second chapter picks up right where we first left our intrepid hero: with the blade of an unknown woman against his throat! But this is only the beginning...

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Hatsune Miku Pack Vol. 4
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

HATSUNE MIKU Pack Vol. 4 contains 3 songs: "God-ish", "The Vampire" and "MIKUMIKU Ni Shiteageru♪【Shiteyan-yo】".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tales of the Tempest
summary: Tales of the Tempest, the first Tales title for the DS concerns Caius, a boy with the ability to unleash the beast inside him, and his quest to find his true parents. The game is presented in 3D and uses a battle system similar to Tales of Rebirth. Enemies and allies are all on 3 lines, with the player switching between them at will. The Touch Screen may be used for special attacks never before seen in the Tales series, allowing lots more variety in battle. The big feature of this game is the ability for certain characters to transform into werewolves, gaining extra power and speed at the cost of techniques.

name: Tails of Iron II: Whiskers of Winter - Augur of the Draugr Armour Pack
summary: Gear up in the ancient armours of old with the 'Augur of the Draugr' pack for Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter. This unique collection of upgradable Draugr equipment includes three new helms, three armours, and three pauldrons, together with three new shields and three new axes.

name: Tales of Ancients: Hollow Apartments
summary: Reality unravels.Every floor reflects your mind.Tales of Ancients: Hollow Apartments a dark, atmospheric journey through psychological horror and inner collapse.

name: Taco Gun
summary: Shoot up your friends full of tacos until they explode in this insane PvP Party game! Taco Gun features 8 uniquely absurd levels and multiple characters to choose from, each with unique abilities to feed each other to death!

name: TacTac Prologue
summary:
Puzzle-adventure game where you adopt the rol of Dunai, a young guy from Gaab. He's soon moving to the big city but before doing so he'll have to say goodbye to his loved ones. On his way he'll have to solve a desapearing case.

Explore the town of Gaab freely, you'll find all kind of colorful characters. Investigate the town to unveil the secrets that Gaab hides. Also the circus has arribed to town, go take a look at the attractions and the games it offers.

With a unique and original artistic style you'll fall in love with the scenaries and characters of the game. The game counts with two cases to solve and more than 20 different puzzles on the way that will make you rack your brains and are distributed all over Gaab.

Enjoy this prologue, this is just the beginning of a big story!

name: Tails of Iron II: Whiskers of Winter - Deluxe Edition
summary: Prepare for the chilling clash against the Dark Wings with the Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter Deluxe Edition, combining the brutal action-RPG base game with both the ‘Augur of the Draugr' armour and weapon pack and ‘Hair to the Throne' cosmetic DLC.

name: Tales Beyond the Tomb: The Last Vigil
summary: Nick Harrison, a new security guard at the Guadalupe Cemetery, believes he is taking on a peaceful night shift. However, as night falls, he soon discovers he was very wrong. Nick realizes the cemetery holds more than just the dead.

name: Taxido
summary: a casual taxi-driving simulation game for Android. Players transport passengers, complete missions to level up, and earn more by maintaining and upgrading their car. Features include buying and selling vehicles, handling police encounters, and managing repairs and customization to increase profits.

name: Tale of Android After the Apocalypse
summary: Niluas, an android who suddenly activated 276 years after the extinction of humanity. With her AI, Naive, she seeks lost memories, her activation's mystery, and humanity's extinction's cause. Facing enigmatic foes and hostile androids, she quests for truth about her existence and the desolate world.

name: Taboo: Official Party Game
summary: Taboo: Official Party Game is a digital adaptation of the classic word-guessing party game where players describe target words while avoiding specific "taboo" terms. Teams compete by having a designated clue-giver communicate words to their teammates without using forbidden expressions listed on each card. The mobile version features customizable settings, multiple themed card decks, and multiplayer functionality that enables remote play through video chat. Available in six languages, the game includes the original deck alongside new themed content, all in an ad-free environment that allows players to adjust team sizes, rounds, and skip allowances to suit their preferences.

name: Target
summary: Target is an action-packed, multiplayer game where players take control of miniature toy tanks and engage in intense battles with each other. The game is set in a variety of environments, from living rooms to backyards, or as far as what your mind can produce.

name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode 2 - Atlas Mugged
summary: A new episodic adventure set in the badlands of Pandora. This collaborative brain child, is set after the events of Borderlands 2 and is a part of the franchise' official lore.

name: Talking Santa
summary:
This year, Christmas comes early.

Talking Santa is packed with countless hours of holiday fun for the entire family! Speak into your microphone and listen to Santa repeat your special holiday message aloud.

Joined by the lovable characters from the Talking Tom and Friends collection, Talking Santa enables you to create and share joyous 3D video animation greetings and Christmas cards that will warm the hearts of everyone on your wish-list!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 12 Don-! to Zoryoban
summary: Taiko no Tatsujin 12.5 (the widely accepted short form of the 12 Zoryoban machine) was released in July 2009, a month after Asia 12. It's not a fully new version, instead 12.5 succeeds at what the original Taiko 12 failed to do- provide compelling reason to come back to the arcade to play compelling new songs. 'Zoryoban' means 'expanded version' which is very true, as it included a whopping 145 songs on debut and 155 after all the secret codes were revealed, a far cry from the minimalist approach by the original. 12.5 is almost completely different from 12 in terms of fun.

name: Talking ABC's: A Day at the Beach
summary: Talking ABC's: A Trip To The Beach is an early spelling game for children 2 to 6 years old. The game uses software called TurboSound to produce voice through the PC speaker, while the vast majority of games required a soundcard. There are three modes of play. In the first mode, the game announces a letter, which the player must find on the keyboard, and then an object that starts with that later is introduced and drawn onto the screen. In the second mode, the player can press any letter and the corresponding object is drawn to the screen, which the player can move wherever they want. In the third mode, three letters and three objects are displayed, and the player must draw a line between the letters and objects to make them match. Registered users received a copy of the game which displayed their child's name, and could request a CGA optimized version which was much faster for CGA users. Additionally, they were promised a free game. Later versions promised a copy of Millions of Mazes, which may or may not have been the original free game.

name: Tamagotchi Paradise
summary: Zoom into a whole new world with Tamagotchi Paradise. Nurture your world, raise your virtual pet, and connect with friends. What will you discover?

name: Tales of the Tiny Planet
summary: Tales of the Tiny Planet tells the story of a separated group of planet friends who want to reunite. You have to assist them against the dangers of time and space.

name: Tails Adventure
summary:
Tails must stop the Battle Fortress bird army from taking control of Tails Island to rule over the animals.

On land, in the air, and at sea, Tails battles some pretty tough birds!
Depending on the Japanese and international version of the game, Tails Adventure is either a prequel or continuation of the Sonic the Hedgehog games for the Sega Genesis. The game mixes traditional platforming and role-playing elements, as Tails is using different items and abilities, as well piloting his creations Remote Robot and Sea Fox, to travel across Cocoa Island to liberate it from the Battle Kukku Empire. Like many Sonic games for the Game Gear, Tails Adventure has been ported onto numerous compilation titles and other games as an unlockable game. It later received a re-release on the Nintendo 3DS in 2013.

name: Taisen Bomberman
summary:
Taisen Bomberman is a mobile Bomberman game with online features. It is the first game in the Taisen ☆ Bomberman series.

Years later, a game called Taisen! Bomberman was released, but they are unrelated.

name: Tangram Attack
summary: Tangram Attack is a fast-paced slicing game with fiendish puzzles to test your mental agility.

name: Tactical Assault VR
summary: Tactical Assault VR is an intense tactical shooter where you use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to stack up, breach doors and eliminate threats. Play solo or join an online co-op special forces unit in missions around the world.

name: Tale of Jade Li Guang
summary: Tale of Jade Li Guang is a stand-alone roguelike card game with oriental elements. Gameplay involves constructing your own deck by 5 elements cards, exploring the map, solving random encounters, beating the demon and uncovering the mystery of Li Guang's Kingdom.

name: Tape of the Ghouls
summary: Tape of the ghouls is a VHS found footage survival horror. The game was made in 16 days. This video tape was found in May 2002 in the state of Pennsylvania. This tape reveals the event that unfolded in condemned hostel that was demolished in 1984. The content is beyond explanation and may shock the audience. The recording was code-named Tape of the ghouls. Get ready to watch.

name: Tahitian Driftin'
summary: A tropical anti-gravity racing game from the depths of a long-lost arcade cabinet that will have you cruising through lush, remote Polynesian islands with a draft-based boost system that fosters tight-knit competition between players

name: Tank Battle
summary: Tank Battle is a shooting gallery game. The main player, a cannon, must adjust the level of the cannon to that of a tank which you have to destroy.

name: Taga no Hazureta Bisque Doll
summary: Now, taste the infinite despair! People in a town suddenly turn violent due to unexplained symptoms. This is a story about enjoying the bad endings that befall high school students.

name: Taikyoku Renju
summary: Taikyoku Renju is a Game Boy port of Renju. Despite not being released outside Japan, the game has an option to play completely in English.

name: Tartarus
summary: Tartarus is an action/adventure game from first person perspective combined with text input. Developed by Abyss Gameworks and powered by Unreal Engine 4.

name: Task Time
summary: Task Time is a Gameshow inspired competitive party game where 8 friends dive headfirst into 6 rounds of unpredictable tasks and physics-fuelled chaos, to finish top of the leaderboard. From (some of) the people who worked on Gang Beasts and Fall Guys, this is your new favourite friendslop.

name: Tape Denial
summary: A psychological thriller where reality and memory collide. Unravel abandonment, depression, and shattered love through mysterious tapes. Dare to face your ghosts...

name: Taleans Hansel and Gretel story
summary: While the boy Hansel and his sister girl Gretel were walking in the dark forest, they lost each other. In "Taleans Hansel and Gretel" you will have to help them find each other. On the screen you will see a forest glade, at the different ends of which our characters are standing. For our heroes to meet each other, they need to walk along the path that goes through the clearing. But the path is broken, and you need to restore its integrity by moving the elements on the screen and putting them in the right place. As soon as you finish this task, the heroes will run along the path and meet up.

name: Tank Battle: East Front 1942
summary: Tank Battle: East Front 1942 gives a unique wargaming experience on iPhone and iPad. A game of tactical combat on the Russian Front during 1942. Fight as the Germans or the Soviets in a series of ever more complex missions. The game is the second in a series of games that started with Tank Battle: East Front 1941.

name: Tale's Edge
summary: Tale’s Edge is a third-person action-adventure RPG that combines dynamic parkour with strategic combat, allowing you to approach challenges with cunning, stealth or force. Every decision, from mercy to destruction, shapes Red’s evolution and the future of a dark, ever-shifting world inspired by the original, gritty fables from history.

name: Tagalon
summary: Tagalon is an action arcade game. The player's task is to find the largest possible number of jewels and a key to the castle. The search takes place around the castle and its courtyard. The seeker encounters on his way other knights, peasants and skeletons. The player can find a variety of items, such as a bomb, shield or extra energy. But the greatest skill is the avoidance of contact with the enemy. The player may carry only one item at the same time. Picking up a new object means loss of the old one.

name: Taisen Daifugo Cross
summary: Taisen Daifugo Cross adds cross-platform multiplayer compatibility.

name: Tales from Candleforth
summary: Tales from Candleforth is a folk horror 2D point and click adventure with puzzles and escape room mechanics. Using dark and evocative aesthetic it creates a nostalgic atmosphere where beautiful music compositions meet with 2D traditional and digital art and frame by frame hand drawn animations.

name: Taurion
summary: Taurion is a Hybrid of MMO / RTS / 4X. Prospect, Mine, Refine, Build, Fight, Craft, Trade and play to earn. Running Fully Decentralized on the Xaya Gaming Platform.

name: Tadpole Treble
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure through sheet music in Tadpole Treble! Escape predatory piranhas, flirtatious tadpoles and more as you make your way back home. Shoot for the top of the leaderboards, or create your own stages and music in Composition Mode!

name: Talking Marvel Comics X-Men
summary: A handheld electronic device based on Marvel superheroes' X-Men.

name: Tails and Pines
summary: Two friends, whose paths diverged once, met again after many years. However, both of them have changed and live in two different worlds now. Can they get through the old grudges in their hearts and become something more than just friends?

name: Tap 4 Sex
summary: Outstanding visual design, smoking hot girls, and incredibly easy to play! What else could you want for a perfect gaming experience?

name: Tales of Symphonia Remastered: Chosen Edition
summary:
Tales of Symphonia Remastered is set in the world of Sylvarant, a dying land in dire need of a constant source of mana, where legend dictates that a Chosen One will appear to regenerate and restore the world. Players will follow the adventures of Lloyd Irving and his friends as they embark on a worldwide adventure filled with unforgettable characters and an emotionally charged storyline that still resonates with fans.

Chosen Edition includes the Base Game, Metalcase, Artprints and Chibi Character Form Stickers.

name: Tales from the Dragon Mountain 2: The Lair
summary:
It has been years since brave Mina Lockheart defeated Lord Strix. But dark shadows are rising once again! Spirits are restless! For he has awaken! Evil Lord Strix is breeding a new army to enslave all creatures from the Dragon Mountains!

It is once again up to Mina and her best friend spirit Malik to travel to distant parts of the world and find clues how to open the passage to a hidden wasteland - Lord Strix's lair. Meet different characters along your journey, help them and have them help you. Search and discover new places, but hurry! Lord Strix gets stronger by the minute!

name: Talk to Strangers
summary: Talk to Strangers is a short game of everyday survival. Survive door to door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in this order) while trying to sell products to strangers. But beware: nothing is what it seems in this neighborhood.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Kadan no Itte
Tangled
summary: In this game you are able to create custom spelling lists for hair-raising fun and personalized adventure with Rapunzel!

name: Tamarin
summary: Tamarin features a unique gameplay mix that alternates between 3D-platforming and exploration, and third-person shooter gameplay. The game is inspired by the more open 3D adventures from Nintendo and Rare, and by nature and all the wonderful plants and animals in it.

name: Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Cross Generation of Heroes
summary: The first version of Tatsunoko vs. Capcom, released in arcades.

name: Table Troopers
summary: Table Troopers is a physics-driven, turn-based tactical strategy game designed specifically for VR. With fully destructible battlefields, easy-to-learn controls, and accessible yet deep mechanics, the game delivers thrilling battles both solo and in multiplayer. The vibrant visuals and quick match format make it perfect for social play sessions with friends while still offering tactical depth for strategy fans.

name: Taimumari: Complete Edition
summary:
Taimumari: Complete Edition is a retro-style platform game that keeps with the best traditions from the games of our childhood. Take control of Himari, a young female wizard who travels across various ages to restore balance in time throughout the whole world!

Taimumari: Complete Edition includes full Taimumari game with all DLCs and Legend of Himari minigame!

name: Tale of Toast
summary: With its easy to pick up play style, open world player versus player with high stakes for those daring to partake, and its focus on simple yet tactical combat, social aspects, trade skills, procedurally generated dungeons and quality over quantity quests, it is sure to have something for everyone.

name: Table Ball: Amazing Extras Skin Pack
summary: Get complete access to the Amazing Extras Skin Pack without spending any Pings.

name: Tactical AR
summary: Tactical AR was created with one purpose, to build real firearms skills and habits in virtual reality. Our philosophy is that the best training is fun, and that muscle memory developed in virtual reality effectively translates in to real weapon muscle memory.

name: Taiwan Mahjong
summary: Taiwanese mahjong.

name: Tactical Galactical
summary:
Tactical Galactical is a real-time hex-based strategy game, set in the world of a Saturday morning cartoon

- Designed from the ground up with consoles in mind, Tactical Galactical overcomes the usual controller challenges that console strategy games suffer from.
- Flying above the planet in a spaceship, players control all manner of ground units below, from hovering humans, to shielded attack vehicles, flying fortresses and giant robots.
- Unit tactics form the backbone of the game, all with different strengths and weakness against the others.
- A card system is used to deploy fresh units, bolster the army, perform special moves and attack the other player's space ship.
- A strategic layer, with base upgrades, unit upgrades, card upgrades and ship upgrades, allows for longer term planning.
- Single player adventure, multiplayer battle and fighting with friends.
- Three adventures, with their own unique card decks and play styles.
- Giant aliens to thwart our adventures' plans.

name: Tamara
summary: Tamara is a Dungeon Crawler with elements of Survival Horror in a Cyberpunk-Fantasy Setting. Explore dungeons, bunkers, castles and abandoned cities in search of loot and methodically fight your way against all types of monsters and machines.

name: Tank Battle: Blitzkrieg
summary: 'Tank Battle: Blitzkrieg!' recreates the first battles of World War II. On 1st September 1939 the German army marched into Poland, two weeks later the Soviets also invaded and the Polish army was crushed by 6th October. Over the coming months the Germans expanded their grip on Europe with further invasions of Denmark and Norway.

name: Tamagotchi no Pichi Pichi Omisecchi
summary: Tamagotchi no Pichi Pichi Omisecchi is a Japan-exclusive Nintendo DS entry in the Tamagotchi Corner Shop spin-off series. Set on Pichi Pichi Island, players choose a Tamagotchi partner and help run and upgrade a variety of island shops through mini-games. The game features 3D-style graphics, an explorable game world, and introduces ingredient-gathering mechanics—like fishing, farming, and market shopping—to restock and manage the shops. The storyline centers on helping the island hold together as players unravel an environmental mystery affecting fish and crops.

name: Tale of Ren: Searching for Heart Droplets
summary: Me...Mizu Ren Nanami… As a REN people, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms. Then, the Rostania is the town where I was chosen to come here. to the pursuit of secrets that were never known before.

name: Taghairm
summary: "Perhaps the most horrible of all recorded magical spells."

name: Tarot Awakening
summary: Rise beyond fortune-telling, become a true Tarot master! In Tarot Awakening, train with spreads, flashcards, and memory challenges. Inspired by the Rider–Waite tradition, this is the ultimate test of your intuition and mastery. Will you ascend to Oracle status or wander the mysteries forever?

name: Tank Battle Retro
summary: Do you have what it takes to lead your tank to victory? Enter the world of Tank Battle Retro, where your focus is to control your tank and eliminate all the other opponents. You will have to defeat the enemy, destroy the blocks, walls and other structures. However, you have a limited number of lives, so you must be very careful how you move and when others will attack you. Each time you lose a life, you will get stronger, but if you lose all lives the game will be over. Tank Battle Retro comes with simple, engaging and fun controls, while pushing the experience to new heights all the time. We also have 4-player support. There are 20+ levels to play and 20 maps, as well as an unlimited amount of fun to be had while you try to master everything. Test your tank-handling skills and lead your team to victory!

name: Taxi Simulator Driver: NY City Rides
Tails Adventure: Fire of Robollion
summary: A platform developed for Game Gear starring Miles "Tails" Prower. The Tails Island has been attacked by the terrible fire robots of Robollion. Explore Tails island and defeat enemies. This hack adds a few new assets, new color palettes and new levels. All of the levels from the original game were redone, from the color palette to the level design.

name: Taking Today Off
summary: Taking Today Off is a light-hearted roguelike deck-builder about managing modern life states. Draw cards, place them on the board, add stickers and tools, and build playful combos. Easy to learn, with fresh choices and strategies every run.

name: Taz-Mania
summary:
A video game adaptation of the Taz-Mania cartoon, starring the Tasmanian Devil. One of several games based on the license, the Sega versions features the same story, but has a unique design and set of levels in the different platforms.

Inspired by a tale his father told, Taz goes on a quest for the egg of a giant prehistoric seabird, which will lead him across the whole of Taz-Mania through 16 levels of platforming action. He must survive a desert, a jungle, a car factory, a mine and ancient ruins. Taz is able to run, jump, and spin fast to turn into his trademark whirlwind. While spinning, he can knock out most enemies he comes across. He can also pick up many different items and try to eat them or use them in another way. Most foods replenish his health, while eating hot peppers gives him a fire breath attack. Stars grant temporal invulnerability, while bombs should be thrown at enemies (and definitely not be eaten!).

name: Taz-Mania
summary: The Game Gear edition of Taz-Mania features a different set of levels from its original Genesis/Mega Drive version, as well as a particularly infamous soundtrack. The player must navigate Taz through a variety of mishaps and situations in his quest to find the Lost Valley, and nab an egg from one of its giant seabirds, so that he may feast on a humongous omelette.

name: Tales of Tirunia
summary: Tales of Tirunia is a turn-based strategy game focused on turning your enemy’s own units against them and chaining attacks to take as much area as possible! Choose your army, master your faction’s special abilities, and use your skills to claim the board!

name: Tailed Demon Slayer
summary:
Join our hero's adventure in Bestia, a once happy and peaceful little town turned dark. Undead bosses are now crowding the streets under King Richie's iron fist. But this will end now! Stock up on epic hero powers to start the battle of the century today!

Unlock your potential and learn new skills to battle the zombies while exploring all the possibilities of this new and exciting action idle hero game!

Grab your weapons and friends to join this exciting fantasy idle RPG adventure now! You will find it full of opportunities to battle fierce enemies, unlock skills, and power up your hero to the max! Grow stronger, every day and battle the undead bosses of Bestia in this Idle Hero Battle!

name: Task Force 88: Hostile Contact
summary: In Task Force 88: Hostile Contact, TF-88 pits their elite team against Chaos, a vicious mercenary unit relentlessly causing world-wide anarchy. You choose which side you're on, and you'll battle in three exotic locales, Castle, Favela, and Desert, as well as in a bonus mystery map.

name: Tap To 1000
summary: Put your reflexes to the test in this simple game: Stop at 1000! The machine will be tolerant if you stop first, but its patience has limits... Keep calm, don't stress, and show your determination.

name: Tarragona 7: Civilisations Crossroads
summary: At the end of TWH6 Lara was teleported by the blue cube very far from the Earth. Where is she now? She is now in a Crossroad Civilisations.

name: Taiwan Monster Fruit: Prologue
summary: Taiwan Monster Fruit is an exciting, parkour-style, motion-sensing game. Experience challenges and adventures by working together, but still competing with one another, in single-player or four-player team modes. Players will be equipped with different types of cards and work together to become the best team of little monster warriors. Levels and Missions The Monster Fruit world is filled with fantastic creatures; in this world, creatures seemingly identical from those in the real world can have unexpected powers. Embark on a wondrous adventure, and complete progressively more demanding levels in a variety of scenarios. You may be battling through a mysterious land of water, climbing up unimaginably tall beanstalks, or running among scorching volcanoes. Each level will test the reflexes of the best little monster. Easy to Use/Diverse Challenges Taiwan Monster Fruit allows everyone to pick up the game quickly and have fun together, but in order for players to protect themselves during the chaos of battle, they must organize themselves and make the best out of their limited cards. Only a well-prepared and coordinated team can save the monster world and become the best team of little monsters. Different Gaming Modes As the game progresses, a number of special challenge levels will be revealed. You can compete with your teammates to get the best score and become the MVP of the game. Get Moving for an Exciting Adventure! An interesting parkour-style motion-sensing game where players can choose a team of 1 to 4 little monsters to go on an adventure. Access different skills (cards) by moving…

name: Tactics Returners
summary: Tactics Returners, inspired by the golden age of TRPGs, aims to combine modern gameplay mechanics and advanced 2D visuals. Join the struggle for freedom, face decisive tactical challenges against superior forces, and shape the fate of the Returners!

name: Tanks, But No Tanks
summary: Tanks, But No Tanks is an updated take on a classic top-down arena tank shooter. This multiplayer madhouse will keep you on your toes as you balance collecting coins on each map with shooting projectiles at your foes. Upgrade your tank's weapons, armor, and abilities in between rounds with the coins you pick up.

name: Tactical Bandits
summary: Tactical Bandits is an extremely challenging top-down action game where the player travels on a journey to the West Coast to reach the Last Settlement, the last known human survivor camp.

name: Taiheiki
summary:
Taiheiki is a turn-based strategy game, based on the television drama of the same name, which in turn is based on a famous 14th-century historical epic which chronicles the fall of the Hōjō clan during the Kamakura period of Japanese history.

The game is a grid-based strategy game in the tradition of Fire Emblem or Langrisser. Each side has multiple units, which can move depending upon the terrain. Conflicts between units are shown as animated sequences, and the player can determine formations, as well as issue and change orders to different troops at any time. Battles between enemy commanders take the form of a side-scrolling 1-on-1 action sword battle.

There are two scenarios available. The first casts the player as Takauji Ashikaga as he attempts to oust Godaigo and establish a new government, while the second follows Masashige Kusunoki and Yoshisada Nitta, who must try to protect Emperor Godaigo and his imperial rule. The two scenarios intertwine at various points, and graphical story sequences between each battle drive the story.

name: Taxi Rush
summary: Get behind the wheel in Taxi Rush and transport your passengers in this crazy big city! As a crazy taxi driver, get your passengers where they need to go on time. Traffic? Traffic Rules? Police? Red Lights? No, no, no, no, no, no. You're a crazy, lawless driver. Jump with your car if you have to!

name: Tales Beyond the Tomb: The Farm's Secret
summary:
"Tales Beyond The Tomb" is a chilling episodic horror series that plunges players into the shadows of real-life cases.

This is the second episode of the series:

Episode 2: The Farm's Secret
Dragged into a web of secrets and lies, Samantha seems to be part of a puzzle impossible to solve. What once seemed obvious soon turns into something far more sinister, and the line between villain and victim begins to blur.

Nothing is as it seems. How far will you go to uncover the truth?

name: Take Off: The Flight Simulator
summary: Fly more than 20 airplanes in an open world or try out 50 exciting and varied missions – from air freighting to dramatic rescue operations! You can also establish your own airline and fly to cities such as New York, London, Sydney and 18 other destinations. Fly the most popular models of planes, such as jumbo jets, seaplanes and a military jet with realistically designed 3D cockpits. Experience challenging weather conditions and try to land your plane safely with an engine failure in this flight simulation game!

name: Taut
summary: Taut is a 2007 freeware horror game made in RPG Maker, which takes heavy inspiration from Silent Hill in terms of visuals and the movies of David Lynch.

name: Tap Master: Mondrian
summary: Can you follow the rule?

name: Tamagoneko
summary: Get off the tree and face the world full of saws, pits and spikes in this hardcore 2D platformer about the nimble white Cat. Make your way through wild plains, thorny deserts and crystal caverns on a challenging yet exciting journey to rescue the lost kitten eggs!

name: Tales of Isenberg
summary: Tales of Isenberg is a medieval fantasy-style, Hungarian-voiced 2D platformer that blends action and skill. The hero, Alrik, journeys to the frozen castle of Isenberg to face the forces of darkness. Dangerous foes and unexpected twists await you!

name: Tales of Tonbrook
summary: Tales of Tonbrook is a life-sim/RPG hybrid. When you receive an invitation to the prestigious Daverton Adventurer's Academy, you take it! Study, perform missions for the school to pay your way, explore the world, make friends, fish, farm, find hidden ruins, and much more!

name: Tank Battle: East Front 1943
summary: Tank Battle: East Front 1943 is the third in the successful 'Tank Battle: East Front' series, a game of tactical combat on the Russian Front during 1943. Fight as the Germans or the Soviets in a series of ever more complex missions.

name: Tardigrade Planet: The Legend of the Strongest Mascot in the Universe
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 06: 6-mai no Hankou
Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter
summary: Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter is an action-adventure game where you step into the shoes of Taryn, a skilled warrior with a dark past. You’ll fight your way through hordes of demonic creatures, solve puzzles, and explore dark, atmospheric environments reminiscent of classic survival horror and sword fighting games. Armed with a katana, twin blades, and a crossbow, you’ll face increasingly tough enemies as you uncover the mysteries behind the demonic invasion.

name: Tales of Radiance
summary:
See your band of gods and heroes grow as you lead them through adventures, trials, arenas and tons of other challenges! Earn fat loot, reforge powerful relics, unleash overwhelming skills – all the fun awaits with no grind and no hassle!
Tales of Radiance features a 5v5, fully automatic idle RPG battle system with stunning graphics, deep character customization, and balanced dynamic metas. Coupled with a variety of fun, engaging features and events, Tales of Radiance is the auto-battle RPG to be.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Kids' Pack Vol. 3
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode and Great Drum Toy War.

Kids' Pack Vol. 3 contains 5 songs: "Let It Go - Japanese Version", "Let It Go", "Do You Want to Build a Snowman?", "Try Everything", and "Baby Shark".

*The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tahdani
summary: Challenge me is a cultural game that brings you together, brings you back to social life, creates a challenging atmosphere, and increases your knowledge and information. Get together with your group and enter a quick assessment in 6 categories with 36 questions. It also has 3 aids for each team. The game has approximately 4000 questions in various fields. Gather your team now and start the challenge. This is the link to the website tahdani.sa. The game is completely in Arabic.

name: Tales From Toyotoki: Arrival of the Witch
summary: A boy moves to a remote island in Okinawa and is informed that his grandfather, who was supposed to take care of him, has evaporated. When he is ready to fend for himself on the remote island, he meets a girl who calls herself a witch. The girl deals with magic from another world and life on a remote island where Ryukyuan culture is deeply rooted. What fate awaits them both? ────

name: Tales of the Mirror
summary: Tales of the Mirror is a landscape-mode visual novel game created by Cotton Games. As a player, you solve a series of mysteries in the mid and late Ming Dynasty, in the south of Yangtze River.

name: Tacti-Cat
summary: Tacti-Cat is a fast paced, momentum based, platformer where you play as Ellie the cat and use fish guns to save the world from an evil wizard invasion!

name: Tawamu i-call
summary: Tawamu i-call is a short game with a romantic friendship element that is mainly conversational released by kanekodou.

name: Tank rush
summary: You uncovered the conspiracy of General Sherman and must defeat his army.

name: Tales of the Cryptozoo
summary: Explore, investigate, and survive in a dark world of cryptozoology, where each creature brings its own kind of terror. Will you uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors lurking in the shadows?

name: Tantalus
summary: A turn-based RPG about a pair of demons fighting to overthrow an unjust regime. Battle through the crumbling remains of Hell, God's forgotten penal colony, on a quest to find the Apple of Enlightenment and bring justice to the wrongly damned.

name: Table Top Racing
summary: Table Top Racing Free is the multi-award winning, combat-racer brought to you by the co-creator of Sony's blockbuster PlayStation franchise 'WipEout'. With console-quality graphics and intensifying gameplay, it offers countless hours of fun and a real challenge for players of all skill levels. 'Table Top Racing' pits all manner of crazy vehicles, battling each other in a world of table-top race tracks and over-sized obstacles. Upgrade your cars in the garage, master both pickup weapons and wheel weapons and explore the circuit limits and discover secret shortcuts!

name: Tag Team Match M.U.S.C.L.E.
summary: One of the first Wrestling games released on the NES, based on Yudetamago's manga and Kinnikuman anime.

name: Tangram Collection: Bird Puzzle Pack
summary: A pack of extra 50 puzzles.

name: Taito Milestones 2
summary: On the heels of last year’s first Taito Milestones comes a new collection with more of Taito’s arcade classics.

name: Taxi Chaos
summary:
Taxi Chaos is a casual arcade racing game where you select one of a wide range of unlockable cabs, each of whom has different attributes: the strong muscle car, the superfast exotic supercar, the corner-drifting Japanese tuner, an American classic from the '60s and more: Taxi Mayhem has them all.
Your goal is to try and earn big cab fares, by picking up any customers and dropping them off at their destination spots as fast as possible before you run out of time! However, beware: most customers are a little crazy.

name: Tales of Terrabanthis
summary: Single player Fantasy RPG that is a turn based game designed to have older games functions with modern graphics.

name: Tactical Ops: Assault on Terror
summary: Tactical Ops: Assault on Terror is a first-person shooter video game developed in 2002 by Kamehan Studios and published by Infogrames as a MicroProse title. The game is a standalone retail version of a multiplayer modification of the same name published by Kamehan Studios in 1999 for the game Unreal Tournament. The game features match-based missions in which two teams, themed as Special Forces and terrorists, battle to complete mission objectives and kill their opponents. Upon release, Tactical Ops received mixed to average reviews, with critics faulting the game's similarities to the non-commercial version and lack of defining features compared to other multiplayer first-person shooters.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii
summary: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii is the first Taiko no Tatsujin game released for Nintendo Wii. The game come in two favors: A bundle with the TaTaCon made for Wii console, or only the game itself.

name: Taste of the Wind
summary: A simulation and RPG game with multiple endings, set in a Chinese restaurant. Play as the owner, and manage the restaurant, form bonds with characters, and explore the lively town. Uncover the secrets behind the restaurant’s mysterious downfall.

name: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet: Craziest and Madness Edition
summary: Embark with Tad and his friends on a new journey through different cities where you will encounter challenging puzzles in your quest to get the emerald tablet.

name: Tales of Arcrath
summary: No matter the story, however small or grand All stories are relevant within the Book of Life

name: TankHero
summary: Tank Hero is a third-person 3D game. This game requires players to operate a tank to eliminate enemies along the way and advance to the end in a complex road environment. Facing different environments, choose the right tank to start the challenge!

name: Tale of the Fragmented Star: Single Fragment Version
summary:
"A lone girl stands abandoned on a broken star.
With the star deprived of its power, she can neither use it to escape nor inform others of her plight.
However, there exists a point on this star that intersects with another world.
The player, by standing on this convergence point and wearing the Otherworld-Viewing Device (VR unit), can enter the parallel world and communicate with the girl.
Together, they cooperate to solve the puzzle of restoring the star's power so she may be able to leave."

name: Tanuki Justice
summary: Tanuki Justice is a continuous intensive action run'n gun in which you incarnate a tanuki brother and sister. You'll face hundreds of enemies in feudal Japan. Varied environments with landscapes of all kinds, retro and fast rhythmic music, numerous and difficult situations reminiscent of good old arcade games. A gameplay both simple and rich allowing spectacular actions. Possibility to play with 2 people for even more fun. And challenges that will challenge even the most skilled players. Time will be your worst enemy.

name: Take-Out! DS Series 2: Nippon no Yachou Daizukan
summary:
You can search for the main birds found in Japan by name and feature.

The wild bird data contains a wealth of non-ecological information such as scientific name, behavior, and bark, as well as identification difficulty, rarity, and encounter points.

It is a variety of wild birds game mode that you can feel free to enjoy.

name: Tales of Inca: Lost Land
summary:
Explore an unknown country with your Incas and find lost paths through forests, deserts and mountains!
Capture islands, marshes and volcanic landscapes to get closer to their goal.

name: Tails of Trainspot
summary: Relax and challenge your mind in Tails of Trainspot, a cozy logic puzzle game where you build railway networks, connect numbered stations, and explore a mysterious island filled with stories, animal residents, and mini-games.

name: Tail & Trails
summary: A short exploration game where you and your magical pets take a walk on one fine evening.

name: TankZone Battle
summary: TankZone Battle is a dynamic 3D action game. Online fights in principle similar to game Counter-Strike. Dynamic and exciting battles are awaiting you, where the power of ammunition is not everything. Use your speed and agility to defeat your rivals!

name: Talisman: The Dungeon Expansion - Legendary Deck
summary: Delve even deeper into the Dungeon Expansion with this Legendary Deck! Featuring new cards, monsters and encounters for only the bravest adventurers.

name: Tale of Excalibun
summary: Wield the Excalibun and found a kingdom for the rabbit kind by rescuing bunnies of different specializations from different environments and worlds.

name: Tax Evasion
summary: An action filled roguelike, where you climb the floors of the IRS headquarters to reclaim what is rightfully yours... Your money. Take down your enemies. Buy items with their money. And climb the floors. Unlock new characters and abilities to approach this office building in many different ways.

name: Tabletop Tavern
summary:
Total War meets Slay the Spire in a new RTS rougelike.

Dive into Tabletop Tavern, a real-time strategy roguelike where every battle is a roll of the dice—and every victory is earned. Command your mercenaries on a chaotic tabletop battlefield, recruit a wild roster of warriors, and forge your legacy against relentless goblin hordes. With infinite builds, brutal choices, and endless replayability, this is RTS chaos for roguelike fanatics.

name: Tails of Iron: Crimson Knight DLC
summary:
Play as the Crimson Knight, cursed to die repeatedly by The Absolute. Death is your path to power in this souls-like boss fight. Uncover truth, seek vengeance or redemption, and slay the goddess who betrayed you. Break the cycle or be crushed by your sins.

Arise, young squire, and become a legendary protector of the realm with the exclusive Crimson Knight DLC Pack, containing:
- 3 armour Skins
- 3 weapon Skins
- 3 shield Skins
- 3 helmet Skins

The land is awash with danger, but the sigil of the Crimson Knight is sure to strike fear in the hearts of even the most formidable of foes. Wear it with honour, and do your Kingdom proud.

name: Tableau Vivant
summary: Multiple spot the difference scenes, with unusual gameplay mechanics.

name: Take Care VR
summary: They are here. Face the darkest horror in this stunning new survival adventure! Follow the path of a mysterious woman and take the challenge of your life. Fight your way through creepy zombie hordes or solve the puzzles to succeed.

name: Talking Cat Emma Ballerina
summary:
My virtual pet Emma the cat has reached a new stage in her life: ballet dance school for talking pets. This talking kitty cat will show off her new ballerina dance skills in Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game. Teach my talking cat Emma virtual pet bring style and grace into the world of talking pets. Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina is a talking cat app that enriches all those dance games and ballerina games out there.

Can you multitask and make your talking cat ballerina glow from head to toe by making sure she is well fed, examined and rested? Emma the Ballerina, my talking cat, needs you every step of the way, so download Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game and help your talking cat pave the way to success! Virtual cat talking games will from now on take your breath away while my talking cat Emma parades her dance steps and ballet moves in her prima ballerina costume.

name: Tammuz: Blood & Sand
summary: A mythic VR puzzle-box adventure where ancient mechanisms come alive beneath your hands. Solve over 20 unique trials inside a divine cube prison and uncover Mesopotamian secrets that blur the line between reality and legend.

name: Tardy
summary: Tardy is a quest about fiddling with computers, terminals gadgets and other hi-tech scrap of all sorts. Deal with crazy machines, solve the mystery of the crew disappearance and help Ramto to come back home!

name: Tank Ball
summary: Tank Ball is played with a variable game length of 1 to 5 minutes set by the hosting player. Players shoot or bump the ball onto the other team's side and score a point when the ball hits the ground in a scoring area. Players can jump, or launch each other with missiles to their heart's content. If the other team is doing a good job of keeping the ball up try sitting on it! There's nothing to stop you from invading their half of the court!

name: Tattoo Assassins
summary: Tattoo Assassins was a Mortal Kombat "clone" which never got officially fully released due to the waning popularity of Arcades in the late 90s. The game was essentially completed before it was cancelled, though it has some minor gameplay and sound glitches, and prototype cabinets were released to test markets in 1994.

name: Tank Battle: Pacific
summary: Capture the experience of being a tank commander in the Pacific Theatre in World War Two. Fight battles between Japan, France, China, Russia, British Commonwealth and The United States of America. The game has a wide range of features from the tank battles of Northern Manchuria to the battlefields of Burma and the landings on the Pacific Islands. The game even includes a what-if scenario for Operation Olympic, the invasion of the Japanese homelands.

name: Tales of the Rays: Fairy's Requiem
summary:
Fairy's Requiem adds the third story scenario to Tales of the Rays and was released ahead of the games second anniversary event. Victor from Tales of Xillia 2 appears in the first chapter and was added to the game becoming the 100th playable character.

The main character is switched back to Ix, with a new outfit for this scenario, with Kocis no longer available in the party. Kocis remains playable in content set in the second scenario.

This update added the first chapter of the new scenario, available for new players after completing the prologue, and included updates to the game's tutorial along with changes to scenario 1 chapters 2 to 5.
Rays Chronicle, a section for the story's timeline, was also added to the game.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Hatsune Miku Pack Vol. 5
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

HATSUNE MIKU Pack Vol. 5 contains 3 songs: "Animal", "Cinderella" and "Buriki no Dance".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tales of Lyfael
summary: Tales of Lyfael is an RPG game with turn-based combat and comedy elements connecting both fantasy and the real world. Choose your avatar, gather new companions, battle fierce enemies, craft mighty artefacts, learn new spells and most importantly... become the hero Lyfael needs!

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Vampire
summary: Cast out of the Vampire's Tower for his crimes, the Vampire is ready to begin his bloody reign over the land of Talisman. Only one thing can help him achieve his goals... the Crown of Command!

name: Tales of Innocence R
summary: The Imperial Capital of Regnum kept itself in peace during the long-lasting world war. Slowly, people with a "special power" began to appear. Feared by normal people, Regnum set out a law to capture all people with special powers. One day, Ruca, the son of a merchant in Regnum, realizes the special power within him...

name: Tapsonic Bold
summary: In this popular mobile rhythm action game you get 87 tracks from Tapsonic and the DjMax series!

name: Tarantula Virus
summary: Tarantula Virus is a randomly generated roguelike topdownshooter in a sci-fi style with a lot of items and enemies. Upgrade items unlock new characters find allies and defeat powerful enemies and bosses.

name: Taito Memories Pocket
summary: This was a portable version of Taito Memories that was released for the PSP in 2006.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Saburo to Nazo no Hihou
Table Tennis
summary:
Play this classic table tennis game against your friends, family or the the smart the Ai player anytime.

Matches are randomly hosted in 8 different locations around a school.

Beat the toughest opponent with the perfect angle shot by slicing the ball and moving in the other direction as fast as you can.

The Ai player has 3 levels of skill, from easy to hard, however the real challenge may be against your human opponents, either way winning won't come easy.

name: Tank Command
summary:
Tank Command is a vertically scrolling action game. You control a tank on a mission to capture the enemy flag as well as earn as many points as possible. To do this, you will need to blast your way through their defenses on three levels of increasing difficulty. Blocking your progress are enemy tanks, pillboxes, missiles, jeeps, infantry, huts, and more, all of which earn you points when destroyed. Your tank is equipped with a limited amount of fuel and ammo, however it can be replenished occasionally by collecting the bonus icons when they appear on the screen. If you can make it past all of the obstacles and capture the flag, then you win the game! 
 
The 7800 is pretty much void of super-rare games like the 2600'?s Tooth Protectors and Chase the Chuckwagon, but don't worry, tracking down Tank Command in a box will cost you a pretty penny. As far as gameplay goes, Tank Command is not going to blow anyone away. Here you have a vertical scroller like Commando or Ikari Warriors minus the charm, quality level design, and reasonable difficulty. There are only three levels in the game, but just like its Froggo cousin Water Ski, the difficulty ramps so severely after the mindless first level that continuing takes strong will. The pink terrain is a bit odd, as well. Tank Command was only released in NTSC format.

name: TacticFront
summary:
TacticFront – The Next Generation of Online Strategy
Step onto a living battlefield where your every decision shapes the fate of nations.
TacticFront.io is a deep, competitive online strategy game that fuses modern real-time tactics with a powerful tech tree and evolving combat systems. Outthink, outmaneuver, and outlast your rivals—whether you’re a newcomer or a seasoned strategist.

name: Table for None
summary: "Table for None" is a pixelated, bite-sized open world, food truck cooking adventure game. Explore diverse regions, discover new recipes, and prepare meals to manage your food truck!

name: Tangram Puzzle
summary: Tangram Puzzle Game! Master the Skill of Tangram & Polygram Pieces Matching Game

name: Taishou Kitan
summary:
Taishou Kitan was released in 2013.

This game has a sequel called Taishou Kitan ~Kotonoha Sakura~.

name: Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation
summary:
Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation is a turn-based dungeon-crawling game based on the Dungeons & Dragons Adventure System board games and developed by BKOM Studios.

Unique Quests: The procedural map generation allows every quest to remain unique even when replaying them multiple times.

Over 30 Quests: The game features a mix of Main Story quests and Side quests.

A board game experience brought to life: The game highlights most of the features from the popular board game, combined with features unique to the digital version.

Craft your way to Victory: Collect rare crafting materials. Craft powerful weapons and armors to strengthen your heroes.

name: Tales of Raetrethra: Legends of the Past - Chapter 1
summary:
'Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past' is the story of an amnesiac man who awakens in an unfamiliar world. Follow his adventures in discovering this rich and mysterious new world, the diverse people he meets, his efforts to remember the past, and his struggles to save the future.
Chapter 1 continues the journey of our nameless protagonist under the care of Etse and her granddaughters, Nali and Rulie. It also follows Niyue as she struggles to fulfill her duties in an unfamiliar land.

name: Tank Slam
summary: A fun casual game of tanks, top down or 3rd person. Play Challenging scenarios against the meanest world leaders or create custom skirmish games where you make the rules. It can be as hard or easy as you like. We've made just about everything configurable so you can really play the game your way. We try to maximise re-playability so you get the most enjoyment for your time

name: Tasomachi: Behind the Twilight
summary:
Yukumo is a young girl who travels around in her airship, her pride and joy. When visiting a particular Far Eastern town to run some errands her airship suddenly breaks down. She decides to explore the town to search for parts for repair; however, the town has fallen silent with no trace of the people who live there, the only inhabitants being a strange cat-like species...
Tasomachi is an adventure game in which you can freely explore an Far Eastern Fantasy town. You will control Yukumo as you explore the mysterious town, clear dungeons and collect items in order to fix your broken down airship.

name: Talisman: The Reaper Expansion - Legendary Deck
summary: Try to survive as death stalks the land of Talisman, with the Legendary Deck for the Reaper expansion.

name: Tails Adventures GG2SMS
summary: An unofficial port of the Game Gear game to the Sega Master System.

name: Tacoma
summary: Tacoma is a sci-fi narrative adventure set aboard a high-tech space station in the year 2088. Explore every detail of how the station's crew lived and worked, finding the clues that add up to a gripping story of trust, fear, and resolve in the face of disaster.

name: Tales of the Magic Ball
summary: Tales of the Magic Ball is a mix of puzzle game, adventure, roller ball and plattformer. Enter a fantasy world, explore, puzzle, experience a story, fight and overcome obstacles with a physically simulated ball.

name: Tank Mechanic Simulator
summary: Tank Mechanic is a game about World War II tanks, their crews and their contribution in military history. As a tank museum owner your task is to recover destroyed or abandoned tanks and renovate them.

name: Table Tactics
summary: Knock over tabletop figurines by shooting marbles and arrows, instead of calculating stats! A turn-base strategy game that's entirely physics-driven, with single player campaign and local multiplayer skirmishes between friends.

name: Tactic Legends
summary:
Tactic Legends is a revolutionary card game that combines strategy, skill, and a touch of luck. Our game introduces a unique collection of cards and innovative mechanics that will captivate both new and experienced players.

Tactic Legends is an exhilarating online turn-based card game where strategy and skill are your greatest allies. Engage in intense battles against players worldwide, and prove your mettle by unlocking and collecting powerful cards from all collections to complete your ultimate decks.

name: Tasokare Hotel Re:newal
summary:
Tasokare Hotel Re:newal is an adventure game on Steam, iOS, and Android. This is a remake of Tasokare Hotel. The goal of game is to escape the hotel.

The game is divided into three parts: novel, search, and interrogation. You read the story in the novel part. In the search part, you find the evidence you need to solve. The interrogation part you use evidence to get to the bottom of the case.

name: Tatters of The King
summary: In this lovecraftian mystery adventure game, a strange death has occurred, and you have come to investigate.

name: Taolu
summary: Becoming a kung fu master has never been that much fun! In Taolu you can train your martial arts skills respecting the essence of the real kung fu, expanded with the wonder of a VR game. Master curated sets of choreographed movements using a realistic wooden dummy.

name: Taskforce: The Mutants of October Morgane
summary: Taskforce is a tactical, turn based game in which you control a small group of elite soldiers in a series of sci-fi themed missions. Mission objectives might include rescuing hostages, blowing up targets, stealing documents or other military activities.

name: Tatsunami, let's clean up!
summary:
"Let's do some deep cleaning while exploring their rooms!"
An official Saihate Station fan-game.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - The Setlist Edition
summary:
Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival is a drum-based rhythm game featuring songs from genres such as Anime and VOCALOID, and also a variety of game modes!
Have fun playing solo or online!

name: Tamagotchi Adventure Kingdom
summary:
From the most beloved virtual friends franchise of all time comes a new and wonderful journey for all the adventurers out there. Welcome to Tamagotchi Adventure Kingdom!

Join our adorable hero Mametchi as he travels far and wide across the world to solve problems, make friends, and use the power of happiness to restore the kingdom. Build and decorate your wilderness camp and invite your most loyal Tamagotchi companions to have fun together.

name: Tap Quiz
summary:
Play Tap Quiz to test your knowledge, practice spelling and word finding skills.
Tap Quiz combines several word game genres and it can be played alone or with a room full of people.
Type answers using letters on the screen. Share the fun by asking family members and friends for help with the answers or the spelling.
As game progresses, questions gradually become more difficult. Please note that all letters on the screen including spaces and punctuation must be used to successfully complete each level.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 6 - Tsuikou Saku Jiken
summary:
The 6th installment of the popular mystery game “Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Series”!

At the request of Detective Otonari, Ituna unravels a past serial murder case.

Masao Ikuo is asked by a client at a detective agency to find someone.

Two incidents that happened to two people. parallel and intersecting. What awaits at the end is a surprising truth.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 09: Quito no Yoru
Takotan
summary: The world has been taken over by an alien invasion. On the eve of destruction, humanity calls out for help! Takotan is a retro shoot’em up inspired by 16-bit classics. Save the world from alien invasion by shooting and dodging your way through 8 action-packed levels with sinister bosses! Collect a variety of power-ups including lasers, bowling balls and ninja stars to take down enemies and defend the planet.

name: Tank Core
summary: "Tank Core" is a 2D top-down shooter game infused with Roguelike elements. Players will collect various random tank components in levels, including turrets, chassis, shells, modules, and cores, to assemble unique tanks that will protect base and defeat all enemies encountered.

name: Talented
summary: Slay waves of spooky enemies for 20 nights to survive 'The Demonic Conveyor Belt'. Talented is an arcade roguelite with randomly generated skill trees. Choose your upgrades and abilities wisely and you might just make it out alive. Are you truly Talented?

name: Talisman: The Realm of Souls
summary: The Realm of Souls Expansion adds; 3 Characters - Archon, Spectre Collector, Clairvoyant. 6 Adventure Cards, 3 Spell Cards, 70 Veil Cards, 3 Terrain Cards, 2 Alternative Endings.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Jester
summary: Trick, amaze and dazzle your way to the Crown of Command as the Jester, if you can! Using performance skills, distract your foes and impress your friends with your juggling. Gain the favour of royalty and juggle your way to victory!Purchase this character pack to add the Jester to your character collection.

name: Tabikaeru
summary: A mobile game about a frog who goes on various trips to distant places, sending postcards during their journey and bringing back souvenirs.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Ranger
summary: Purchase this character pack to add the Ranger to your character collection. He is then available to choose in all game modes. Please note that this character is not included in the Talisman: Digital Edition Season Pass.

name: Taya's Alphabet
summary: Learn the Alphabet in Ukrainian or Russian.

name: Table Party: Kushi Express
summary: Kushi Express is a fast-paced game where players must quickly assemble skewers according to the given orders. Speed is essential, but the faster you rush, the more likely you are to mix up the ingredient order. Stay swift yet precise—create the perfect skewer with skill and composure!

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Tsubaki no Yukue
Tap Heroes
summary:
Welcome to the first puppet show RPG!
Participate in battling a ton of foes, buy new upgrades, cast magic and recruit new Heroes.
Or just sit back and enjoy the show as your Heroes fight on their own while you watch or do other things.
But just remember that you still need to make sure your heroes are strong enough before you leave them to their own, especially if you are about to face a Boss!
Enjoy the show!

name: Tales of Lagoona 2: Peril at Poseidon Park
summary:
In Tales of Lagoona 2: Peril at Poseidon Park, you need to help Leona save a once wonderful amusement park! Find and sell valuable hidden objects, and use this money to restore this source of fun in the beautiful undersea world of Lagoona. Choose between over 150 upgrades, and make sure you complete all challenging puzzles. Play Tales of Lagoona 2 - Peril at Poseidon Park Deluxe now!

-save a decayed amusement park by finding and selling hidden objects
-choose between over 150 amazing upgrades to restore the park
-enjoy 160 challenging puzzles, and try to unlock over 60 fun trophies
-play two magnificent game modes: Timed and Relaxed

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Akenai Yoru ni & Nazono-Jikenbo
Talewarden: Riders of the New Day
summary: Talewarden is a weird west adventure visual novel. Restore time on a planet where the sun never sets as you explore locations, talk, romance, and bond with your companions. Find the source of the voice in your head and discover why you all fell here from different worlds.

name: Tactical Chronicle
