Some of them may have more complicated work wanted and some may have low pain tolerance. Make sure to watch the timer, trace the lines, and color within the lines. You can also check your customer’s comfort by looking at the pain meter. This is your only chance so if you don’t do your customer right, you’ll be fired on the spot. Finish all three customers to become a great artist so you can keep your job. Once you get your customer, you’ll first have to trace the outline for the tattoo. You can choose a pen with different thickness to better get the lines right. Once you’re done with the line work, you must fill in the color. You’ll have a picture of what it should look like and you can choose colors for the palette available. This game is definitely harder than it looks so check it out and keep a steady hand.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 08: Aoi Me no Ryuu
Tale of BaGua
summary: Stack BaGua spells and travel through space and time! Tale of BaGua is a mind-bending top-down puzzle adventure where you guide a Chinese teenager on a quest to recover his family's lost treasure, the BaGua mirrors. Overcome obstacles along the way to unveil the secrets of his ancient lineage.

name: Talisman: Digital Classic Edition
summary: The officially licensed multiplayer version of the classic fantasy adventure board game, Talisman, based on the 4th Edition of the game. On your travels, you will need strength, courage and some good dice rolls to survive the dangers you face and beat your opponents to the centre of the board!

name: Talescape
summary: Talescape is a world for storytellers and dreamers. Create interactive stories without coding, publish them across platforms, and explore tales that move you, make you think, and stay with you long after they end.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack Vol. 1
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode and Great Drum Toy War.

Touhou Project Arrangements Pack Vol.1 contains five songs: "Marisa Wa Taihen Na Mono Wo Nusunde Ikimashita", "Necro Fantasia ~ Arr.Demetori", "Cirno's Perfect Math Class", "USATEI" and "Grip & Break down !! -Tatsujin Edit.-".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 4 - Shirasagi ni Aka no Hane
summary:
Hello, my name is Masao Ikuo. Thank you for your patience, we are pleased to present
the fourth volume of the detective Ryousuke Kibukawa incident story, ``Crimson Feathers on the White Heron'' .

Do you all remember the meaningful words that Shirasagisu Ituna said during the Kairoukan Incident?

This time, I would like to introduce a sad and heartbreaking incident that she encountered in the past.

Nowadays, with her excellent insight, deductive powers, and outstanding personality,
she is active as a detective assistant, but what happened in her past?

Why did she decide to become a detective?

They will be revealed at the end of the story.

Also, when configuring it as an app this time, we added a little trick.

Suffice it to say... I, 生王は, will not appear in the main story this time.

So, from whose perspective does the story progress?
That will be the key this time.

The story begins with a shocking fact that she reveals in the prologue.

Please enjoy ``Crimson Feathers on the White Heron''.

name: Taishou Mebiusline Portable
summary: PSP port of Taishou Mebiusline that removes the NSFW content.

name: Tabletopia: Wingspan - European Expansion
summary: In this first expansion to Wingspan, we increase the scope of the world to include the regal, beautiful, and varied birds of Europe.

name: Taiyou no Tenshi Marlowe: Ohanabatake ha Dai-Panic!
summary: In the peaceful kingdom of Bloomland, the coolest angel around, Marlowe, is on his way to a date with his girlfriend Nancy. But Bloomland is a mess, the flowers have all wilted, and Nancy is nowhere to be found. But Marlowe does find the cute little sun, Philip. Philip tells Marlowe that the evil witch Amanda has kidnapped everyone and the flowers have wilted because of her. So Marlowe and Philip join forces to restore Bloomland and rescue everyone from the clutches of Amanda.

name: Taimanin RPG Extasy
summary: Super-popular Taimanin RPG is now available on Steam! The Taimanin take the stage in a classic turn-based RPG! Commander Skills, Formations, and Ultimate Skills... Make good use of them and be victorious! Battle alongside Taimanin whenever you want! From this day forth, you're a Taimanin!

name: Table Ball
summary: Table Ball by Lockyz Dev is the ultimate virtual arcade game! Compete against friends or the computer in exciting matches of top-down Ping Pong. This game is perfect for players of all skill levels. Start playing today and see if you have what it takes to come out on top!

name: Table Party: Memoroute
summary: A mole-tastic memory adventure begins! Memoroute VR is a charming memory puzzle game where you uncover hidden flowers and guide your mole to its destination. Peek into the bushes, remember the flower locations, and plant your signposts. Be the first to complete your route and bloom with victory!

name: Tako Bubble
summary:
Octopus Tako's beetle collection was blown away by a magical swirl of bubbles! Could you help it pop all the bubbles and find them back?

Tako Bubble is a turn-based casual puzzler. You play as Tako, a yellow octopus, to crawl through deep-ocean environments, defeat ferocious monsters, pop all the bubbles, and find hidden beetle gems.

name: Tales from the Borderlands
summary: Tales from the Borderlands is a five part episodic game series. Set on the unforgiving world of Pandora after the events seen in Borderlands 2, this is a story full of Borderlands' trademark humor, following two adventurers on their quest for greatness.

name: Tales of Aravorn: Seasons of the Wolf
summary: ToA: Seasons Of The Wolf is a RPG set in same world of Loren The Amazon Princess. The romance is still present but the game provides a much better experience on the RPG gameplay part, with isometric maps, randomized loot, many skills and clever AI.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Saracen
summary: Resurrected and revamped for the latest edition, the Saracen was first seen in the original Dungeon expansion back in 1987. He returns to take on the challenge for the Crown of Command.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 07: Bouen wo Sagase!
Talisman: Digital Edition - Shaman
summary: The Shaman is at one with nature and she can transform into a Bear, Cheetah or Owl! In these forms, she can increase her Strength, her Craft or travel further! Using her affinity with nature, the Shaman believes she can claim the Crown of Command for herself.

name: Taskmaster VR
summary: Submit to the judgement of The Taskmaster in glorious virtual reality! The hit TV show comes to VR and YOU are the contestant. Step into the world of Taskmaster, endeavour to complete a menagerie of challenging and extraordinary tasks and get creative in how you solve them. Your time starts now!

name: Taboo University Book One
summary: Taking place before all the events of Fetish Locator, something strange has happened and three girls have gone missing! Now you must delve into the depths of a prestigious university to find out more. Meet new people, beautiful girls and discover all the hidden secrets...

name: Tank 2025
summary: Enemy tanks are on the attack. Defend your base, destroy them all, and advance to the next level! TANK 2025 is a classic 2D arcade-style top-down tank shooter with pixel art graphics.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Kids' Pack Vol. 2
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

Kids' Pack Vol. 2 contains 5 songs: "Jamboree Mickey!", "Mickey Mouse Club March", "HIMAWARI HAPPY", "Muscat" and "Odoru Ponpokorin".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tales of Misteria
summary:
Halloween-themed murder mystery visual novel in the kooky town of Misteria.

When Kira and Ame return to their hometown of Misteria for their college break, it doesn't really take long for them to hear about a local's murder.

Kira wants nothing to do with this case, but when they learn about the circumstances of the murder being strangely similar to a storybook they once read as children... well, obviously they end up entangled with this damn mystery...!

name: Tales of Xillia / Tales of Xillia 2
summary: A bundle released in Europe in 2016, containing Tales of Xillia and Tales of Xillia 2 on one Blu-ray disc.

name: Tactical Combat Department
summary: Tactical Combat Department is a tactical turn-based strategy game inspired by Swat games. You command a special intervention squad that intervenes in various situations and environments.

name: Tak: The Great Juju Challenge
summary: The top teams from across the world have come to compete in the Great Juju Challenge. Representing the Pupanunu Tribe are Tak and Lok who will face great adversity in the form of Jujus, wild animals, and some menacing new tribes. Tak: The Great Juju Challenge is an innovative cooperative videogame that combines unique puzzles, time-based strategies, and a robust combat systems. Players will have to use all their skills to win this race against the toughest competitors and receive the grandest reward ever given by the Great Jujus!

name: Taxi Copter
summary: Take on the role of a taxi driver in a crazy helicopter. Pick up passengers and drive them to their destination. Fight against the gravity, be gentle, it's a helicopter, not a tank! Earn money, get stars and unlock more levels. A city full of passengers (and pigeons!) is waiting for you!

name: Tales of Graces F/ Tales of Symphonia Chronicles
summary: Tales of Graces F + Tales of Symphonia Chronicles is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Europe in 2015.

name: Takara Cards
summary:
Takara Cards is a fusion of deckbuilding and tactical RPG about chasing space dragons in a sci-fi fantasy universe.
Control a spaceship with Cards on a 3x3 Grid in Tactical Turn-based battles.

name: Tales of Landor
summary: A semi-hardcore open world 2D MMORPG with player driven economics.

name: Talisman: The Dragon
summary: The Dragon Expansion introduces a whole host of new mechanics including two new Inner Regions. Get ready for your Talisman experience to be taken to a whole new level as you prepare yourself to battle the Dragon Lords.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Pop Tap Beat
summary:
Sync to the rhythm and drum away to those notes!
The traditional Japanese drumming rhythm game, Taiko no Tatsujin, comes to Apple Arcade.

name: Tame-a-goat-chi
summary: Run your own adorable goat pasture in this half-screen idle game! Tame, feed and care for quirky goats while growing your farm – all while you work or browse the web!

name: Tank Commander: Battlefield
summary: Get ready to blow up the tanks, shoot for the enemy tanks and claim victory. Accept your commander missions, firing to kill enemy tanks . You need be a tanks hero to win WW2 Battles.

name: Tashiro Masashi no Princess ga Ippai
summary: The story is about the hero Masashi Tashiro who has to rescue the four princesses in distress. One happy ending and four unhappy endings were used in the game; becoming one of the first video games to have multiple endings. The game was not very successful, but it started appearing frequently and getting high prices on online auction sites like Yahoo! after 2000, when Masashi Tashiro was arrested and convicted several times in connection with voyeurism and drug abuse.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Kiken na Futari - Zengohen
summary: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Kiken na Futari - Zengohen is the Virtual Console port of Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Kiken na Futari, which allows the game to be played with both episodes in a single game file, as the original game was separated in two disks (Zenpen and Kouhen)

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 03: Kiken na Futari
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 23: Wasurenagusa no Omoi
Tangram Collection: House Puzzle Pack
summary: A pack of 50 extra levels.

name: Tamagotchi Plaza
summary: Become a shopkeeper in Tamahiko Town. Engage with more than 100 Tamagotchi as they open, customize and grow more than a dozen different shops and improve your reputation with them in town.

name: Tamagotchi Plaza: Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
summary:
The Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of Tamagotchi Plaza adds three exclusive shops that can be played with mouse controls.

Become a shopkeeper in Tamahiko Town. Engage with more than 100 Tamagotchi as they open, customize and grow more than a dozen different shops and improve your reputation with them in town.

name: Tale of Souls
summary: Explore an unknown land in this roguelike deckbuilder strategy game. Face moral dilemmas, fight horrors and unlock new powerful cards for your deck as you fight the Velvet Curse that consumes you. A wrong choice can be fatal in the dire world of Tale of Souls, will you be free before it's too late?

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 21: Oni-hime-den
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 15: Shingi no Hazama
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 13: Inochi Tatsu Kokugen
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 11: Inu to Yobareta Otoko
Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop
summary: Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop lets you assist your virtual pet in building a business. Ten different shops act as unique minigames in which you must control your Tamagotchi character and assist customers. Three different playable characters are available, all with different personalities. The game also features stylus support to let you take advantage of the touch-screen features of the DS. Also, the multiplayer mode lets players swap in-game items.

name: Tales of Terrarum
summary: 《Tales of Terrarum》is a management adventure sim game. On the new land of Terrarum, you will inherit a territory as a descendant of the Francz family, and become the town mayor to settle the craftsmen and adventurers who come to the town. You'll live in and expand the town together.

name: Tales Of Glory 3 : Fists of Legend
summary:
In the shadows of forgotten temples, when neon lights fade and fists decide destiny…

Step into Tales Of Glory 3 : Fists of Legend, a VR kung fu experience inspired by the legendary 80’s beat’em all.

Ten schools. Ten battlegrounds of legend. Only one path: fight, endure, ascend.

Immersive combat: unleash fists, kicks, and combos against multiples enemies.

Arcade spirit reborn: a tribute to the golden age of beat’em alls, reimagined in VR.

10 beautifully crafted maps: from back‑alley brawls to mystical arenas, each stage is a cinematic battleground.

13 unique combat styles: every opponent fights differently, forcing you to adapt and master your technique.

Mystical powers: channel ancient energy to unleash devastating abilities and turn the tide of battle.

VR intensity: sweat, move, and fight like you’re truly inside the game.

Sho Ren’s fists are the key. His spirit is the weapon.

The battle begins now — will you rise as the ultimate kung fu legend?

name: Taiko no Tatsujin Portable 2
summary: Taiko no Tatsujin Portable 2 is the sequel to Namco's popular music game. This time, a total of up to 62 are included, as well as a "Story Mode" where one progresses by playing rhythm games. Also 4 minigames different from those of the predecessor are newly added. Beginner Dojo becomes Japanese Taiko Classroom, where one can try their hand at more difficult scores. While the newly added Donko Mode allows beginners and children, who are not used to controlling don and katsu, to also fully enjoy the fun of beating the taiko. Taiko no Tatsujin Portable 2 can be played cooperatively and communication battle, and also supports game sharing function. For the four minigames, two can be played via communication battle as well.

name: Tanki 2.0
summary: Alongside the current “Tanki Online” project, Alternativa Games began the development of a new project called “Tanki Online 2.0”. It was supposed to be a brand new product with more realistic graphics, a more convenient UI, and a huge amount of convenient options and functions (social networks, mobile gaming, etc.). However, after one and a half years, it was decided to scrap that project and gradually transfer most new features from it into the existing version of “Tanki Online”.

name: Taste of Power
summary:
Taste of Power is a game in the genre of RTS. The basis of the game world is the era of the alternative Middle Ages: world in which lands of Europe and China located close to each other. Due to this, take place clash of cultures, which did not happen in reality: crusaders in India, samurai in Scandinavia, the saracens in China...

We build Taste of Power by learning experience of StarCraft and other cybersport discipline. So we create gameplay that combine deep strategic elements with dynamic and diverse mechanics. The focus is on the variety of game sides and dynamic battles in different parts of the map. Subscribe and learn more about.

name: Tamagotchi Classic: Original
summary: Tamagotchi Classic: Original is the classic tamagotchi game now for your smartphone!

name: Tabletop Defense
summary: Take out your toy box and shred your enemies to pieces.

name: Tally Castle
summary:
Tally Castle is a math based dungeon crawler where you solve puzzles.

The puzzles are based on how the order of calculations affect the end result.

The objective is to tally the numbers in each room so they match the number in the door.

If you are good at math you can analyze and excecute but if you are not you can just play around with some trial and error.

You may learn stuff by accident!

name: Tad-Bubble!
summary: The pond is a tyrannical place hardly fit for little Tad-Bubble. Luckily, Tad has the power of the Miracle Bubble on his side! Help Tad fight off waves of dangerous boss bugs, boss fish, and boss more in this GameBoy homebrew.

name: Tank Storage
summary:
Drive a car, shoot the gun with operating a tank and sometimes walk.
2D top down combat vehicles shooter and adventure game

name: Tales of Yokai Harmony
summary: Tales of Yokai Harmony is a puzzle adventure that combines Sokoban gameplay and visual novel storytelling in a world inspired by East Asian mythology. Join yokai of the Five Elements and restore harmony through ancient puzzles.

name: Taiga
summary: Taiga is a harsh survival simulator in the Taiga forests of Russia. There is constant cold, wild nature, clean air and time go slower. There are no zombies and geomagnetic disasters, only the nature of our vast planet. You'll have to make your own decisions.

name: Talking Ben the Dog
summary:
Talking Ben the Dog is a simulator game. To make Ben responsive, you will have to bother him long enough that he will fold his newspaper. Then you can talk to him, poke or tickle him or even have a telephone conversation with him.

If you get Ben to his laboratory however, he becomes as happy as a puppy. There you can do chemistry experiments by mixing a combination of two test tubes together and see the hilarious reactions.

name: Talking Ginger
summary:
Say hello to a world of fun with Talking Ginger, the perfect playtime friend!

Ginger loves to play fun games with friends! Brush your friend’s teeth, play with the bubbles and have fun popping them to unlock jigsaw pieces. Your friend needs you to help complete all of his funny jigsaw puzzles.

Interact with Ginger! You can pet, tickle and talk to your funny friend. Turn on your microphone and say hello to Ginger

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 16: Tsubaki no Yukue
Taisho Romance Theater
summary: This is a dark and diverse romance visual novel set in 1920s Taishō-era Japan, where amnesiac actor Kotori Sakuma is pulled into long-buried secrets after a friend's mysterious death. As he becomes entangled in magic, conspiracy, and haunting blood ties, his search leads him toward a darker truth.

name: Tales of Arise: Beyond the Dawn - Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Beyond the Dawn Ultimate Edition includes:
• Tales of Arise
• Beyond the Dawn Expansion
• Classic Characters Costume & Arranged BGM Pack
• Premium Travel Pack
• Starter Pack
• Premium Item Pack
• Premium Costume Pack
• Collaboration Costume Pack
• 18 additional costumes

Wield the Blazing Sword and join a mysterious, untouchable girl to fight your oppressors.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 19: Rensa Suru Noroi
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 18: Kadan no Itte
Tales of Wind Online
summary: Tales of Wind Online is a 3D fantasy MMORPG featuring non-target combat and a top-down view. Enjoy fast, fluid battles with full movement control. Team up to defeat massive bosses with real-time tactics. Experience stunning 4K visuals, smooth PC gameplay, a new class, and exciting IP crossover!

name: Tales of Survival Horror
summary: "Tales of Survival Horror" is an intense survival horror game where you must fight relentless zombies, solve puzzles, and explore a decaying industrial complex in a desperate search for your missing daughter. Will you uncover the truth, or become part of the nightmare?

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Rensa Suru Noroi
Talents
summary: Write your way to success with your talented yet rowdy co-founders in this game development-themed romance visual novel! Do you have what it takes?

name: Tamagorudo: Floor O
summary: TAMAGORUDO - Floor 0 - is an atmospheric psychological horror game. You will find yourself stuck in a parallel floor of the Backrooms, trying to break out of the loop of a chicken-or-the-egg paradox. Will you find the answer to this endless question ?

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Naki Ko no Shouzou
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Shikaku no Wana
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Futa-iro no Shoujo
Taming the Heart of a Beast
summary: Wild beasts and famine have ravaged your village since birth. To help the village, the elders enlist you to 'excavate' a jeweled heirloom from a powerful baron. Days later, the angry baron makes his appearance, demanding the stolen artifact back.

name: Tales of Argento: Spirit of the Goddess
summary: Step into a vibrant, epic world where magic and adventure await around every corner! This enchanting RPG blends a charming, cartoony art style with thrilling gameplay, inviting you to explore dungeons, master powerful skills, and engage in fast-paced sword combat while following an engaging story.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Inu to Yobareta Otoko
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Shingi no Hazama
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Akenai Yoru ni
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Naki Ko no Shouzou
Taste of Victory
summary: An RTS that blends elements of MOBA and RPG, with a focus on action. Your soldiers will be the cornerstone of your economy. If you want to acquire resources to increase or improve your army, you'll have to conquer.

name: Tales of Zizada
summary: You have crash-landed on a strange alien planet as a cicada, surrounded by a world teeming with giant insects and thriving fungi, waiting for you to explore!

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Quito no Yoru
TableTop Soccer
summary: Online, Single/Multiplayer tactical, simultaneous turn-based soccer strategy game. Play live games or play resumable games over a few days. Level up your team, unlock abilities and dominate the leaderboards. Or just embarrass your friends with your superior skills.

name: Taishou Mebiusline Vitable
summary: PlayStation Vita port with sexually explicit content removed.

name: Tao's Adventure: Curse of the Demon Seal
summary: Take on the role of Tao, a young magical student trying to master the Magical Arts. One day, the Demon Seal from a faraway Monster Tower cracked and let loose hoards of ferocious ancient monsters. In Tao's village, the village of the Bente Island, an extremely powerful monster curses the townspeople, including Tao's family, turning them all into stone. Tao must find a way to master the art of magic, repair the Demon Seal, destroy the curse and save his family. In order to break the curse, Tao must find the monster egg of the ancient monster that cursed his family, Straitser. With that egg, he can return to the village and the last remaining elders can break the evil curse, although if Tao does not return by the next full moon, the curse will never be broken.

name: TakeDogs
summary: TakeDogs is a competitive war simulator. You will join a highly trained special operations group. With new century combat technology, you will travel to conflict zones to dismantle terrorist organizations and high-value targets.

name: Taco Attack!
summary: Catch ingredients to make tacos. But look out—catch the wrong ingredient and your taco will break! Use items to trip up your opponents or give yourself a boost. What are you waiting for?! Onion mark...get set...TACOOOOO!!

name: Taiwan Coolfox
summary: 3D animal anthropomorphic characters, horizontal scrolling, action-adventure game, exciting fighting moves, and gorgeous background images. Controls are in side-scrolling combat mode: move left, move right, jump, punch attack, kick attack, dodge, wall jump, and special move.

name: Tavern Maid's Daily Life
summary: In 'Tavern Maid’s Daily Life' you play as a maid working at the 'Red Fox Tavern', serving all kinds of customers and enjoying a cozy, eventful everyday life. Between casual chats and daily chores, you’ll gradually uncover the deeper stories and mysteries of the fantasy world around you.

name: Tap Force
summary:
Welcome to Tap Force! Head back to the '90s and clean up the streets of Metro City in this new auto battle RPG!
Assemble a team of the ultimate 16-bit pixel fighters and use them to battle with or against other players. Arm your citizens by expanding your weapon shop business that runs even while you are offline!

name: TapPlus
summary: A simple clicker game where you press a button to increase the number, with Steam leaderboard support.

name: TavernHold
summary: Build, manage and defend your fantasy tavern.

name: Task Force 9
summary: Get ready for Task Force 9 - the VR game that puts your combat skills to the test. Take down enemies using force or stealth while controlling your AI partner. Use cover, explosives, rappelling, wall breaching, and ambushes to survive. Sharpen your situational awareness in close-quarters combat.

name: Tales of Glacier VR
summary: It is said that there was a wonder land located in the coldest place of the earth. The indigenous people lived happily under the protect of the God. Until one day, an evil dragon came here leading its vicious corps. Destroying everything violently and expelling the residents out of their home, the evil dragon attempted to occupy the whole world. At this moment, the God came down from heaven and fought a life-and-death battle with the dragon in order to protect the residents. In the end, the dragon was defeated and fled into the ice land with its corps. The world was back in peace. To prevent the dragon from invading again, the God built a magic gate and sent guardians to garrison there. During this short peaceful time, everything was covered by cold thick ice. Turret was frozen and the magic has been weakened. The dragon from afar is getting ready for the next attack. Another protection battle is about to begin.

name: Tank War Defender 3
summary:
Play as a tank commander and protect the Energy Generator on the moon !
Eliminate enemies coming in waves as long as possible to improve your score.
Even more powerful enemy tanks will give you more trouble.
You will be able to get access to new weapons with the money you have collected.
Use different weapons like an Electric Shockwave or a powerful Orbital Strike to defeat enemies.

name: Tails of Iron: Complete Edition
summary:
Tails of Iron Complete Edition is the full-throated definitive way to experience the acclaimed adventure-RPG. As Prince Redgi, set out on a harrowing quest to reclaim your Kingdom from the merciless Frogs. Includes all DLC, both endgame expansions, digital artbook & soundtrack.

Tails of Iron Complete Edition includes:
- Tails of Iron
- Bloody Whiskers Expansion
- Bright Fir Forest Expansion
- Crimson Knight DLC
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Soundtrack

name: Tales of the Laser Knights
summary: Zak needs to save the galaxy! Explore all 5 known planets, upgrade your Laser Katana, learn how to fight the evil ... and go on an intergalactic adventure, in this sci-fi b-movie Action-RPG!

name: Tanbi Musou: Meine Liebe
summary: Tanbi Musou: Meine Liebe is an Adventure game, developed by Mobile 21 and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Takkoman
summary: Takkoman -Kouzatsu World- is a stylish 2D action game born from character fan art based on the Touhou series, featuring individually unique creatures running rampant across all thirteen stages!

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo DS: Fuserareta Shinjitsu
summary: The 13th installment in the long-running Tantei Jinguji Saburo series, which also contains five games from the mobile phone series (No.11–No.15).

name: Tales of Terror
summary: Tales of Terror is a co-op or PvP horror survival game. Work together to survive, Use a variety of items, solve the mystery and escape… if you can! Or play as the monster and stop the gang from escaping!

name: Tales of Hearts R: Infinite Evolve
summary: Included in the first print copies (pre-order) of Tales of Hearts R on the Vita and available with a digital release for a limited time. It's a minigame rendered in the same graphic style as Tales of Hearts – the DS version, it is a game separate from the main story with an exponentially increasing difficulty level. Yuri, Jade, Stan, and Lloyd show up as guest characters and comes with special skits.

name: Tales of Herring Lake
summary: Welcome to Tales of Herring Lake, where your favourite Sunday fishing show meets Alfred Hitchcock. Grab your gear and start shaping your story!

name: Tall Trails
summary: Tall Trails is a chill exploration game, where every item can be used as fuel in your Rocket Boot to blast yourself into the air! You're Alp, a little golem on a quest to find his purpose. Traverse a world of towering peaks, mysterious megastructures, and weird little guys!

name: Tales of Kathay
summary: Tales of Kathay is a turn-based RPG set in a deeply simulated, fully procedural world. Explore rich histories, shape evolving civilizations, and fight tactical battles where your choices echo across generations.

name: Talystro
summary: Talystro is a rougelite-deckbuilder where you combine dice and cards to defeat your enemies. The catch? Instead of chipping away at their HP, you must macth their value. Collect, upgrade and enchant your cards. Discover game-breaking artifacts, power up your dice and defeat the Necrodicer!

name: Tamagotchi Garden
summary: On the Tamagotchi Planet lives a special race of bug-like Tamagotchi characters called Mushitchi. While Mushitchi can be found all over the planet, their biggest and safest home is the Mushitchi Forest. Mushitchi hide amongst the leaves, grass, dirt, and under the ground. Due to this, other Tamagotchi wandering in the forest accidentally step on them occasionally. On the Morino Tamagotchi, the user is tasked with caring for a Mushitchi, helping it grow big while avoiding getting injured.

name: Tales of Berseria Remastered
summary:
Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand

name: Tarot
summary: Tarot is a Rouge-like deck builder themed around the Major and Minor Arcana of the Tarot.

name: Tame It Too!
summary: This is the sequel to the game Tame It! The adventures of Lee, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continue! A new big island full of life and the freedom to explore it, as well as new hot beauties to tame await you in this game.

name: Take the L
summary: Play in a tense 1v1 shadowboxing duel. Celebrate your victory with hilarious emotes and show off your triumph! Outsmart, outplay, or risk it all-will you survive the gamble?

name: Tac-Scan
summary: Fly your squadron of five ships around shooting down the enemy pilots. When you get hit, you simply lose one of your ships. After each round, you'll get a replacement ship which you have to maneuver into your formation or it's lost forever. In Tac-Scan, you control which direction you fly, though your planes stay in the same location of the screen.

name: Tails Adventure: Armada
summary:
Tails Adventure: Armada is an action platformer with a focus on story, exploration, and collection.

You play as the incredibly intelligent, twin-tailed prodigal kit fox, Miles "Tails" Prower caught in the midst of yet another Battle Bird invasion of Coco Island.

Run, jump, hover, and fly your way across the land. Explore, uncover secrets, solve puzzles, collect gadgets, upgrades, and candy in your efforts to dislodge the Battle Bird Armada and foil their mysterious plans.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 12: Futa-iro no Shoujo
Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 17: Akenai Yoru ni
Talon's End
summary: A fantasy romance/friendship interactive fiction story about marrying an immortal

name: Tavern Talk: Pirate Palooza (Costume Pack)
summary: This DLC offers pirate-themed outfits for your favorite detective-outlaw-duo: Melli and Zephir! Ready for their adventures out on the roaring sea—or wherever the quest board in the Wayfarer's Inn leads them.

name: Taz: Wanted
summary:
Taz: Wanted is an action-adventure video game featuring the Tasmanian Devil, from the Looney Tunes. Blast your way through 15 different levels, destroying "Wanted" posters to get your revenge against Yosemite Sam.

The game was nominated for 2002 BAFTA award in category 'Best Children's Entertainment'.

name: Tap Tap Loot
summary: The world is under attack, and every tap fights back. Each keystroke unleashes your cute cat hero, smashing enemies and showering you with loot. Dive into a never-ending desktop expedition with friends or solo. Tap. Tap. Loot.

name: Tanuki's Spring Walk
summary:
You get a letter from your fox friend, Kitsune, on a pleasant spring morning.

It's time to go on a walk!

A novel game stroll which you play by making choices. Pick up ingredients on the way to Kitsune's house.

name: Tank Mechanic Simulator: First Supply DLC
summary:
At the beginning of the work on the new vehicles, we set ourselves a goal of improving the quality of workmanship. Each of the vehicles has been painstakingly recreated on the basis of the collected technical documentation. The interiors have been improved, we have added more details such as radio stations, cables, and more removable parts.

BT-7 (Early 1935)
Soviet light tank produced between 1932 and 1941 and served during the early stages of World War II. Well known for its ability to remove continuous track and change to the wheeled mode which enabled it to travel at high speed on roads.

M18 Hellcat
The fastest and most effective US tank destroyer. It served during World War II. It was perfectly suited for ambushes and quick rushes against the enemy. On a favorable road surface it could reach a speed of up to 89km/h

IS-2
Soviet heavy tank firstly used in early 1944. Its 122mm gun was easily destroying the armor of the iconic German Tiger tanks. By the end of the war, 2,400 of them had been produced.

Churchill Mk III AVRE
Used to protect the engineers on the battlefield. Served during the invasion of Normandy. Firing with spigot mortar, could be additionally equipped with plowshares, a small box grider bridge, or fascines. Its goal was to pave the way for following forces and destroying bunkers.

PzKpfw VI Ausf. B Tiger II (H) “King Tiger”
The successor of the Tiger I. The largest and heaviest tank used in World War II. It weighed up to 70 tons and its length reached over 10 meters with the cannon pointed forward. He served in the final phase of World War II.

First Supply DLC includes 5 vehicles:
BT-7 (Early 1935)
M18 Hellcat
IS-2
Churchill Mk III AVRE
PzKpfw VI Ausf. B Tiger II (H) “King Tiger”
Engines list:
V12 M-17T
Radial 9 Cylinder, Continental R975-C1
V12 V-2-IS
Flat 12 Cylinder, Twin Bedford
V12 Maybach HL 230 P30
Additionally each vehicle contains packs of new museum stands, posters, unique MGs, ammunition, and achievements.
20 posters
5 museum stands
5 achievements
MGs like MG-34 or DT
Tank ammunition

name: Tales of Phantasia: Cross Edition
summary: A remake of Tales of Phantasia included within Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon X. Includes various enhancements such a faster battle system more in-line with modern entries, revamped UI, a new character, and the full voice acting included in Full Voice Edition.

name: Tacticalunderground Arcade
summary: Welcome to the world of shooting sports! There are tons of shooting tournaments waiting for you in the #tacticalunderground arcade! Day and night, in closed shooting ranges or on huge training grounds, take part in matches in sports and tactical disciplines.

name: Tale of Immortal
summary: Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.

name: Tainted Keep
summary:
The once idyllic village of Greenhaven is now a near lifeless husk, the souls of its inhabitants having been drained by the powerful wizard Morg, who has used them to create the abominations that now occupy the mighty keep that was once the source of protection for the village. 
Morg’s evil influence has caused the people of Greenhaven to forget their old lives of happiness and even the presence of Morg himself, instead falling into a mindless stupor. 
With the village’s crops withering untended in the fields and its people heading mindlessly toward oblivion, the one person unaffected by Morg’s influence, a young woman named Xobia, enters the keep to find the source of Morg’s power and put an end to the misery that has been unleashed on the hapless village.

name: Tan-Tan-Tanuki
summary: Tan-Tan-Tanuki is a 2d platformer that I made to make it fun to learn about Yokai and to introduce people to the world of Yokai and Japanese folklore.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Episode Code - Ashes and Diamonds
summary: The 14th installment in the Tantei Jinguji Saburo series, and the first on the PSP. Jinguji meets the Kasumi Sisters, who run a Shinjuku bar.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Innocent Black
summary: The 8th installment of the Tantei Jinguuji Saburo series, and the first to be developed by WorkJam. Jinguuji is asked to search for a missing daughter from the director of a hospital where he had received treatment. This small case gradually expands to revive a deep and complex mystery.

name: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
summary: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon is an open-world RPG full of complex quests in which your decisions matter and your choices are respected. A vast world full of monsters, fallen heroes, and exciting places to discover.

name: Tabletop Fantasy War
summary: Tabletop Fantasy War is a turn-based strategy game where you create and customize your unit groups, deploy them on the battlefield, and command them with strategic actions. Your units are all you have. Every decision matters. Lead them wisely and defeat your opponents!

name: Tavern Talk Stories: Dreamwalker
summary: Welcome Tavernkeep! In this D&D-inspired visual novel you will run a cozy seaside tavern, meet adventurers, gather rumours and mix fate-altering drinks to stop dreams from twisting into nightmares.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Genie
summary: The genie is finally set free, and now the Crown of Command is in his sights! Fly past dangerous lands and use your charms to take followers from your opponents. Use your powers to turn your trophies into either strength or craft, the choice is yours. Purchase this character pack to add the Genie to your character collection.

name: Tamagotchi mix: 20th Anniversary mix ver.
summary: The Tamagotchi mix 20th Anniversary mix version is a commemorative version of the Tamagotchi mix released celebrating Tamagotchi's anniversary. It features access to Professor Banzo's Laboratory, Makkakka Town, Uratama Town, and the Gotchi King's Castle.

name: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho: Aki-basho
summary: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho is a port of Oozumou Tamashii for the Satellaview which had SoundLink support. It is a sumo fighting game, which was accompanied by a live broadcast. The gameplay is divided into two parts; the player does the training in the first half, while real matches begin in the second half. Scores are counted according to the kinds of used techniques. A voice guide is provided by Kiyoko Taniguchi.

name: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho: Natsu-basho
summary: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho is a port of Oozumou Tamashii for the Satellaview which had SoundLink support. It is a sumo fighting game, which was accompanied by a live broadcast. The gameplay is divided into two parts; the player does the training in the first half, while real matches begin in the second half. Scores are counted according to the kinds of used techniques. A voice guide is provided by Kiyoko Taniguchi.

name: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets
summary: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets is an indie Action RPG made as a tribute to the Game Boy Advance era of gaming. A spiritual successor to Save me Mr Tako, play in a world where Octopuses were erased from history.

name: Takeshi no Sengoku Fuuunko
summary:
A Sengoku period board game simulation starring Beat Takeshi.

Takeshi no Sengoku Fuuunko is a board game simulation starring Japanese comedian-turned-actor "Beat" Takeshi Kitano. Similar to the Game of Life, players move around a board earning money and occasionally encountering events such as a minigame - in which the player can increase their wealth should they succeed - or a penalty. The game has a Sengoku era theme running throughout, from its samurai characters to the tattooed gambler that rolls a dice for determining how many places a player can move around the board that turn.

Beat Takeshi appears frequently while the game is being played dressed in traditional Sengoku era clothing. The game is presumably in reference to the TV show Takeshi's Castle, which also starred Beat Takeshi and had a Sengoku era theme.

name: Talent Not Included
summary: Set in the fantasy land of Notthatmuchfurther, Talent Not Included tells the story of three actors, ready for anything, in order to give the performance of their life even if that means facing mechanical soldiers, animals, hardheaded monsters as well as rotating cylinders at their feet. Break a leg, you'll need it !

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Bouen wo Sagase!
Tax Avoiders
summary:
You are John Q and you want to be rich.

In this game, you start out on the income screen where you try to collect the money (dollar signs) while avoiding the governmental red tape (look like red snakes). You have only one year to get your money and invest it. Each second, a day goes by. My, how time flies.

Once a season, you are sent to the investment/tax shelter screen, where you must collect an icon representing an investment and then grab your portfolio (briefcase). Investments have a 50/50 chance of making or losing money. Also on this screen is a character whose color changes.

What color he is determines who he is:
Black=Eggie, the IRS agent. If he catches you, he will audit you. In these audits, you always lose. You are then taxed at 50% of your income and sent back to the income screen.There are no appeals to tax court.
Pink=Waggie, the CPA. If he catches you (or you go to him), he will charge you $1,000.00 but whatever tax sheltered investment you have, he will put you in a better one.
Green=Toodles, the registered investment adviser. If you two meet, he will put you in the best tax sheltered investment available, thus making you the most profit.

After each season, you are taxed to an amount determined by your tax shelter. The object is to have $1,000,000.00 at the end of the year after taxes.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 22: Ai Yue ni
Tapeçaria
summary: A plunderludic experiment that plays with memory and nostalgia and the meaning of moving within and around videogames.

name: Taphouse VR
summary: In Taphouse VR, you are the bartender! Run your own taphouse, give drunk dwarves their fill of delicious ale or drench the bunch by mixing delicious cocktails! Everything around the counter is yours to mess with - including your paying customers.

name: Taxi Life: A City Driving Simulator
summary: Climb into the driver's seat of your car and your business, transport passengers across Barcelona and grow your company! Can you help relieve the transportation challenges of a city that never sleeps?

name: Tavern Master: Pirates Retreat
summary: Embark on the ultimate pirate adventure and transform your tavern into a pirate's paradise. Serve pirate themed drinks, unlock new food recipes and decorate your pirate tavern with completely new decorations! You also get to own your very own pirate ship and manage the crew!

name: Tabletop Game Shop Simulator
summary: Build the ultimate tabletop gaming store! Stock shelves with miniatures, rulebooks, and accessories, or crack open mystery packs to collect your own figures and play against your customers. Set prices, hire staff, host epic game nights, and expand your shop to become the go-to hub for hobbyists.

name: Tales of Meadows
summary: You are Philip, a young warrior who will have to face the difficulties of life in a city destroyed by Tatar-Mongol raids. But the most important problem is the pagans, hiding in the forests and robbing ordinary people. Save people, return greatness to the principality, become a legend!

name: Takeshi and Hiroshi
summary: "Takeshi and Hiroshi" combines the two worlds of puppet animation and Role Playing Game. It tells the story of two brothers and their daily life. The 14-year-old Takeshi, a game designer to-be, is creating a game for his weak little brother Hiroshi who always wants to play the next chapter of the game as soon as possible. As the game is still in the making, Takeshi has to improvise and secretly plays some of the monster roles himself. It is Takeshi's goal to make Hiroshi really enjoy his game, let him meet big challenges, but preferably to prevent him from losing. He has to choose which monsters shall appear when and struggles more and more as the challenge for him as a game creator becomes increasingly difficult.

name: Tactical Battles
summary: Tactical Battle is a turn-based RPG where knights, wizards, dragons, and quirky classes like Father Nature clash in strategic combat. Assemble your team, master unique skills and perks, and prepare for an epic showdown against the Devil boss in a world filled with fantasy and challenge.

name: Tankr
summary:
Tankr is a top-down Arcade developed Mighty Toast, where you can play with or against your friends in dozens of frenzy arena multiplayer battles filled with powerups, bouncing bullets and explosions... You can even design your own battlegrounds! 
Up to four players can play together against the IA in any of the five campaings of increasing difficulty; the game offers over one hundred stages. Players also can take free-for-all battles on local and online games, to know who is the best in a selection of battlegrounds, or being able to design new ones thanks to the built-in Map Editor.

name: Tailgunner
summary: War is in the air. Welcome to the tail turret, where the only things standing between you and a watery grave are your gun and your own rotten luck. Test your skill in wave after wave of arcade-style aerial combat. Choose between survival and glory with 10 different challenge modes. Rack up high scores to become the most notorious gunner of your time. Your comrades say you'll be in the drink before the day is out, but life's a gamble and no one lives forever. Give 'em hell, Ace!

name: Tales of Rebirth
summary: Tales of Rebirth is set in a world where humans (called Huma) and beast people (Gajuma) coexist in relative peace. The world's magical power is called Force, which manifests in various people as control over an element or aspect of the physical laws. In ancient times, after a war sparked when Huma attempted to enslave Gajuma, both races joined forces to found the kingdom of Karegia. An unspecified time before the events of the game, Geyorkias, the ruler of a spirit race called the Sacred Beasts, sought to destroy the Huma as their dark emotions were fueling a primordial destructive force known as Yuris: the other Sacred Beasts put a stop to Geyorkias' plan by sealing him away, then acting to nullify Yuris' threat. The story opens with the death of Karegia's king, Ladras Lindblum, poisoned by the royal adviser Zilva Madigan: during his final moments, he releases his power into the world, causing many humans to become possessed by Force, including Veigue, Annie and Tytree. As the king has failed to name a successor, Karegia enters an interregnum at his death.

name: Tales of Wakana
summary: "Tales of Wakana" is a thrilling action-adventure game like Galaxy Castlevania. Explore a mysterious and challenging world, battling monsters using magical skills. Uncover the true meaning of life, family bonds, and self-knowledge for an enlightening experience.

name: Tails & Talons
summary: Tails & Talons is a roguelite deckbuilder where spell-casting cards and card-matching combos intertwine to create a addicting and strategic experience! Join a colorful cast of furry adventurers, unleash powerful spells, and chain devastating combos as you descend down a mysterious tower..

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack Vol. 2
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode and Great Drum Toy War.

Touhou Project Arrangements Pack Vol. 2 contains these songs: "Bad Apple!! feat.nomico", "Scarlet Police on Ghetto Patrol 24PM", "Cirno's Perfect Math Class 9th Anniversary Version", "Genius Cirno, the Originator!" and "The Die Has Been Cast".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tales of Metal
summary: Tales of Metal is an adventure game focused on exploration and set in a world entirely made of METAL. Explore the frozen plains, discover unique ecosystems, and bring back treasures to the leaders of the city. How far will you go to satisfy your hunger for glory?

name: Tailor Simulator
summary: Build your workshop and turn it into a fashion business. Interact with your customers and design unique collections to sell in your store. Upgrade your workshop until you rule the fashion industry.

name: Tales of Therapy
summary: “Tales of Therapy” is a turn-based combat system rpg game with original soundtracks and character art. It takes place in a storytale created in a therapy session.

name: Talking Tom Jetski
summary:
Talking Tom Jetski is an endless runner game in which players control Talking Tom or Talking Angela as they ride a jetski across water courses filled with obstacles, missions, and challenges. Using swipe-based controls, players steer, jump, and dodge while aiming to achieve high scores and complete objectives.
The game features character selection, mission-based progression, and score competition, alongside colorful visuals.

name: Targ
summary:
Targ is a one or two player shooter game released by Exidy in 1980.

Your town is invaded by Targ riders, you must manouvre the heroic vehicle Whummel to destroy them. From time to time, a Spectar comes into screen, and can be destroyed for extra bonus.

Action takes place into a 9x9 grid, "Crystal City", where the player's vehicle must avoid and chase down 10 enemy wedge-shaped vehicles. When all enemies are destroyed, you are awarded an extra bonus and can access the following level. Two players can alternate in the game. You use a 4 way joystick to control the Whummel, and a pushbutton to fire at enemies. Progressing in the gameplay causes the Targs to become faster and smarter, for a fast and furious gameplay.

A small trivia on the game and characters name: apparently, Targ stands for Target, Spectar stands for Special Target.

This game has a sequel, always released in 1980, Spectar.

name: Taiwan Love Story⁵
summary: "Taiwan Love Story ⁵" is a romantic interactive novel. To write a thesis on love, you meet girls from different parts of Taiwan. As you conduct your academic research, you gradually become captivated by them, leading to a series of sweet, bittersweet, and complex romantic encounters.

name: Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories
summary: In Tactical Squad you take command of an elite special forces unit. Issue orders to your SWAT team, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your mission successfully. Follow your specialists into a number of high-risk operations that will test your tactical abilities.

name: Tales of Middle Earth
summary: Tales of Middle Earth (previously known as Troubles of Middle Earth and commonly abreviated as ToME 2), is a single player roguelike computer game created in 1998 by Nicolas Casalini (at the time known by his username DarkGod). ToME 2 is an Angband variant, originally based on the ZAngband 2.2.9a source code, which now differs greatly from it. The game was also used as a base for many derivative games known as modules. Popular modules include FuryMod, Theme, and Annals of Ea.

name: Tank War Shooting Simulator
summary: Experience the excitement of tank wars with the Tank War Shooting Simulator! Feel like a tank driver with realistic graphics and various game modes.

name: Tailypo
summary: Tailypo is a horror visual novel about a creature from Appalachian folklore.

name: Tasty Planet Forever
summary: This is the biggest Tasty Planet game ever. There are hundreds of different entities to eat and well over 150 levels. The scale of some of the levels is enormous; in one level you'll grow all the way from the size of a subatomic particle to the size of the universe.

name: Tactical Annihilation
summary: Experience turn-based strategy with free-form base building, multi-unit control, colossal units, and powerful battle skills. It captures the depth of an RTS in turn-based form, like Advanced Wars with massive super units!

name: Tank Warfare: Longstop Hill
summary: The battle of Longstop Hill during the Tunisian campaign in 1943. British 78th Battleaxe Division supported by the Churchill tanks of the North Irish Horse regiment is trying to break through the German 5th Panzer Army defenses.

name: Tales' Epic Gang
summary: Tales' Epic Gang is a 2D Sonic the Hedgehog Fan Game with cartoony graphics and wacky characters.

name: Tankiro
summary: Tankiro is a Souls-like action game with a heavy focus on parrying. Play as a tank and battle alien forces on the ground and in space to defend Earth.

name: Tattoo Studio Simulator
summary: Build Your Own Tattoo Studio

name: Tape 101
summary: A psychological horror descending through liminal spaces shaped by the Kübler-Ross model - the five stages of grief: denial, anger, bargaining, depression, and acceptance - where your perception and an RC car are the only tools to grasp what’s real

name: TapTapBadger
summary:
Be a Hero! use the unique powers of your fingers to tap away the mean badgers and save the world from the evil psy-Badgerinator!
Grow precise reflexes and powerful concentration skills like no others and prove it to all on the leaderboards.

name: Tansaki Katamichi no Uchuu Tansaku
summary: A probe, which can only move forward in a straight line, drifts through space until it ends. Semi-idle-exploration adventure

name: Taoist Survivor
summary: In ancient times, "Yaoshan," a mountain in the East, promised immortality through its legendary peaches, lingzhi mushrooms, and the trials of thunder. Many Taoists ventured there, but perilous beasts roamed the slopes. Can you survive "Yaoshan" and attain immortality?

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - One Piece Anime Songs Pack
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

ONE PIECE Anime Songs Pack contains 5 songs: "We Are!", "OVER THE TOP", "One day", "KOKORO NO CHIZU" and "BRAND NEW WORLD".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Tarot
summary: Fortune-telling interactive software that predicts the player's fate with a virtual deck of tarot cards. It was developed and published by Scorpion Soft for the Famicom Disk System in Japan only.

name: Taco Fiction
summary: You are in your car, with a gun in your pocket, going back and forth with yourself about whether you should get moving immediately, or take some time to think about your situation. Some of the wording, and the fact that the game is subtitled "an interactive heist", make it not unreasonable to infer that you are gearing up for a robbery. A piece of interactive fiction written by Ryan Veeder.

name: Tanita: Plasticine Dream
summary: Entertaining story to take part in using crazy machines to interesting puzzles.

name: Talesshop Puzzle: Jugeobeorin Byeorui Neokduri Deussi
summary: add puzzle and OST include

name: Tales of Maj'Eyal: Embers of Rage
summary:
One year has passed since the one the Orcs call the "Scourge from the West" came and single-handedly crushed the Orc Prides of Grushnak, Vor, Gorbat, and Rak'Shor. The Allied Kingdoms, now linked by farportal to their distant, long-lost Sunwall allies, have helped them conquer most of Var'Eyal. The few remnants of the ravaged Prides are caged... but one Pride remains. Kruk Pride, isolated on an island, is the last orcish settlement that stands; they, too, face their impending doom.

The Sunwall has blockaded the only exit point from the island, and now, the technologically advanced civilization of Steam Giants have come down from the mountains to take their homeland with machines and weaponry unlike anything else on Eyal. Kruk Pride has reverse-engineered their technology before; their only hope is to do it again and rise up against the Pride's foes.

name: Tales of Vesperia
summary:
The Japan-exclusive PlayStation 3 version of Tales of Vesperia features full-voice acting, nearly doubling the size of the script of the original Xbox 360 version. New songs, towns, and dungeons have been added. Other major changes include new quests, bosses, skits, and story elements. New gameplay additions are introduced, such as higher Overlimit levels, more artes, mystic artes, equipment, and character costumes.

Flynn becomes a permanent party member later in the story, and Patty Fleur, an entirely new character, also joins the party as a playable member. Other side characters are also added, such as characters from the prequel anime film "Tales of Vesperia: The First Strike."

name: Tank Mechanic Simulator: Shermans DLC
summary:
Dear mechanics! Get ready for an exciting new DLC that adds 5 new USA tanks from World War II to the base game. We are continuing our goals that we set to ourselves on improving the quality of workmanship.

The DLC includes iconic tanks such as the M4A1 Sherman (Early production), M4 Sherman (Mid production), M4A2 Sherman (Late production), M4A3E2 Sherman Jumbo, and T34 Calliope. These tanks come equipped with new engines, including the Wright Continental R-975-C1, General Motors 6046, and Ford GAA, adding to the authenticity and realism of the game. Additionally, the DLC introduces a new gearbox, the Spicer Synchro Mesh Gearbox, which can be used for all these tanks. Each of the vehicles has been painstakingly recreated on the basis of the collected technical documentation. The interiors have been nicely detailed with radios, dashboards and more removable parts.

Prepare to immerse yourself in the excitement of United States Army's World War II tanks with these new additions to Tank Mechanic Simulator. Whether you're a history buff or just love the thrill of renovating powerful tanks, this DLC is not to be missed.
▶ M4A1 Sherman (Early production)
The M4A1 Sherman (Early production) was a crucial tank used by the United States during World War II. It was a medium-sized tank that was highly versatile and adaptable to different terrains and combat situations. It had a crew of five and was equipped with a 75mm main gun, as well as a .50 caliber machine gun and two .30 caliber machine guns. Its armor was thick enough to withstand small arms fire and shrapnel.

▶ M4 Sherman (Mid production)
An iconic tank from World War II that played a crucial role in the United States' military campaigns. This medium-sized tank was equipped with a 75mm main gun and two .30 caliber machine guns, making it a formidable opponent on the battlefield. Its thick armor and mobility allowed it to traverse various terrains and combat situations with ease. The M4 Sherman (Mid production) was widely used throughout the war and was praised for its reliability and versatility.

▶ M4A2 Sherman (Late production)
A powerful tank used by the United States during World War II. Equipped with a 75mm main gun and two .30 caliber machine guns, this tank was designed for combat and proved to be a formidable opponent on the battlefield. Its improved diesel engine and thicker armor provided superior mobility and protection, allowing it to traverse various terrains and withstand enemy fire. The M4A2 Sherman (Late production) saw action in many significant battles and was highly praised for its performance and durability.

▶ M4A3E2 Sherman Jumbo
A heavy tank used by the United States during World War II. This tank was designed to provide additional protection for its crew with its thick armor and improved gun mantlet. It was equipped with a 75mm main gun. “Cobra King” was the first tank to enter the Bastogne perimeter in relief of the besieged American 101st Airborne Division.

▶ T34 Calliope
Introducing the Calliope, an American rocket launcher tank used during World War II. This unique tank was equipped with a barrage of 4.5 inch rockets mounted on its turret, allowing it to rain down explosive firepower on enemy positions. The T34 Calliope proved to be a devastating force on the battlefield, capable of quickly neutralizing enemy defenses and providing vital support for ground troops.

▶ Second Supply “Shermans” DLC includes 5 vehicles:
M4A1 Sherman (Early production)
M4 Sherman (Mid production)
M4A2 Sherman (Late production)
M4A3E2 Jumbo
T34 Calliope
▶ New engines:
Wright Continental R-975-C1 (Early, Mid, Calliope)
General Motors 6046 (Late)
Ford GAA (Jumbo)
▶ New gearboxes:
Spicer Synchro Mesh Gearbox
▶ Additionally each vehicle contains packs of new museum stands, posters, ammunition and achievements.
16 posters
5 museum stands
5 achievements (for each DLC tank)
Special decal "Cobra King" for Jumbo
▶ Tank ammunition:
AP - 75mm M72 (Early, Mid, Late, Jumbo)
HE - 75mm M48 (Early, Mid, Late, Jumbo)
AP - 114mm M8 (Calliope)

name: Tameshi
summary: Tameshi is a retro-themed vertical scrolling shoot 'em up for 1 or 2 players (local co-op). Battle through 7 stages of relentless waves of enemies all bent on your destruction. Destroy them first before taking on the end of stage boss.

name: Tail Trail
summary: Follow the story of a Private investigator hired to find a missing person on a mysterious island.

name: Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together
summary: Tactics Ogre is a 3D isometric tactical role-playing game. The player starts out with a band of troops, builds a small army and fights many battles with choices to make in between, that will determine which one of the eight possible endings will be reached in a non-linear storyline. The player has the option to recruit characters, control individual equipment of each character, with over six male character classes, six female character classes, three demi-human classes, and more. It is also possible to train at safe locations to prepare the army before the next battle or storyline advancement.

name: Tales of Arise: Beyond the Dawn
summary: The new expansion pack taking place a year after the war between Dahna and Rena.

name: Tactics Ogre: The Knight of Lodis
summary:
"Highlights and Key Features:
- Over 40 hours of gameplay and multiple endings!
- Discover powerful character classes with the new Emblem System!
- Cast a wide assortment of magic spells to defeat the enemy!
- Go head-to-head against a friend by using the Game Boy® Advance Game Link® cable!
- All new Quest Mode enables you to discover hidden items and weapons not available in the main game.
- Utilize the Exchange Mode to trade items, spell books and characters with a friend.
- Save up to 3 games!"

name: Tam Tam Paradise
summary:
An angel from heaven has been sent by God to help troubled souls on Earth. As a cherub in training, you dole out good deeds by way of slapping a percussion "instrument" in time to a stream of angel wings which descend on screen. Your archenemy in this exercise of rhythm aptitude rests in the dark and pointy tailed persona of a bat-winged demon girl. Musical flavor from around the world, represented by instruments from particular countries, provide the lullabyes and strident interludes to play the game to.

Two percussion controllers are included with each copy of Tam Tam. Players beat on the circular piece as well as the crescent shaped portion of the controller to the angel wing cues on screen.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Witch Hunter
summary: Purchase this character pack to add the Witch Hunter to your character collection. He is then available to choose in all game modes. Please note that this character is not included in the Talisman: Digital Edition Season Pass.

name: Tatsu
summary: Japanese legend tells of a great battle between two mighty Dragon Lord armies, locked in combat on the peaks of Mount Hotaka, competing to win the hand of the Princess Kushinada, the last and most beautiful of eight sisters. A battle so ferocious, that the villagers fearing for their lives, acquire the help of a powerful Wizard, who casts a spell over the Dragon Lords to keep them imprisoned in a circle of combat and to be freed only at the battle's end. Their struggle continues to this very day, even though the Princess and their fateful story have long passed into legend.

name: Tavern Guardians: Banquet
summary: Welcome to Tavern Guardians, a strategic match three RPG! Every action you take will determine your success against countless monsters and magical creatures. Take up arms as a heroic guardian and claim victory against evil!

name: Tabula
summary: A mind-bending, level-based puzzler about overlapping computer windows to create traversable, top-down landscapes. Delve into the heart of an unusual operating system, one folder at a time!

name: Table Tennis Touch
summary:
Table Tennis for iOS and Android with Career mode and cross-platform Multiplayer. 
 
Serve, spin and smash your way to ping pong glory! Stunning graphics, intuitive swipe controls, high speed gameplay and multiple game modes.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 5
summary: Play over 20 games for all areas of the maths curriculum targeted towards ages 10-11.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - The City
summary: Discover the City Region, one of the four Kingdoms surrounding the land of Talisman. This expansion adds a new board piece to the main Talisman board, taking you into the bustling City filled with shops, Strangers, Merchants and more. For the traveller with some gold to spend, a trip to the City can give them the edge to survive.

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
summary: This pack contains the items included in the Deluxe Edition.

name: Taisen Panic Bomber +
summary: Updated version of Taisen Panic Bomber.

name: Take Down
summary:
Take Down is a tag-team wrestling game in which one or two players assemble their two-man powerhouse from a line-up of 8 wrestlers: Mr. Cool, Sgt. Slam, Tomahawk, Iron Head, Viking, Sea Dawg, Sultan, Ninja. Each wrestler has a short audio intro when selected. Selecting two of them, players start the fight.

The gameplay is flown on a static ring without a referee. Both of the tag partners are starting the action on the same side of the ring. Every wrestler has a few standard moves, including a punch, tag out, jump from the turnbuckle and flying body press off the ropes. In addition, each has a set of four signature moves (action plus direction), ranging from a basic hip-toss to a devastating airplane spin. Once player gets the other guy in a bad way, he leaps on top to try to collect the pinfall. The winning squad is treated to a little victory dance in the ring, specially embossed belts, and a victory in the game's record books. The losers are similarly given a tally in the loss column, however this doesn't affect their abilities.

name: Tankrovia
summary: Tankrovia is a Top Down Twin Stick Battle Arena with... Tanks! Play as one of the somewhat unique pilots with unique abilities. Explode your opponents in Free-for-All or Teams matches! It all comes to having opposing thumbs and being the best at using them!

name: Tales of the World: Reve Unitia
summary: A tactics RPG for the Nintendo 3DS. Lloyd from Tales of Symphonia, Asbel from Tales of Graces f, Meredy from Tales of Eternia, Jade from Tales of the Abyss, Natalia also from Tales of the Abyss, and Yuri from Tales of Vesperia will make appearances in the game.

name: Tales of Bloomrise
summary: Step into the shoes of Rayy, a young adventurer living in the peaceful village of Bloomrise. What starts as a simple search for excitement soon turns into a grand journey as ancient secrets and dangerous dungeons emerge beneath the village’s calm surface.

name: Taoist Priest Yan
summary: Taoist Priest Yan is a 3D RPG game. Players will play a famous Exorcist. There are many tombs in this forest. Darkness gives birth to many demons and ghosts. They haunt at night, lure and kill pedestrians and eat their blood and body. Yan Chixia heard about it and came here to destroy them.

name: Tales of Spark
summary: "Tales of Spark" is a Hack & Slash Action RPG with an Eastern flair. Players assume the role of a young wandering swordsman, exploring the vast desert, seeking treasures, defeating powerful bosses, and even slaying gigantic celestial dragons.

name: Talking Cactus
summary: Talking Cactus is a fun and interactive mobile game where a lively cactus repeats what you say in a funny voice, dances to music, and reacts to your touch with hilarious animations. Perfect for kids and families, it combines laughter, music, and playful surprises in one adorable app!

name: Tale of six
summary: Tale of six is a 2D platformer about adventures in space. To progress, you have to choose from one to six, but you don't know which choice will take you to the right place.

name: Taipei Midsummer Night's Dream
summary: You will play as a young tourist from mainland China, and meet five female characters with different styles in a city that is both prosperous and quiet. Every choice is the key to a different ending - is it a sweet romance, or an emotional test full of twists and turns?

name: Tale of Exorcists
summary: Lac Viet Adventures: Tales of Exorcist is a fictitious Vietnam world, during Ly Dynasty with the infestation of vicious demon monsters. Play as a skilled exorcist against chaotic evil to fight your way through the brutal world, and experience unforeseen entanglements of complex beings.

name: Tangerine Nightmare
summary: Tangerine Nightmare is a collection of 8 (+1 credit-map and a bonus one) limit-removing maps. They were designed by the french doom community, with all new textures/GFX/flats made by franckFRAG.

name: Table Top Racing: World Tour - Nitro Edition
summary: Get behind the wheel of 16 ultra-cool, miniaturised racing cars and engage in combat-racing like no other. Master over 30 table-top race tracks and over 180 events in a bid for glory, then take the battle Online and compete with the best in the world.

name: Tatari: The Arrival
summary: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

name: Tap Tap Evil Mastermind
summary:
After becoming a filthy rich tap tap trillionaire, life got boring. What else is there to do? Build an evil empire and go on a quest for world domination – duh!

In this dangerously fun, evil idle clicker game, you work for the secret organization – The League of Evil. Starting with a small dungeon and just a few henchmen, you must use those infamous fingers to tap your way to power and riches!

Hire & train your minions, fight rival villains, trade on the black market and upgrade your base to become the sweetest evil HQ the world has ever seen!

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Satyr
summary: The Satyr is ready to get the party started, even if nobody else is! Race your way to the Crown of Command, using every trick and shortcut you can think of.

name: Tales of Wind
summary:
Welcome, the chosen one,
La Place, the city blessed by divines is under shadow of evils nowadays.
We need your power to find the truth behind and bring the light back again.

name: Take Care (of Me)
summary: My name is Lorena. I don't know where I am or how I got here. I just woke up in a bathroom, locked in, but I will escape this place and figure out what's happening.

name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode 1 - Zer0 Sum
summary: A new episodic adventure set in the badlands of Pandora. This collaborative brain child, is set after the events of Borderlands 2 and is a part of the franchise' official lore.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 14: Takusareta Yubiwa
Tavern Owner Simulator
summary: Design. Serve. Expand. Become the ultimate tavern owner.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Rensa Suru Noroi & Nazono-Jikenbo
Tank Frenzy Survivor
summary: Jump into the cockpit of a powerful tank in this rogue-like survival game! Blast through waves of alien invaders and enemy troops, upgrade your firepower, and survive as long as you can in a relentless 2D showdown. Will your tank crush the opposition or fall to the alien onslaught?

name: Tanks Racing Sim
summary: Tanks Racing Sim flips the script on traditional racing games by bringing the raw power of military tanks to the high-speed world of Formula 1.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Quito no Yoru
Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Cross Generation of Heroes
summary:
In this game, players engage in combat with a team of 2 characters or with a single giant character and attempt to knock out their opponents. It is the 7th Capcom-designed installment in their Vs. fighting game series, which includes the Marvel vs. Capcom and Capcom vs. SNK series, and the first to be fully rendered in 3D graphics. The game is set in a 2.5D environment; characters fight in a two-dimensional arena, but character models and backgrounds are rendered in three-dimensional graphics. The game is designed around a simplified three-button attack system, which was inspired by the simplistic control schemes commonly used by both the Vs. series and the Wii.

This is an expanded port of the original Arcade game (that use Wii-based hardware) of the same name and was released only in Japan 2 years prior to the international updated version "Ultimate All-Stars". This port adds some new characters, including Viewtiful Joe.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo DS: Fuserareta Shinjitsu
Tales of Destiny: Director's Cut
summary: The updated release of the Tales of Destiny remake from 2006. It includes a new "Leon's Side" mode where players take control of Leon Magnus and see events of the story from his perspective.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: V Version
summary: Rhythm game Taiko Drum Master makes its first appearance on the PlayStation Vita, featuring songs from anime, J-pop, vocaloids, New Japan Pro Wrestling and other games on the platform.

name: Tales of Arise
summary:
On the planet Dahna, reverence has always been given to Rena--the planet in the sky--as a land of the righteous and divine. Stories handed down for generations became truth and masked reality for the people of Dahna. For 300 years, Rena has ruled over Dahna, pillaging the planet of its resources and stripping people of their dignity and freedom.

Our tale begins with two people, born on different worlds, each looking to change their fate and create a new future. Featuring a diverse cast of characters, intuitive and rewarding combat system, and a captivating story set in a lush world worth fighting for, Tales of Arise delivers a first-class JRPG experience.

name: TankOre Mining
summary: Descend into the depths of a perilous underground world with your mining tank! Mine rare ores, evade deadly traps, and upgrade your tank to withstand the dangers below in this action-packed mining adventure.

name: Tales of Maj'Eyal: Forbidden Cults
summary: Forbidden Cults is a big expansion for Tales of Maj'Eyal to let you explore the horrors that lurk beneath the surface, to delve in long lost knowledge and lore and as usual to die a lot!

name: Taisho x Alice Episode 1
summary: PC version of this game was released in four parts, three episodes and an epilogue.

name: Tales of the Withered
summary: You are a nameless, voiceless girl, with no memory, who appears in a dying hamlet, just in time to try and save the last few inhabitants - if you choose. Grow, cook, brew, explore, trade and choose between humanity's fragile hope or nature's fierce wrath in this low-fantasy, first-person adventure.

name: Tales of Aradia: Idle RPG
summary: Tales of Aradia is an enchanting idle RPG that blends active and offline progression in a vibrant pixel-art world—harvest magical resources, master diverse skills, craft epic gear, and face mythical creatures as you uncover the secrets of a realm on the brink of darkness.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Hatsune Miku Pack Vol. 3
summary:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

HATSUNE MIKU Pack Vol. 3 contains 3 songs: "melt", "World is Mine" and "BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER".

The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.

name: Talisman
summary: Roguelike puzzle game where you draw mystical stones to hit target scores across 100 trials. Match suits for multipliers up to ×20. Form spreads for bonuses. Avoid biome penalties. Three strikes ends your run. Boss trials cut your draws from 4 to 3.

name: Tactic Legends
summary: Tactic Legends is a free-to-play, player-vs-player turn-based strategy game for mobile, inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Tactics Ogre. Characters and environmental objects are 2D, while the game maps are in a 3D rotatable space.

name: Targeted: -10 Days
summary: Can you survive 10 days in this anomaly-finding game? Stay vigilant, because YOU ARE THE TARGET!

name: Tahira: Echoes of the Astral Empire
summary:
