name: Tap Bingo
summary: BINGO game with your family during family nights, or with your friends or co-workers during a party setting. Spend the whole afternoon with your buddies, or even by yourself while competing with virtual players and earn virtual coins!

name: Tawako The Forest Hedgehog
summary: Help Tawako to go through the forest and collect fruits in this Arkanoid-like game.

name: Tail-Tale
summary: Tail-Tale is a built-in game of the GP2X Wiz portable console.

name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 2
summary: A sequel to Tantei Opera Milky Holmes.

name: Tanks Boom Boom
summary: Set aside! The Mega-Tank is coming, destroying everything in front of him. Our advice is to join the tank cabin,using all it’s skills like : speed booster,time warp,money booster,otherwise you risk being eaten alive. Convince yourself right now that either you win or you are bound to lose.

name: Take Off Mask
summary: is a strategic action RPG where you can enjoy dozens of unit battles. Exploration and combat can reveal the secrets of the mysterious world, find hidden colleagues, and challenge the wider area. challenge the Devil of the North with the best combat power.

name: Tank Wars: Anniversary Edition
summary: In Tank Wars: Anniversary Edition, a player has to control a (stationary) artillery tank in order to take down opponents with ballistic shots from a selection of different weapons. We paired old school, pixelated, low-resolution 2D graphics with some modern-ish concepts and effects.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Fukushuu no Rinbu
Takepoint.io
summary: Takepoint.io is a tactical, objective-based shooter. Capture and defend points from other teams, unlock weapons, upgrades and perks.

name: Tank Trax
summary: A strategy game that is very similar to Scorched Earth.

name: Tabletop Warriors
summary: Tabletop Warriors is an immersive, social VR experience in the tradition of a tabletop dungeon crawling adventure. Players transform into figurines on the table solving quests under the ever watchful eye of the game master.

name: Take the Throne
summary: Take the Throne is a new Massive Multiplayer Online Battle Royale game with up to 30 players in a free-for-all bloody fight to be crowned and take the throne! Take the Throne is built on PvP encounters and is filled with comedic physics-based gameplay.

name: Tanks Furry
summary:
Join the team to play alone or in co-operation with a friend. Dare to fight friends in multiplayer mode. Fight for freedom! Let them feel the taste of our fuury!

Over 40 missions across desert, wood and city jungle themed tilesets with 5 different enemy types.

name: Tank Assault
summary: Tank Assault is a cancelled third person shooter that was in development by Wicked Witch Software, planned to be released on Nintendo DS.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Deck Quest
summary: Deck Quest is an open-ended tabletop RPG condensed into four decks! Made up of 335 unique Items, Roles, Adversaries, and Locations, Deck Quest is a new and innovative take on the classic tabletop RPG.

name: Tap Tap: Dave Mathnews Band Revenge
summary: Dave Matthews Band Revenge is a game in the Tap Tap Revenge franchise featuring Dave Matthews Band songs.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Euphoria - Build a Better Dystopia
summary: A dystopian cityscape awaits your leadership as you make strategic choices to construct markets, enhance allegiances, and expand control in this thematic dice worker-placement game.

name: Tactical Armor Custom Gasaraki
summary:
Tactical Armor Custom Gasaraki is a game based on the anime Gasaraki. Gasaraki is a mecha anime television series produced by Sunrise. It was written by Ryousuke Takahashi, who also created the series with Sunrise and shared directorial duties with Goro Taniguchi.

The series is marked by an exceptionally detailed and convincing treatment of mecha design and operation, albeit within the context of the alternate reality of the story. Set in the near-future (at the time of release), a little-understood form of matter known as "Mile One" allows a powerful and influential Japanese family, the Gowa, to produce a bipedal weapon which they refer to as a Tactical Armor (TA).

At this time a war breaks out between the US and the fictional Middle East country of Belgistan, much like the Gulf War. When US military forces attempt to seize the capital they are systematically wiped out by what appear to be rival TAs. The Gowa Family seizes this opportunity to demonstrate their weapon system, and civilian pilot Yuushiro Gowa and the military squad to which he is attached are deployed to Belgistan. There, he meets rival TA pilot Miharu, with whom he seems to share a deep spiritual bond.

In the game the player can choose 3 different members of the team to make the assault group for each mission, and he can choose also what mecha and what weapon each member will use. The gameplay is about moving the mechas in the missing area and defeat the enemies that are around there. Some missions got a time limit.

name: Tassilo's Quest
summary: Tassilo's Quest is a 2D platformer developed by Tassilo59 and co-developed by Daxternator_2117. Inspired by classic platformers such as Mario and Sonic, Tassilo's Quest involves you running, swimming (and sometimes flying) through various locales, collecting crystals based of the 7 magical powers, and taking the fight to King Tutti Frutti's Moon Base to stop him once and for all and save the land.

name: Tales of Hearts R: Link Edition
Tales from the Road
summary: A SFW furry interactive fiction game

name: TaliVan
summary: Gear up for an adrenaline-fueled adventure in a mesmerizing fictional desert like no other! Take control of an awe-inspiring super car in this exhilarating car game and buckle up for an exhilarating journey through treacherous terrains.

name: TaptapTaptapTaptapTap
summary: An experimental 1-button game by Dejobaan Games.

name: Taito LD Game Collection
summary: A collection of Taito's LaserDisc games: Time Gal, Uchuu Senkan Yamato (Space Battleship Yamato), and Revenge of the Ninja for Nintendo Switch.

name: Taima Toushin Hachikuma Tok
summary: Taima Toushin Hachikuma ToK is a role-playing game for Windows, released on 2004. The game has various versions or names, we can play the final version from dlsite. It includes parodies of several games and animes.

summary: Sixth Taiko no Tatsujin game released on PlayStation 2. Sudden Death and speed modifiers were added.

name: Tap Tap Movie
summary: A clicker style game for Android.

name: Tappy Word Infinite
summary: The easy way to boost your English vocabulary skills!

name: Talismania Deluxe
summary: Help King Midas rescue his daughter and break his golden curse! Twist and connect talismans to collect coins and defeat mythical monsters... and restore ancient Greece along the way. Think you can win this magical puzzler?

name: Tap the Ball DX
summary:
Tap The Ball DX have one simple goal - tap the ball. Use your finger tap on the ball as fast as you can. One finger of two fingers. Ready to challenge? Download an play now.
+ Unlock all the balls if you can. Basket Ball ,Soccer,Volleyball, Football, Tennis, Baseball, Golf, Pingpong, etc

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Go! Go! Godaime
summary: Taiko no Tatsujin: Go! Go! Godaime is the fifth installment of the Taiko no Tatsujin series for PlayStation 2. This version introduces Go-Go Mode, Yam note and Invisible modifier.

name: Tactic Boxing
summary: Tactic Boxing is a hardcore boxing simulator with ragdoll physics and a career mode.

name: Tales Up
summary:
Tales Up is a cooperative role-playing game, a blend of board game and interactive stories such as “choose your own adventure” books.

You’ll find zombies, pirates, vikings… Hijinks and surprises will ensue!

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryosuke Jiken Tan: The Masquerade Lullaby
Tank Defense Division
summary: Tank Defense Division is an arcade-like strategy game. In which players battle foreign tanks to test their own mettle. The game coming with both a single player campaign and coop. Along with a diverse selection of Levels, Enemies, and Game modes to Explore, Battle, Build upon, and Share.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Rise of Tribes
summary: In Rise of Tribes, players control a tribal faction in prehistoric times looking to GROW, MOVE, GATHER, and LEAD their people. The board is modular, composed of hexes in various terrain types.

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour 4
summary: Incredibly appetising dishes for every taste! From juicy and colourful fruits to flavourful grilled steaks. And for dessert we will offer sweet culinary masterpieces and, of course, unusual soft drinks and tart coffee without limit!

name: Takenoko: Chibis
summary: The gardeners are getting ready to receive a new panda in the bamboo gardens. But not just any panda: Miss Panda! Spring has arrived and the family is about to grow; gardening has never been so challenging...

name: Tap Tap Arcade
summary: Tap Tap Arcade packages together two RCMADIAX games in one release.

name: Tap Tap: Lady Gaga Revenge Edition
summary: Lady Gaga Revenge is a game in the Tap Tap franchise featuring Lady Gaga songs.

name: Table Tennis
summary: A bootleg version of table tennis for the NES.

name: Tank Legend Online: League of Tanks
summary:
Experience epic battles in the world’s first Tank Moblie MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena). Form alliances and fight together in 1 vs. 1 or 2 vs. 2 combat.
Hone your skills as you battle.

name: Target Hits
summary: A light gun game in which the player shoots moving targets before time runs out. The game includes three modes: Shooting Range, Desert Chariots, and Track Wagons.

name: TamaOtchi
summary: TamaOtch is a limited edition Tamagotchi named after the Japanese actress Tamao Nakamura. It was released in Japan in April 1998.

name: Tabletopia: Tapestry
summary: Tapestry is a two-hour civilization game for 1-5 players designed by Jamey Stegmaier.

name: Tankman
summary: Tankman is a top-view TDS arena shooter where the player acts as a fearless tankman.

name: Table Tennis Toon!
summary: Table Tennis Toon is a fast-paced table tennis game. Aim with complete freedom and fire the ball with five different types of shot! Choose your character and play solo or against your friends in thrilling and adrenalinic matches. Prevail and conquer the title of "Ping Pong Master"!

name: Tavern of Spear
summary:
You play as "Eyvind"， a young wolf warrior from The Lost Spear Tribe who has come of age.

Following a tribal tradition, Eyvind leaves home and sets out on a journey.

You are the young adventurer from the Lost Spear Tribe who’s come of age and ready to prove himself as an adventurer.

But adventure leads you to a strange tavern tucked in a foggy forest.

Despite the threat outside, the beer is great, and the company is fun to be with.

Inspired by Fallout 1/2. DND, Teraurge, Ruina and Corruption of Champion.

name: Takishawa is Dead
summary:
A dangerous criminal called Takishawa is on the loose, and a reward has
been offered for his capture. In an odd world full of characters who have
televisions for heads, you set out to find Takishawa, dodging traps and navigating difficult platforming sections along the way.

name: Tales from Hazelwood Post
summary: When your grandmother falls ill, you return to Hazelwood and unwittingly take over as the new Post Master at the small, dusty post office on the square. The only problem, this town has no street names or addresses. In this cosy puzzle game, solve puzzles, deliver the mail, and reconnect the town.

name: Taco Cat Jump Game
summary:
"Taco Cat" is a platform jumper designed for the casual gamer. 
Intended for all ages.

name: Tactical Zone
summary: Welcome to the Tactical Zone world! This thrilling third-person shooter will give you adrenaline and unforgettable moments of battle on the battlefield. Enter the battlefield and take on the challenge of team play, where your cohesion and tactical skills will be the key to victory.

name: Tap Tap Fish: Abyssrium Pole
summary:
The sequel to the hit indie “Tap Tap Fish -- Abyssrium”, this game brings the same lovably gameplay to a new, arctic world. Easy to start and simple to play, you can build your own polar aquarium with just a quick tap!

Set on a lonely iceberg in the arctic sea, this game allows you to experience the peaceful calm of the arctic ocean. Polar bears, arctic foxes, sea lions and more adorable animals await you on land, while hundreds of deep sea fish are discoverable in the deep sea. Each animal is carefully designed by our artists in a beautiful low poly style that we’re sure you’ll love.

name: Tap Tap Arcade 2
summary: Another compilation of RCMADIAX games, this time with an exclusive game, Volcano, bundled within.

name: TankTrouble
summary:
TankTrouble is the revamped online multiplayer of the iconic flash game, TankTrouble Classic.
In TankTrouble, you drive in a maze and shoot with a variety of wall-bouncing projectiles and attempt to be the last one standing!

You may play in local mode, where you can face off on your computer youself against two frends, or battle the fierce AI dog, Laika.
Alternatively, you can hop onto an online multiplayer server, and wreak cross-country havoc!

name: Tactical Nexus: Chapter 5 - Tactical Night
summary: Highest difficulty in the first half! A high-difficulty stage where puzzles and powerful enemies are mixed up! Chapter-5 (Recommended possession number of Sunstone: 100 or more)

name: Tales of Fandom Vol. 2: Tear Version
Tankura: Tango Crush - Kotoba Keshi Tango Puzzle Game
Tarragona 6: Algernon's Lab
summary: This level is related with the previous episodes of the Tarragona: World Heritage (TWH). Before finding the exit, she must walk through the laboratories, maintenance tunnels and office sections of the secret base.

name: Tap Tap Revenge: NIN Edition
summary: Tap Tap Revenge for the iPhone/iPod Touch, with various songs by the Nine Inch Nails.

name: Tabletopia: Sellswords + Olympus
summary: Sellswords is a tile-placement game for two players in which heroes gather for the battle of a lifetime. Take to the field of battle in this intense head-to-head contest of wits and strategy!

name: Tabletop Simulator: Superfight
summary: Superfight is a hilarious card game based on fights between characters with superpowers and super problems.

name: Tarmac Legends
summary: After an intense race with a stranger turns fatal, driver Aaron Mitchell is put in prison for 25 years for a murder he didn't commit. When the police find new evidence for the real suspect, Mitchell is promised parole if he works undercover for the S.R.A and catches the true killer.

name: Tamagotchi iD
summary: Tamagotchi iD is the second release in the Tamagotchi color series, released in Japan in 2009. The Tamagotchi iD is the first Tamagotchi to have downloadable items, accessories, wallpapers, and games via infrared from its own download site, and later a designated home station. There were also new destinations, guest characters, and features such as the ability to wear accessories.

name: Tainted
summary:
In your tainted land, an unfathomable cosmic horror takes root. Monstrous abominations sow chaos and despair, while the Rune of Power, pulsating with forbidden energies, is stolen. To restore harmony and repel doom, you must drive back the eldritch creatures and reclaim the Rune of Power...

answering reverse trivia questions in trademark Jeopardy! fashion-- i.e., the host provides the answer and a player has to provide the questions. As many of 4 human players can participate, with the remaining slots filled by the computer. Competition takes place in quarter-final, semi-final, and final round modes.

A player will select a question from one of 6 categories. The game gives the answer to the question and the players use their controllers to buzz in. At that point, a player has 80 seconds to spell out the question (and the computer has already provided the "What is..." question preamble). name: Tatsujin
summary: Tatsujin is a vertical shooter by Taito and conversion of Toaplan arcade game originally released in 1988. The evil Gidans are about to invade the Borogo system, their armada of giant asteroids are approaching and they have to be stopped. The player must infiltrate and destroy no less than five large enemy facilities and take down swarms of alien ships and all kind of ground units. The space fighter comes equipped with a default Vulcan gun (Power shots) and two more weapons are available for the taking - the blue lock-on lasers (Thunder Laser) and green blasts of energy (Tatsujin Beam). The only way to increase the active weapon's firepower is to collect Power Boosters special flying pods leave behind. Although five boosters are necessary to trigger a power-up upgrade and boost up the strength of the current weapon, special red flashing power icons bring it up to maximum power in no time. Each weapon can be powered up to three times for maximum collateral damage and smart bombs in the shape of monstrous skull-faced energy blasts can be unleashed to kill most enemies on screen. Finally, speed boosters are strategically placed throughout the game to help the player dodge enemy fire more efficiently.

name: Tactics Despair: Falling Fellows
summary: A role-playing game from Bell Voice.

name: Tales of Vesperia: Remaster - 10th Anniversary Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Tales of Vesperia: Remaster,
Special box with artwork by Kousuke Fujishima,
Reversible box art (10th Anniversary Edition),
Hardcover Memorial Art Book (10th anniversary content, including character illustrations and more),
Anniversary double acrylic plate (Brave Vesperia),
Tales of Vesperia: The First Strike Blu-ray disc

name: Tamed Faces Jigsaw Puzzle - Domesticated Animals
Tappy Shots
summary: Tappy Shots is easy to play but hard to reach high scores! Dunk, swish, and shoot baskets to get on fire and beat the high score.

name: Taisho Yakyuu Musume: Otometachi no Seishun Nikki
summary: Koume is a girls' high school student. One day, Akiko, her close friend, suddenly says to Koume, "I would like you to play baseball with me!" Koume accepts her offer, but can they collect nine players? What do they need first? How about the rules? Will they be able to win against a boys' team...?

name: Talking Tom Pool
summary: Get ready to party with Talking Tom and Friends in a completely new kind of puzzle game! Sling and match colors to clear the pool and win!

name: Tale of Serendipity
summary: A game of suspense and adventure, where you will take the role of Carla in search of her feline lost by a seemingly harmless people

name: Tales of Arcana
summary: Tales of Arcana is a tabletop RPG where players make their characters with cards rather than the traditional pen and paper approach of other d20 based systems.

name: Take a Break! Pinball
summary: Take a Break! Pinball contains a set of 8 pinball tables based upon various popular Sierra games: Larry's Big Score (Leisure Suit Larry series), Lots in Space (Draxon), Flipped Out Willy (The Adventures of Willy Beamish), Nova 9 (Draxon), Planet Xenon in the Beginning (Space Quest series), Quest for Daventry (King's Quest series), Reformation Day (Space Quest series) and Spaced Travel (Space Quest series)

name: Tales of Berseria: Collector's Edition
summary: Includes Exclusive Bienfu Metalcase, 2 Chibi Kyun Chara Figures Set, Starter Strategy Guide, Softcover Artbook, 3 Metal Coins Set, Collector's Edition Box, Collector's Edition Soundtrack, PS4 Game

name: Tales of the Abyss
summary:
Redesigned to make use of the dual screens of the Nintendo 3DS, and now with stunning stereoscopic 3D graphics, Tales of the Abyss is an entirely new handheld experience.

Accompany a party of adventurers as they explore Auldrant, a world ruled by an ancient prophecy known as the Score. As a child, Luke fon Fabre, sole heir to the throne of Kimlasca-Lanvaldear, was kidnapped by a rival kingdom. The trauma of this incident caused him to lose all memories of his childhood. Since his return, he has been confined to his family's manor for his own safety, completely unaware of the evil that now draws close.

name: Tambourine Tangerine
summary: A previously unreleased map of SuperCupcakeTactics that plays for E1M1. A little bit of chaos.

name: Tau Defense
summary: Defend your Qi and study Graphs. All you do is place towers and upgrade them, but when-and-where makes all the difference. Every battle can be won in multiple ways. Each variation in tactic is rewarded with its own trophy. When it's over you can see your strategy plotted with beautiful graphs.

name: Tank on Tank Digital: Bundle West - East Front
Tactical
summary: Tactical is a challenging combination of puzzle and top-down shooter. You have one objective: eliminate all of the security robots. The catch is that you must not be discovered and only shots to the back will be effective.

name: Tattoos and Tulips
summary: Follow Chrys as he declares to swear off dating in favor of focusing on himself and hanging out with friends. That is until a very sweet, and very hot tattoo artist named Shay enters the picture. Has Chrys' bad luck gone away?

name: Tankitos
summary: You can choose if you want to play solo missions or just enjoy some fun with your friends in online. Solo missions has same rules as in original "Battle City" game. Player have to protect his base against enemies. Enemies are spawned with different level and power. If player survive all enemies, player wins and can continue to next level, if player lost his all lives, player loosed and must play again. Most of walls are destroyable and those ones contains pickable items like, healths, armor and variety of weapons.

name: Tap the Frog
summary: Ribbit! Do you have what it takes to help the Frog jump, paint and spacewalk the way to his sweetheart? Everyone’s favorite Frog is on a mission to become a Frog Prince! Join the Frog as he embarks on an adventure that will take him from the lily pads of his home pond to the farthest reaches of outer space. Easy to play yet challenging to master, Tap the Frog will keep you entertained forever. Let’s see how fast you rrreally are!

name: Tales of Fortune
summary: Tales of Fortune is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game that combines roguelike elements with intense arena naval combat. Make critical decisions, adapt to ever-changing situations, and outsmart your enemies at every turn. Are you ready to seize your fortune?

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Kyoshoku no Yoru
Take Flight 2
summary: In this 1930's cartoon inspired mobile game, you'll be taking to the skies to battle new foes. Take Flight 2 is a sequel to the popular game Take Flight!, in the sequel we have added a ton of new features including joystick controls, boss fights, new pilots and planes, social features, and more! Fight off enemies, collect gears and bolts, level up, and compete in this fun endless flying mobile game.

name: Tales of Legends
summary:
To operate a village , adventure -themed games.
The game has a wealth of personas and occupation , with freedom to complete the level . Each occupation has it's different skills which can be learned , which requires players to their own exploration .
The game provides a casino , arena and other small play, a casino can change permanent props to increase capacity ; arena can be converted to the ultimate weapons and equipment .
If you want to create a top team , you can choose to continue the game after clearance , repeatedly playing N times to cultivate the strongest character attributes .

name: Tank Battle
summary: Tank Battle is a war-themed game where players will play the role of a tank commander and arrange a formidable squad. There are 6 tank classes with 4 tank modules, each with unique stats for different purposes. Players have to apprehend the stats and skill stats of their NFTs and use critical thinking and teamwork skills to combat and win.

name: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
summary:
Tavern Rumble is a Free Strategy Roguelike Deckbuilding Card Games

Start your adventure with basic mercenary cards, fight your way up, get loot and strengthen your deck to fight strong Bosses along the way.

name: Tales of the Uncanny
summary: A horror game featuring standalone stories filled with eerie atmospheres and unsettling mysteries. Each chapter reveals a new, chilling narrative where your choices shape the outcomes. Dive into the unknown and embrace the uncanny.

name: Tactics Maiden
summary: A fast-paced, turn-based strategy RPG with outpost conquering and strong AI

name: Tango 5 Reloaded: Grid Action Heroes
summary: 'Tango 5 Reloaded' is a PvP tactical action PC game on grid-based maps where players are required to teamwork, strategize, and articulately utilize certain heroes and skills in order to dominate the battle arena! Join the Open-Beta Now!

name: Tanteibu: The Detective Club - Angou to Misshitsu to Kaijin to
summary: Second in the four volume romantic detective story. The detective team consists of Maya, Tora and Natsu, three teenage girls and Sodom, a little robot with a useful set of skills. Each game in the series focuses on three different cases you have to solve.

name: Tank Rampage
summary: Tank Rampage is an online team action game where you control a tank in small arenas in fast battles against players from all over the world!

name: Tagger Mascot
summary: In a residential area with dusk setting, a life-or-death game of tag begins！

name: Taisho Mononoke Ibunroku
summary:
The story takes place in the era of Taisho in Japan, in which there are a large number of demons wandering at night. There are 5 playable characters, each with different goals, stories, and personalities.

The game is turn-based, and divided into Adventure Part and RPG part, each turn is 15 days. In the adventure part, you can collect information, purchase items, and explore various places, special events also occur on specific days. In the RPG part, you will enter the battlefields, defeat all the "mononokes" (demons) and obtain the jade from the demons.

You can also capture the mononoke demons and train them to battle for you. There are a total of 37 kinds of mononokes, each with its own special skills and elemental attributes. You can equip the mononokes with different kinds of armors and accessories. The mononokes can evolve into various forms and classes.

name: Target
summary: Target plays similar to the game "Skeet", with the only difference that the dot never flies off the screen but keeps bouncing back from the edges.

name: Taikou Risshiden
summary: Taikou Risshiden is a Role-Playing game, published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Tap Toy
summary: In Tap Toy you steer Monica and her friends around obstacles.

name: TapLab
summary:
Greetings, Professor Taplab here!
After much experimentation I have discovered the key to infinite possibilities.
I've created a formula so amazing, it will create anything you can imagine!
but is not with out its risks... I need your help!

name: Take Five CD-Rom: The Entertainer - Five Entertaining Titles in One Box
Tales of Kid Goblin: Puzzle Crush!
Tamagotchi no Furi Furi Kagekidan!
summary: Tamagotchi no Furifuri Kagekidan is an Action game, developed by h.a.n.d. Inc. and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Take Care of the Paperwork
summary: Stamp, staple, sign, and fill out paperwork to fulfill your paper pushing needs!

name: Tangled
summary: Rapunzel has been locked in a tower all her life. She passes the time by reading, painting and brushing her very long and magical golden hair. She also wonders about the outside world, especially the floating lights that appear every year on her birthday. When the charming bandit, Flynn Rider, climbs through her tower window, it’s time for an adventure as they plot to escape together. Join Rapunzel and Flynn as they escape from palace guards and make it to the kingdom—just in time for Rapunzel’s dream to come true.

name: Tawawa Oku-san x Happening Gym: Mucchiri Body to Sukebe na Exercise
Tale of Swords: Eternal Love
summary: Tale of Swords: Eternal Love is a mobile-based MMORPG for Android/iOS. It was shut down August 22nd, 2019

name: Tank Stars
summary:
Tanks at your fingertips. Choose a weapon – a simple missile to an atomic bomb – and find the right shooting angle and destroy your opponents.
Make the right shot quickly or you'll die.

name: Taiketsu! Ultra Hero
summary: Portable fighting fun with Ultraman and company.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Abraca...What?
summary: Abraca...What? is a family game of deduction and spellcasting.

name: Tale of the Ice Staff
summary: Embark on a stunning magical journey with Yersa and her companion Nick in this single-player 2D action RPG. Shape the course of the engrossing storyline, explore new lands, meet interesting characters, and uncover secrets about the mysterious world. But be cautious! Dark forces are trying to keep you from the truth. This gem by Kurimi Gaming combines its nostalgic pixelated style with state-of-the-art game mechanics.

name: TatuBall
summary: With puzzle gameplay in a relaxed atmosphere with LoFi music, you must help an armadillo find burrows to survive during the seasons.

name: Talk to Saki
summary:
Chat with Saki!

Input keywords, ask questions, or simply check in to see how she's doing!

name: Tabletop Simulator: Wizard's Academy
summary: Wizard's Academy is a co-operative game of magical experimentation for 1-6 players. In each game, the players select a scenario, such as summoning and binding a demon to steal its powers, defending the academy against an attack by an army of Imps, or (in the most difficult scenario) facing an academy inspector whom they must impress with...

name: Tank War
summary: A game for the Game Master handheld

name: Tapper
summary: A Port of Tapper for ColecoVision.

name: Tank Guards
summary: "Tank Guards" is an independent game of strategy and defense based on tanks. Terrible enemies will invade your base, you have to upgrade your base, arm your tanks, and take advantage of the terrain, with friends to defend against their crazy attack.

name: Tap Jockey
summary:
Tap Jockey is a horse racing game.
You run your horse by tapping the screen and adjusting its speed.
Each horse has values on 3 features; "speed" "stamina" and "sense".
You can create a unique horse by adjusting each value with points earned at races.
Points are awarded when you win a race, then you can adjust each features before proceeding to the next race (maximum 6 races).

name: Tar Alterra Adventure Game
summary: 3rd person, single player, melee combat, Tar Alterra Adventure Game tells a story of an everyday hero trying to make his way home in this hack and slash crazy adventure game. Start the end of the world, or live out your days searching for a lost artifact that holds the key to your return home.

name: Tap Tap Infinity
summary: Tap Tap Infinity is a fully 3D incremental RPG. Hire Heroes to fight for you, even with the game closed! Gain unimaginable DPS, mountains of gold, conquer thousands of levels and millions of monsters on your quest to defeat 'The Master'.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 3 - Shisha no Rakuen
summary:
Murders occur one after another in the paradise of an amusement park

The mystery deepens...

A creepy threatening letter...

You must solve the case with your own hands!

Several months have passed since the nightmare at Kairoukan.

Ikuo, who is struggling for ideas, visits his friend, Kikugawa.

At the office for the first time in a while, a beautiful secretary from the popular amusement park "Shangri-La" who calls herself "Kikukawa Haruna" comes to consult with them.

The request she makes is to provide security and investigate the cult-like threatening letter sent to the amusement park and the creepy prank that is similar to it.

However, the company president, Kimijima Hiroshi, wants the matter to be handled confidentially and without telling the police.

Not knowing the details and feeling suspicious, Ikuo and Izuna decide to head to Shangri-La.

However, contrary to Ikuo and the others' expectations, the mysterious person's crimes continue.

The blackmailer's unexpected plan closes in on Ikuo!

An invitation from paradise brought by a beautiful secretary.... And so begins a feast called judgment....
Who is the mysterious blackmailer?!

This is a "command selection" adventure game in which you read the text from the perspective of Ikuo, choose the actions you deem appropriate, and lead the case to a resolution.

name: Tactics Arena Online
summary: An online multiplayer turn-based tactical game. Similar to Chess, you control unique units that have various powerful abilities to conquer your opponent.

name: Tasac
summary: In A.D. 20XX, humans are engaged in fierce warfare with TASAC - the alien bionic mutants. Landsy and Dagrel, commanders of Earth Defense Arms, are encountering the toughest enemies known to man. They must destroy TASAC to rescue the Earth, otherwise humans will be turned into slaves under the TASAC terrorism!

name: Tackle Box
summary: Tackle Box is a fishing game developed for the Arduboy.

name: Tank Tactics
summary: Tank Tactics is a tank shooter with puzzle elements.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Dawn of the Zeds
summary: You must lead the good citizens and emerging heroes of these communities to halt the Zeds' advances by (re)killing them, attempt to coordinate the discovery of a cure to this vile scourge, and preserve as much of the area and as many of its inhabitants as possible. There's no time to lose...

name: Tap-Tap Shots
summary:
Catch fire in this hot, epic and lively basketball game!

Tap-Tap Shots is an incredible endless basketball game in which you have to try to score as many baskets in a row as possible. You're given a basketball and a series of nets of different heights to shoot - just tap the screen to make the ball move. Each shot requires more than one touch and you must time your touch perfectly to push the ball into the net.

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Mikan no Report
summary: Tantei Jingūji Saburō ~ Mikan no Rupo is a Japanese style adventure game in the detective/mystery genre. It is the 5th game in the Jake Hunter / Tantei Jingūji Saburō series, being released between Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni... (1990) and Yume no Owari ni (1998). While following the same formula of the previous titles, the game features a "Zapping System", allowing the player to see the story from the perspective of other characters as well as Jingūji. Also featured in this title is car chase and following suspects in the form of 3D mini-games, although these features would rarely be seen again in future releases.

name: Tapventures
summary: A "tap/clicker" & "idle" game for the iOS and Android. Upgrade heroes, "tapping power," and cast runic spells to tackle ever-increasingly difficult monsters.

name: Tales of the Lumminai
summary: The two parallel worlds of Oricai and Anticai are faced with the same devastation caused by Calamities. You must see the world through the eyes of Lucia, a teenaged girl thrown into a war torn continent in the world of Oricai, as the world around her if being consumed by darkness.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Scuttle!
summary: In this fast-playing card game, players scheme, battle and steal to be the first to collect 21 doubloons. Each turn either draw a card or play a card - cards can be played as either treasure or as an action. Do you want to draw 2 cards, or steal the treasure chest your opponent just played? Or would you rather wipe the board...

name: Tank: The M1 Abrams Battle Tank Simulation
Talsaluq: Tower of Infinity
summary: A maze-adventure game entailing multi-level trials to reach the peak of a 3,000 year-old tower.

name: Tama Cannon
summary: Tama is a curious creature in a strange world full of floating cannons.

name: Tastes Like Coffee
summary: It's a late night and there's not a soul in sight... Until one lone customer walks into your coffee shop. Make drinks, lend an ear, and maybe even make a friend.

name: Table Football
summary: Table Football uses the motion-sensing abilities of the Wii Remote to make it feel just like you're playing a fast-paced game of fussball in the comfort of your living room.

name: Taboo Trial: Skuld
summary:
This DLC contains the following content:
1. New character skuld
2. Unlock skuld skin and defeat Image

name: Tarepanda no Gunpey
summary: Tarepanda no Gunpey is a Puzzle game, published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Tail Concerto
summary:
Explore a vast 3D world inhabited by lovable characters that you can interact with!
Run, jump, climb, and even fly through 9 floating islands of adventure!
Experience the wonder of dramatic anime sequences!
Characters come to life with spoken dialogue!

name: Tabletop Simulator: Warfighter
summary: Command the world's best Special Forces operators and complete vital assault missions around the world!

name: Tasty Shame in Silver Soul!
summary: Welcome, the newcomer! We are glad to see you in the Silver Soul academy - the place where you can embody all your passionate dreams.

name: Tales Of Two Heroes
summary: Tales Of Two Heroes is a roguelite deckbuilder about two heroes saving the world. Fight, collect, and survive. Who would reach the Altar first, and bring peace to this land?

name: TagPro
summary: TagPro is a free-to-play online multiplayer capture the flag video game originally designed and programmed by Nick Riggs. The first version was released in February 2013, after Riggs began experimenting with software platform Node.js. The game is named after one of its three obtainable power-ups. It follows the basic rules of capture the flag, along with some modifications, including power-ups, spikes, and other map elements.

name: Tank Firing
summary: Tank shooting game, aim at the target - Fire!

name: Taxi Game
summary: Crazy to be a taxi driver? Start as a duty driver in this taxi sim.

name: Tanked Up
summary: Use both your shooting and driving skills to cross the finish line first.

name: Tarzan VR: #3 The Dead of the Night
summary: As night draws in, the jungle swamp poses all manner of hidden dangers. Jane is in mortal peril, and only the strange fruit found in the heart of the Valley of Forever can save the life of Tarzan’s true love. Features "The Strong Bow" and its flaming arrows of vengeance.

name: Tabletopia: Champions of Midgard
summary: Champions of Midgard is a middleweight, Viking-themed, worker placement game with dice rolling in which players are leaders of Viking clans who have traveled to an embattled Viking harbor town to help defend it against the threat of trolls, draugr, and other mythological Norse beasts.

name: Tap To Jump On Time 3D
summary:
It is a game in which the ball jumps to avoid colliding with other colored balls.
To jump, just tap the screen before colliding with the ball.
Let's start with who is the best.

name: Tales of Destiny
summary: The PlayStation 2 release of Tales of Destiny is a full remake of the original PlayStation release of Tales of Destiny. This remade version of the game was released on November 30, 2006, followed by an additional Director's Cut version, which was released on January 31, 2008, also on the PlayStation 2. Neither version of this remake has been localized.

name: Tamagotchi Mesutchi
summary: According to Mikachu's logs, gendered Tamagotchi characters were a new discovery made while the Tamagotchis were living on Earth, and had not previously existed on the Tamagotchi Planet. According to her, the Osutchi and Mesutchi characters starting being born when couples began sharing their Tamagotchi pets with each other. As Professor Banzo often get flustered about the concept of love, Mikachu spearheaded the research on them. Since the original "Tamagotchi HOUSE" model was inadequate for caring for a growing Tamagotchi family, Banzo and Mikachu together developed the "Osutchi HOUSE" and "Mesutchi HOUSE"

name: Tamagotchi iD L Princess Spacy ver.
summary: Tamagotchi iD L Princess Spacy ver. is based around the new main Tamagotchi character, Himespetchi. It was released in March 2012, and only comes in a black and pink shell.

name: Tamagotchi iD Conan ver.
summary: Tamagotchi iD Conan ver. is a rare, limited edition Tamagotchi iD that was given away with every subscriber issue of the Shōnen Sunday Manga Magazine, issue 3000. They have a dark blue shell and red gem. This version has characters from the Detective Conan series which players can talk to in a new destination, and Conan versions of the ID games that could be downloaded from the official website.

name: T.A.R.S
summary: It is the year 2051, a disease has swept across the planet infecting over 90% of the population. You will take on the role of Samantha in this 3rd person horror shooter. Can you survive?

name: Tales of the Death
summary: Join a comic adventure in a hand-drawn book with a life of its own. Rearrange the panels of an animated comic to reveal the stories of the world of The Death.

name: Tavern Revisited
summary: You're a rookie owner who has inherited a tavern. Set up tables and chairs, buy equipment, issue commissions, fulfill orders, make hundreds of different styles of food and drinks. Recruit employees with different personalities and skills. Also learn their stories and let them into your life.

name: Tappingo 2
summary: The second Tappingo game for the 3DS eShop. Solve pixel art puzzles by making numbered blocks extend into lines. Sounds easy? Wait until you find out these lines keep running unless they hit something! Be smart and use other blocks and lines to stop the line at the correct length.

name: Takeda Shingen
summary: A turn-based war strategy sim developed by Another for the NES. Unlike its sequel, Shingen the Ruler, it was never released outside of Japan.

name: Tank Assault X
summary: Tank Assault X is a hardcore, logical tank arcade built on the lines of the classic arcade games of the 1980's.

name: Tapestry of the Month Before
summary: A quirky and comedy sci-fi game about a poor family in the junk filled city of Oldside and one girl's quest to get tickets to a concert! An open ended adventure filled with the bizarre, the wacky, and the wonderful.

name: Tattoo Punk
summary: Tattoo Punk is a story driven, management game where you own the Cyber - Tattoo Studio. You play as Henry, newly single father trying to create the best Tattoo place in the overwhelmed mafia scores city. Customize your studio, make dope futuristic tats, grow your business and brand.

name: Tarot Readings Premium
summary: Use our tarot reading cards adviser to learn about your future and fate!

name: Taco Run
summary: Take actor Danny Trejo on a journey to collect tacos and taco ingredients.

name: Tales of Morrow
summary: Create your tale! Build, fight, farm, and explore in this relaxing yet adventurous experience. You decide your fate!

name: Tartaria: The forgotten tale
summary: Tartaria is an original fairy-tale adventure game based on Slavic culture and Slavic mythology. Taking place around 900 A.D., you play a young prince who starts off protecting his Slavic principality from robbers, dark forces, and evil mythical beings using brawn, and magic.

name: Target Runner
summary: Target Runner is a 2D platformer with a side view. The player controls a character whose goal is to pass levels avoiding deadly traps. Get ready, the game challenges even the most inveterate fans of the genre! Be patient, you will need all the experience of a seasoned gamer to pass it to the end.

name: Tail Gun Charlie
summary:
Tail Gun Charlie is an XNA community game available over Xbox Live Marketplace. it is a shooter.

Charles “Charlie” Chatsworth is the pride of the Great British Galactic Diplomatic Corp. No other individual has done more for race relations and intergalactic war.

name: Tama and Friends: Kankeri Hajimeru yo!
Tabletop Simulator: Scythe
summary: In Scythe, each player represents a fallen leader attempting to restore their honor and lead their faction to power in Eastern Europa. Players conquer territory, enlist new recruits, reap resources, gain villagers, build structures, and activate monstrous mechs.

name: Tales of Sabotage
summary: An old-school style RPG set in the land of Thidruen. You must battle enemies, allies and uncover your past to find out who you truly are, and where you finally belong.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Darkest Night
summary: Defeat the Necromancer and save the kingdom in this one- to four-player cooperative fantasy game, Darkest Night.

name: Target
summary: Target is a shooting gallery. Yes, yes, the most common! Shoot on moving targets from more than 10 weapons - pistols, shotgun, rifle, machine gun, sniper rifle, bazooka and even hand grenades.

name: Tamagotchi mix: Dream mix ver.
summary: Tamagotchi m!x Dream m!x version is distinguished from other versions of the Tamagotchi m!x by its heart-shaped crystal above the screen. It features exclusive access to Dream Town, Yumemitchi, and Kiraritchi. An updated rerelease in 2018 also includes Pianitchi.

name: Tamagotchi Meets: Pastel ver.
summary: The Tamagotchi Meets: Pastel version was released in Japan in March 2019. It features two new locations with five new marriage partners Easter Land (Eggbasketchi, Piyotamausatchi, Tamaladytchi, and Tamaboytchi) and Flower Garden (Flower Fleur, Yotsubatchi, and Butterflytchi).

name: Tamashi: Rise of Yokai
summary: Tamashi: Rise of Yokai is anime-style 3D MMOARPG, where you can cross path and fight side-by-side with all kinds of yokai and guardian spirits called Tamashi.

name: Tactical Battle Chronicles: Prelude to a War
summary: Tactical Battle Chronicles: Prelude to a war is a turn-based tactical rpg where you control a small group of fighters. Recruit allies and defeat your enemies to drive the bandits off.

name: Tabletopia: The Isle of Cats
summary: The Isle of Cats is a competitive, medium-weight, card-drafting, polyomino cat-placement board game for 1-4 players.

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - The Frostmarch
summary:
A continent of ice dominates the horizon...

It is the Frostmarch, brought here across the northern waters by the Ice Queen. Armed with the Crown of Command, she is transforming the realm into a desolate, frozen wasteland. Can you overcome the raging storms and strange creatures that inhabit this bitter land? Will your blood freeze when you behold the Ice Queen's cold, cruel gaze?

The Frostmarch expansion offers players 4 new characters, 84 Adventure Cards, 20 Spell Cards 24 Warlock Quest Cards, and 3 Alternative Ending Cards - including a final climactic battle with the Ice Queen!

Brace yourself against the onslaught of the Frostmarch!

New Characters -

Necromancer
Leprechaun
Warlock
Ogre Chieftain

name: Tachyons
summary: It's like FTL but multiplayer :)

name: Taco Joe: Endless Taco Tosser
summary: Joe is a simple man who loves nothing more than serving up delicious tacos and tossing them at an endless crowd of hungry customers!

name: Tanks Meet Zombies
summary: Dress up as an Assault Armored Vehicle and prepare yourself to speed date, we mean destroy, hordes and hordes of undying humans, bears, spiders and more! Join with up to 3 more friends and get ready to wreak havoc, it will be a BLAST!

name: Tales of the Deck
summary: The land is in danger, and retro RPG card strategy is its only hope! Gather a party of three brave pixel heroes, each with unique spell cards. As a single player, adventure through a series of monsters and tactical challenges. Fall in battle, and your story is cut short.

name: Task Force
summary: Negotiations have failed! So your anti-terrorist Task Force is the last hope for hostages held by deadly terrorists in a high-rise building. You have wire-guided missiles, but eh terrorists never miss when they shoot at you! You have to fire fast then they step into and open window. But look before you fire, they can shield themselves behind hostages.

name: Tasty Tadpoles
summary:
Tasty Tadpoles is a deliciously addictive trial of survival. Tap your tenacious tadpole triumphantly through four puzzling ponds of peril.
You'll need fast fingers to flash past the fleet green tadpoles, a keen sense of cunning and craftiness as you clash with the angry yellow tadpoles along with tremendous timing and precision poking to swim under those tedious turtles. If push comes to shove you can always eliminate these eclectic enemies with the zap of an electric eel!

name: Tails
summary: Master the evergrowing dragon in virtual reality. Tails is a roomscale VR game for the HTC Vive. Collect lanterns in order to grow the tail of your dragon. The game is easy to pick up but hard to master, and ensures a fun challenge for the whole family.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Cosmic Encounter Connector
summary: Cosmic Encounter Connector is the Tabletop Simulator version of the award winning game where you become an alien with a special power to break the rules. No two games are the ever same!

name: Tamagotchi Meets: Fantasy ver.
summary: The Tamagotchi Meets: Fantasy version was released in Japan in July 2019. It features the Magical Flying Library Ship and allows access to three new locations with six new marriage partners: Princess Palace (Prince Mametchi and Loveli Princess), Arabian Night (Meloarabian and Lamppatchi), and Wonder Garden (Yumemi Alice and Kirari Hatter).

name: Tanoth
summary: With the disappearance of King Targon, the country Aris also fell into darkness. For a quarter of a century his younger brother Halgan has been ruling with an iron fist. After a near catastrophe on a small island in the east that remained unnoticed by most, another one is brewing in the north.

name: Taboos: Cracks
summary: Relax puzzle games to keep you in a good mood.

name: Tales of a Spymaster
summary: Break from the traditional role of ruler and take up a new set of tools within Tales of a Spymaster, a turn-based strategy set in a fictional world, filled with threats and opportunities. Choose your kingdom and guide your ruler to victory, in whatever manner you deem fit.

name: Tangrams
summary: Tangrams are fun for children of all ages. Complete the puzzle by moving and rotating the seven shapes. A fun way to work problem solving and visual spatial skills.

name: Tales of Glory 2: Retaliation
summary: Follow the adventure of Andrew "Dog" Carter, a former SAS operative and his International Task Force squad as they fight against a global terrorist organization called Quantum in Tales Of Glory 2 - Retaliation, a VR tactical shooter adventure mixing huge immersive battles against hundreds of NPCs and infiltration missions.

name: Tamagotchi Meets: Sweets ver.
summary: The Tamagotchi Meets: Sweets version was released in Japan in November 2019. It features two new locations and seven new and returning characters: Dolce Town (Amamelotchi, Himedolcetchi, Hotcaketchi, and Patitchi) and Wagashi Village (Himeamachatchi, Tsubuanonetchi, and Wagassiertchi).

name: Tank 51
summary: Tank 51 is an increasingly difficult retro styled fast pace shooter. Aliens have invaded planet earth and it is up to you the player to stop the alien invasion..in your tank.

name: Tank Tread
summary: Tank Tread is a multiplayer real-time strategy game with modern military units.

name: Tamagotchi: Party On!
summary: It is time for a new president of Tamaworld, and the Tamagotchis are setting up an election to see who it will be. The planet is abuzz and some of the characters want to be president. The election managers hold a competition for whoever can do the most good deeds, become the most popular Tamagotchi on the planet and get the most votes. The Tamagotchis set off to become the most popular Tama on the planet and the title of President!

name: Tangrams Deluxe
summary:
A tangram is a chinese logic puzzle where you must fit seven pieces into a target shape without any overlapping.

Enjoy solving over 200 puzzles in Tangram Deluxe!

name: Taurian Defense
summary:
Inspired by 1980s top-down arcade-style shooters, in this game you must defend your bases from an enemy invasion. The future of colonization depends on you!

Pilot the most advanced Taurian defense ships, each with their own special capabilities to help drive back the invading forces.

name: Taisen Hot Gimmick: Cosplay-Jan for Nintendo Switch
summary: The No.1 Mahjong arcade game is coming back to Nintendo Switch!

name: Tails' Nightmare 2
summary: Tails' Nightmare 2 is the sequel to the Sonic the Hedgehog fangame Tails' Nightmare released for browsers on 16th November 2010. Like its predecessor, the game is loosely based off the Tails Doll creepypasta. They contains improvements, Wall jumping and rail grinding are two new features added, and the gameplay itself is much smoother than the last and a variety of difficulty setting options.

name: Tainted Treasure
summary:
Reach the bottom of the tainted cave in this reaction-battle roguelike!
In order to uncover the mystery of the secret treasure, you have to reach the lowest level of the tainted cave. But this will be no easy feat as there are countless corrupted enemies standing in your way.

name: Takedown: The Introduction
summary: Relive your moments as Gray through Ice fields with updated cinematics, tagset, and gameplay. Catch up on the Takedown lore by replaying The Introduction that started it all.

name: Tarisland
summary: Tarisland is a non-P2W MMORPG on PC and mobile that features raids, diverse classes and builds, and a vast world for exploration. Here, myths are real, ghosts exist, and magic is unquestioned. In this immense, open-world playground, choose from various races, each with unique skills and abilities, and embark on an epic adventure full of mystery and dangers to overcome.

name: Tales of the Traveling Swordsman
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Mike Snyder.

name: Tale of Legends: Densouki
summary: Tale of Legends: Densouki is a Japanese fantasy RPG.

name: Tanigawa Kouji no Shogi Shinan II: Meijin e no Michi
summary:
An instructional Shogi game, that teaches the Japanese version of chess. It is hosted by Tanigawa Kouji, a top-tier Shogi player. It was released for the Famicom Disk System, NES and MSX.

Shogi, a Japanese board game similar to chess, is a board game as popular as Mahjong in Japan. Tanigawa Kouji no Shogi Shinan II ("Tanigawa Kouji's Instructional Shogi II") is the second in a series of instructional Shogi games hosted by then-top tier champion and expert Shogi player Tanigawa Kouji to help improve the player's game.

The first Tanigawa Kouji no Shogi Shinan was only released on MSX home computers, though this game first came out on the Famicom Disk System in 1987. It would later receive additional versions for the MSX and the regular cartridge-based Famicom in 1988. There also exists a second Famicom Disk System version, released after the MSX and Famicom ports, that contains additional puzzle arrangements. The third game in the series would only be released on the Famicom.

Neither this game nor any of the games in the series were ever released outside of Japan.

name: Tales of Phantasia: Full Voice Edition
summary: An enhanced remake of the original 1995 classic Tales of Phantasia, released exclusively for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Talisman: The Highland Expansion - Legendary Deck
summary: Face the true might of the Eagle King with this challenging Legendary Deck. Can you battle your way to the peak of the magical Highlands?

name: Tackle Tourney Turbo
summary: Fishing Free-For-All For 2-4 Players

name: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology
summary: The world of Terresia is under assault by a "devourer", which seeks to consume its mana and leave it barren. Although the residents of the planet are unaware, this is actually a result of the actions of two entities named Widdershin and Aurora, the descenders of other worlds. As a last resort, the world's life-giving tree (the World Tree) uses the last of its power to create a defender - the player's own character. The hero, after being awakened by a strange creature named Mormo whose own world was destroyed by the same threat, learns of the danger to this world's World Tree. Upon hearing a scream, the player rushes to discover that a girl is being attacked by a soldier. After rescuing the girl, she introduces herself as Kannono, a member of an organization named Ad Libitum. This guild seeks to help the people of the world, fighting injustice and oppression. With no better leads, the player and Mormo set out to join Ad Libitum, hoping to learn more about the location of the devourer.

name: Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon
summary: Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon is a Dungeon RPG. It is the first sequel in the Tales series, which normally does not have connected storylines. The story begins 205 years after the beginning of Tales of Phantasia.

name: Tamagotchi On: Wonder Garden ver.
summary: The Tamagotchi On: Wonder Garden version was released in the USA in July 2020. While it retains the same home screen, baby and child characters, items, and games as the Fantasy version, the only new location for the Tamagotchi On is Wonder Garden (retaining the rest of the locations from the Fairy and Magic versions), and it features a completely different faceplate design.

name: Talking Tom 3 in Olympics
summary:
Talking Tom 3 in Olympics was a Chinese bootleg mobile game that was based on "Talking Tom" app that was developed by NanJing oooo3d in 2012. The game was mostly a clone of the regular Talking Tom app, which had the player talk to Tom and he would repeat back what the player had said. In addition to that, it also featured 2 mini-games, which were milk and study.

The game notably contained the malware "Gooligan" within it, which installed rootkits and stole authentication tokens from Android devices to gain access to Google accounts, among many things. In 2013, the game was removed from the Google Play Store after the developers were sued by Outfit7 for copyright infringement.

name: Tamagotchi P's
summary:
The Tamagotchi P's is a Tamagotchi virtual pet device released in Japan on November 23, 2012. Like the previous color releases, it was based on the then airing Tamagotchi! anime series Tamagotchi! Yume Kira Dream, taking place in Dream Town and featuring new characters and locations from there.
The P's is the very first Tamagotchi version to have a slot for an attachable pin, hence the name "Pierce." Various pierces were released, each with exclusive content.

name: Tank Bung
summary: Tank Bung is a new rethinking of tank fights. Destruction of tanks and enemy bases. You can pump your tank and use additional boosters.

name: Tamura Mitsuaki no Mahjong Seminar
summary: Tamura Mitsuaki no Mahjong Seminar is a Miscellaneous game, published by Pony Canyon, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Tatarian aster
summary: In this game, you control a girl who has lost her memory from a first-person perspective, and walk through a mysterious white space to recover her memory. there are three branching endings, and if you can recover all the memories, you will be able to have a good ending.

name: Tampon Run
summary:
Tampon Run is a game created to combat the taboo around menstruation. In this game you will need to help Luna rid the world of menstruation haters! Throw tampons at them and don’t let them confiscate yours!
How many enemies can you enlighten?

name: Tatakae!! Ramen-Man: Sakuretsu Choujin 102 Gei
summary:
Tatakae!! Ramen-Man: Sakuretsu Choujin 102 Gei is an adventure game developed by Human Entertainment for the Famicom and published by Bandai in 1988. It is based off the Tatakae!! Ramenman series, which itself is a spin-off of the Kinnikuman series, known in the US as M.U.S.C.L.E.. Ramenman is a popular character in the Kinnikuman universe.

The game follows the eponymous warrior Ramenman as he attempts to track down his father's killers and bring them to justice with his many years of martial arts training. Notably, this game is the first true point-and-click adventure game for the system. While there had been many adventure games made for the NES, such as Portopia Renzoku Satsujin Jiken or Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom, they are largely driven by menus. Ramenman is directed by using the cursor to select an area to walk to or interact with instead much like classic Sierra adventure games such as King's Quest.

name: Tanks vs. Aliens
summary: Hordes of alien tanks have flooded the streets, spreading chaos and terror everywhere they go. You're the only one who can save humanity! Explore the world of futuristic tank battles in a brand new real-time strategy and base defense game.

name: Tank Off
summary: Fast-Paced Multiplayer Tank-Centric Tactical-Combat

name: TagHunter
summary: TagHunter is Super Cool Adventure with Power and Treasure.

name: Tamagotchi 4U
summary: The Tamagotchi 4U is a release of the Tamagotchi color series, released exclusively in Japan on September 27, 2014. Like the previous color releases, it was based on the then airing Tamagotchi! anime series GO-GO Tamagotchi!, featuring two new characters and taking place in DoriTama Town.

name: Take the Wheels!
summary: Take The Wheels! is a sci-fi kart racer with a twist. The control scheme is all wrong! Using asymmetric thrust (like for a tank or plane) and a variety of normal (and odd) powerups, power your way to victory in this "interesting" take on kart racing.

name: Tao
summary:
Tao is a quirky role-playing game with heavy religious themes.

The game concerns a spiritual wanderer who is attempting to avert the end of days predicted by Nostradamus in a near future which has already been wracked with disaster. In order to do this, he must invoke the powers of various different religions and belief systems, including those from Hindu, Buddhist, Christianity and other faiths. The game is known for its abstract and unusual personality.

A Sci-fi mystical RPG set in a post apocalyptic world, where a young man unravels a mystery regarding his origins and attempts to thwart an Nostradamus-tinged apocalypse that begins as a meteorite slams into his hometown. Find eight pieces of a trigram, 7 chakra statues and 7 amulets of the star lords in 7 mystic cities while fighting a cast of bizarre demons and gods!

name: Tales of Jayvin
summary:
Jayvin an unlikely hero, if every there was one, stumbles into a portal and finds himself in the land of Naturnum.
Unbeknown to him, his arrival has been expected.
Evil forces, commanded by the Dark Lord, Arachemon, are wreaking havoc across the Universe.
Only Jayvin has the power to fight these forces and put an end to Arachemon's reign of terror.

name: Takedown: Project Lawson
summary: Takedown: Project Lawson is a single player map based off the an extended version of the Danger Canyon bsp, as well as some custom BSP. It features complete cinematics as well as a variety of gameplay situations.

name: Tales From Toppletown
summary: Tales From Toppletown is a short comedy RPG. As a reclusive critter living in the woods, filling your days playing games, your roommate suggests you take a step outside and head into the bustling village of Toppletown. Here you'll find plenty of people in need of help, but could there be a true friend in sight, too?

name: Tales of Mist
summary: Tales of Mist is a survival game integrating strategy and adventure in a decaying world. Plagued by the presence of witches and the tyranny of creatures straight out of fairy tales, take command of a city to bring light to this fog-filled world.

name: Taboo: The Sixth Sense
summary: Taboo: The Sixth Sense is a tarot card reading simulation developed by Rare for the NES. This video game gives users a tarot reading where the "dealer" automatically shuffles the cards.

name: Tales From Galaxy 34
summary: Explore the galaxy through a narrative adventure involving warring factions, mysterious ancient technology, military & civilian groups vying for control. Every experience is a chance to improve your ship, guide the future of the galaxy and find the truth about why you were selected for this mission.

name: Table Game Daishuugo!!
summary: A board game compilation for the Super Famicom. It features virtual versions of mahjong, shogi, reversi and two hanafuda variants.

name: Tap Tap Beer: Tavern Edition
summary: Serve beer to thirsty Elves, Orcs, Wizards and all sorts of mighty heroes (and the occasional evil lords). Keep the beer flowing and the gold pouring at magical speeds unlocking new and fantastic lands to expand your beer empire!

name: Tanigawa Kouji no Shogi Shinan
summary: An instructional shogi game for the MSX.

name: Tasogaredoki: Kaidan Romance
summary: Fandisk to Oumagatoki by QuinRose.

name: Takeda Shingen
summary: A side-scrolling brawler for the Arcade and PC Engine featuring the titular Japanese Sengoku warlord. Not to be confused with the NES strategy game of the same name.

name: Tales From Aturian: Battle of Cleaved Fields
summary: Enjoy a short Turn-based RPG loosely inspired by Dungeons and Dragons mechanics, with many jokes and laughs to be had.

name: Tao Taido
summary: Thid game takes place on Earth, where eight martial artists from around the planet compete against each other to fight and defeat the legendary master and reveal the secrets of Ta•o Taido. The game appears to be similar to other 2D versus fighting games during its release, but has different gameplay. The player's character fights against their opponent in single round matches in a single player tournament mode with the computer or against another human player, while using very simplistic commands that summon charging attacks.

name: Table Football Pro
summary: This is a legendary desktop football game re-done on PC. It features local PvP and online play.

name: Tanks
summary: Prove that you and you alone are the best tank pilot by blowing your opposition to smithereens. Play against AI opponents of varying difficulty, or challenge your friends to a duel, a duel of Tanks. Take turn launching hunks of explosive metal into the air, and then smile as then come crashing down on your opponent, obliterating terrain or the enemy tank itself. But you’ll have to make sure you have the angle just right, or the only thing you’ll be feeling—rather than a sense of victory—is embarrassment. Succeed, though, and you’ll not only get a nice sense of accomplishment for angling those attacks just right, you’ll also earn money! Spend it on upgrading your tank, or buying additional items. Keep being victorious, and you’ll be the greatest tank in all the land.

name: Take on Helicopters: Rearmed
summary: Take On Helicopters: Rearmed is a free official DLC for Take On Helicopters. It seamlessly merges Arma 2 and Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead content into the game. Fly your helicopter over the gorgeous autumn landscape of Chernarus, dodge incoming fire from a myriad of Anti-Air weapon systems, and fight in massive combined arms operations.

name: TAL: Wizard's Adventures
summary: TAL: Wizard's Adventures follows the adventure of a young wizard’s apprentice. With your help, Phineas has to go through burdens and trials for achievement one main goal. Our hero wants to gain true wizard attribute - the magic hat.

name: TapOut
summary: TapOut is a puzzle game for iOS.

name: Tally Ho
summary: Only a perfect servant can solve a perfect mess! Being the perfect gentleman's gentleman or lady's lady doesn't make you an angel. Can you untangle your employer's knottiest problems with elegance and unruffled grace?

name: Tamiya Racing 64
summary: Tamiya Racing 64 is a tech demo for a racing game (presumably the similarly unreleased Mini Racers) with licensed remote-controlled cars, featuring very sensitive controls and vacuum cleaner engine sounds. It was developed by Intermetrics, associated with Looking Glass Studios.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! - Collector's Edition
Tabletop Simulator: Draco Magi
summary: Draco Magi is a fast game, playable in 30 minutes. It incorporates themes of area control, bluffing, hand management, deck building and deduction. Play with a friend, and enjoy the expansion decks as well.

name: Tank Online: War Shooting Simulator
summary: Enjoy the thrilling action of tank warfare in Tank Online! Experience unique tank game with stunning visuals and realistic physics. Join the fight now!

name: Tamane with Happa and Friends
summary: A puzzle game from Gyokusai.

name: Tank Royale
summary: Survive in tank battle! Or join with your friend to fight others! Battle, collect and customize your own tank!

name: Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator
summary: The Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator brings you a new experience. You can decorate the demonstration team by configuring the cool Taekwondo movements as a show stage.

name: Tales of Monsterland DX
summary:
A village besieged by monsters, a mysterious tower and a broken rope bridge. Save the village by uncovering the origin of these creatures.

Run, jump and battle your way through a strange land, gaining powerful abilities to help you in your quest.

It’s non-stop action all the way to the end, and then maybe you can find your way home.

name: Tamak.
summary: A tiny game or sound toy.

name: Tape: Unveil the Memories - Director's Edition
summary: Contains 3 movie postcards, Iria's letter, and storyboard for an unpublished prologue.

name: Tales of Frah'Akin
summary: Tales of Frah’Akin is an upcoming story-based fantasy RPG, in the style of the old classics but with a modern touch, rich with cinematic cutscenes.

name: Tatari
summary: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

name: Tamagotchi Smart
summary:
The Tamagotchi Smart is a virtual pet released in November 2021, celebrating the Tamagotchi franchise's 25th anniversary. Unlike previous Tamagotchi releases, it is in the style of a wearable smartwatch, akin to the Apple Watch and various other devices.
The Tamagotchi Smart uses TamaSma Card, also known as Tama Smart Card, which is a memory card that can be inserted into the Tamagotchi Smart to download additional characters, items, accessories, games, wallpapers, clock faces, and food.

name: Tabletopia: NewSpeak
summary: Newspeak is a tense game of dystopian subversion in which you take the role of either the 'dissidents' or the 'moderators' in a mind-bending battle of wits to determine the reality around you.

name: Tank Hangar Simulator
summary: Tank Hangar Simulator, In Your Own Hangar You Can Both Repair Tanks and Build Your Own Tank and Join the War!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Doka! to Oomori Nanadaime
summary: Taiko no Tatsujin: Doka! to Oomori Nanadaime is the seventh Taiko no Tatsujin game released for PlayStation 2. It features the addition of Reverse mode and additional challenges with the incorporation of Taiko Towers.

name: Taser Gun
summary: Take out the enemies with the taser gun

name: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3
summary: The third entry in the Radiant Mythology spin-off series features over 80 playable characters from the Tales franchise, including all 50 from the previous installment.

name: Taco: Princess from the Moon
summary: Taco: Princess from the Moon (Nekotako) is a homebrew platformer for the SNES.

name: TaniNani
summary: Explore a unique puzzle experience in your own pace. TaniNani is a puzzle game where you move parts of the level around to help the characters find the crystal and each other.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Includes:
- Main Game
- 90-Day Taiko Music Pass (single-use non-auto-renew)

name: Tap & Clapp
summary: Physics puzzle with 80 levels and game editor.

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Senkan Yamato, Akatsuki ni Shutsugeki su!
Tales in the Taxi
summary: Tales in the Taxi is is a multi-ending adventure game in which the story diverges by driving a taxi and talking with passengers.

name: Tactical Operations Force
summary: Tactical Operations Force - TOF is a Third Person Shooter Game that allow players to play up to 10 vs 10 matches over the internet on Steam.

name: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest
summary: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest is a first-person adventure game that will contain multiple chapters. Chapter 1 has the story of a village that seems friendly, but every villager has their own dark secrets and the judgment day has come.

name: Tales of Ancient Nights
summary: A short journey to the tragic stories of ancient greek gods and goddesses. It is time to learn about Greek Mythology with a beautiful storyline in this visual novel.

name: Tales From The Outer Zone: The Construction
summary:
A gunslinging tale of settlers and zygnoka.

While finalizing the construction of the futuristic metropolis The Structure, the young Constructor journeys out into The Outer Zone to mine for zygnoka at a nearby meteorite impact crater.

name: Tales of the Drunken Paladin
summary: Tales of the Drunken Paladin is a fantasy-comedy RPG about a universally disliked hero who very suddenly loses absolutely everything - including his identity - and must go on a quest to find out who's responsible. It's also largely a game about interacting with thousands of inanimate objects. One full playthrough is between 40-60 hours. Once you've beaten the game, hard mode is unlocked.

name: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual - Collector's Edition
summary: A series of mysterious ritual murders covered the foggy streets of London, which young detective James Voodoo will have to investigate. While investigating these mysterious murders, James Voodoo faces the mystical phenomena, which covered the city. When progressing in case investigation, James realizes that these murders are just the small part of the global conspiracy, which threatens the whole world. And he is the only one who can stop it.

name: Tales to Enjoy! The Ugly Duckling
summary: Tales to Enjoy! The Ugly Duckling is one of a collection of Interactive Stories for young children.

name: Tap Hero
summary: Tap Hero is a deadly and extremely addictive pixel art adventure game. Remember, if you even miss once, you will die. Stay alive for as long as you can and reach the top of the leaderboard! To aid you with your quest, your Hero will perform a Powerful Special attack when your Super Bar is full! Upgrade your armor, weapons, get an extra life, and fight for the glory of Pixel Kingdom!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii: Ketteiban
summary: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii: Ketteiban is a rhythm / music game which was released in Japan in 2011.

name: Tatoe Sore ga Unmei de Atte mo
summary: Miyako, an alpha, has a happy relationship with her childhood friend and boyfriend Toto, a beta. But when Utsuro, an omega, transfers to their school, Miyako realizes that he's her fated mate.

name: T.A.P.
summary: Tower defense is not! Tower Attack! Turret Attacking Platform. Build towers on a rolling ship, improve them, strengthen, build factories, extract resources, Swing skills, earn reputation. You will have 70 types of turrets, 70 skills, 8 active abilities, 5 types of ships. Try a more advanced version of tower defense.

name: Tank survival Game
summary: Tank survival game how to play 1: double click game.exe 2: setting graphics and click play 3: click the 'LAN HOST(H)' 4: enjoy the game key setting Keyboard arrow:move Space bar:shoot graphic setting fantastic-high speed-low about this game Enemy tanks are attacking players without mercy Life bar is sharply reduced.

name: Tailor Tales: Neil Plus
summary: Tailor Tales: Neil Plus adds a longer epilogue for Neil. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Tanks: The Crusades
summary: A top-down shooter with tanks that have various assorted abilities, with support for multiplayer and a level editor.

name: Taisen Golf
summary: Golf game featuring Bomberman characters.

name: Taito Legends 2
summary:
The PS2 version of Taito Legends 2 has a different set of games compared to the European version.
The North American release replaced Puzzle Bobble 2 (Bust-A-Move 2: Arcade Edition) with Bust-A-Move Again.

name: Tailor Tales: Caine Plus
summary: Tailor Tales: Caine Plus adds a longer epilogue for Caine. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Tanks on the Eastern Front
summary: Tanks On The Eastern Front is an arcade-tactical game. Player moves his tank trying to hit enemy tanks. A hit on the side or rear armour gives best results. Campaign focuses on the biggest and most bloody battles of the German-Soviet war.

name: Tactical Nexus: Chapter 4 - Tactical Star
summary: Orb system is here! RPG for 1000 more hours! Chapter-4

name: Taisen! Bomberman
summary: A Bomberman game by Konami available for iOS and Android devices. Includes single player and online public/private multiplayer for up to four players.

name: Tabaluga
summary: Tabaluga is a Role-Playing game, developed by NEON Software GmbH and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 1999.

name: Taxinaut
summary: Taxinaut is a space-taxi sim / adventure set in a sci-fi fantasy open-world with a huge galaxy.

name: Taxi Journey
summary:
Taxi Journey is an original puzzle/adventure game in a universe that combines charm, humor and mystery. It takes inspiration from games such as Limbo or Machinarium but comes up with a very unique universe and original gameplay features.

Taxi Journey was a unsuccessful Kickstarter project by Lexis Numérique in 2013, and their final project after multiple other difficulties for the company.
On its second attempt, It was planned for Wii U and Windows with stretch goals for Mac/Linux, iOS/Android, PlayStation Vita, PlayStation Network and Xbox Live Arcade.

name: Task Force Delta: Afghanistan
summary: As a member of Task Force Delta, Army's Elite special forces unit, you'll strive for vengeance for Terrorist Attacks against the United States. Formed to battle terrorism, you will engage in rough terrain against countless enemies with the sole target to eliminate leading terrorists in Afghanistan. Utilise a modern arsenal of machine guns, assault rifles, sniper rifles and pistols to weaken the terrorists and protect the free world!

name: Tales of Sorrow: Strawsbrough Town
summary: Play the exciting hidden object adventure "Tales of Sorrow: Strawsbrough Town" and help Alfred save his fiancée Melissa from a curse.

name: Tatsumaki: Land at War
summary: Upcoming MMORPG set in feudal Japan.

name: Task Force
summary: Task Force is a tactical third-person shooter that focuses on close quarters infantry combat.

name: Tamagotchi Uni
summary: The Tamagotchi Uni is a virtual pet released by Bandai Toys on July 15, 2023. It is designed as a successor to the Tamagotchi Smart and the Tamagotchi Pix, and it is the first color-screen Tamagotchi device to have a simultaneous global release.

name: Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League
summary: Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League is an NPB baseball game for the Sega Game Gear. It features all of the teams in the Central and Pacific Leagues of NPB in 1995 and features several game modes.

name: Takeover
summary: Takeover is a fast paced waifu hack and slash action game with a time attack feature. You will alternate stealth phase and combat phase. The game include a dynamic clothes system.

name: Tales of Bibliotheca
