Throughout his wanderings, and innumerous parties, Enrique will have to make choices, that will impact the very foundation of the relationship with his friends, or may lead to nothing at all. Will he be able to find love?

name: Taboos: Flower
summary: Go through the maze of leisure small game.

name: Tanigawa Kouji no Shogi Shinan III
summary:
A third shogi instructional game starring the expert player Tanigawa, this one was a Famicom exclusive.

Tanigawa Kouji no Shogi Shinan III ("Kouji Tanigawa's Instructional Shogi III") is a Shogi game with numerous tutorials and the third in the series presented by Tanigawa Kouji, a real-life Shogi expert. It also features different playing modes, including one where the choice of tiles to move is determined by a slot machine.

Unlike its immediate predecessor, which was released on both the MSX and the Famicom Disk System, Shogi Shinan III was exclusive to the Nintendo Famicom and did not see any ports.

name: Tarim
summary: Somewhere, in some town that may be unknown to all; there was Tarim, a sad but strong hermit that without knowing it or be waiting for it would be forced by itself to enter on a great adventure to save to the town of his childhood, a town without stains and that never had known the fear.

name: Tales to Enjoy! Three Little Pigs
summary: Tales to Enjoy! The Three Little Pigs, is one of a collection of Interactive Stories for young children. Each book is filled with features to entertain children while helping them to learn and stimulate their imagination.

name: Tamagotchi
summary: A Tamagotchi made specifically for mobile phones, resembling the first model ever released but now with original animations and an option to add color.

name: Tales From The Under-Realm: After Midnight
summary: A gothic visual novel full of intrigue and romance

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Koukoku no Kouhai Koko ni Ari, 1942 Senkan Yamato Hankou no Kouhou
Tabletopia: Sub Terra + Expansions
summary: Sub Terra is a cooperative survival horror board game. You and up to five friends are cave explorers who have become trapped deep underground. You must quickly explore a tile-based cave system to find the way out before your flashlights die and you're lost in the darkness forever.

name: Tales We Tell Ourselves
summary: A short game made for Bitsy Haiku Jam.

name: Tanks for the Memories
summary: Science teaches us that tanks are the solution to everything.

name: Tale of Fortune
summary: You are a beginner pirate and it depends only on you how rich you will become and how your fate will go. You and your crew in search of riches. Travel through a huge world full of adventure and danger.

name: Tail Gunner
summary: Tail Gunner is vector arcade game created by Vectorbeam in 1979. As enemy space craft attack the player, they must aim a set of cross-hairs and shoot the enemies before they move past the player's laser cannons or use shield to bounce them back into play.

name: Take A Leak
summary: Human testing is back in fashion! Solve the puzzles laid out by Toilet Labs in this piss-filled experience. Our state of the art latrine testing facilities ensure you will feel more relief on solving a puzzle than ever before.

name: Tales of Fearless online
summary:
Tales of Fearless is a 2D Hardcore Old School MMORPG with Medival and Fantasy style
With pixelated graphics that beats that nostalgia feeling of old games like Tibia, FFIV, and Zelda.
Made by a lover of old 2D games, Tales of Fearless has over 8 years of development.

name: Tales of Fandom Vol. 2: Luke Version
summary: Tales of Fandom Vol.2 is the second game of the Tales of Fandom sub-series within the Tales series. It is the sequel of Tales of Fandom Vol.1. The game comes in 2 version: Luke and Tear. The game is referred to as a voice adventure. It includes such things as a timing battle, card game, and more.

name: Tappy Golf
summary: The most easy, fun and addicting golf game you'll ever play! Each hole is procedurally generated. So you'll experience an infinite number of golf holes that are different every time you play! Just tap the screen to stop the aiming arrow. That's it! But careful... the arrow gets faster the better you score.

name: Tactical Soldier: Undead Rising
summary: Tactical Soldier is a tactical squad level turn based game where you control a group of soldiers trying to uncover the dark secrets of an army research base invaded by zombies.

name: Tamagotchi Angel
summary: A re-release of the original Tamagotchi Angel, also called "Tamagotchi Angel Gen 3".

name: Tap Sports Football 2016
summary: A football game from Glu Games.

name: Task Attack
summary: Task Attack is a humorous, classic arcade style game with a twist. Drawing inspiration from classic 80's arcade games, players first encounter attacking alien invaders, but soon must fend off "real life" interruptions that creep into the game and join the assault. To successfully defend the galaxy, players must defeat trips to the store, car repairs, news alerts, and other annoying distractions. Do you have what it takes to survive a Task Attack?

name: Tank Onslaught
summary: Meet recognizable gameplay in the game "Tank Onslaught" The action range is visible from above. The player must, controlling his tank, destroy all enemy tanks at a level that gradually appear at the top of the playing field.

name: Tang Tang
summary: This GBA game mimics the gameplay of Solomon's Key. Players are tasked with creating and destroying blocks to collect items and reach stage exits.

name: Tabletopia: Orléans
summary: During the medieval goings-on around Orléans, you must assemble a following of farmers, merchants, knights, monks, etc. to gain supremacy through trade, construction and science in medieval France.

name: Taoist Down the Hill
summary: Due to emotional confusion, I joined Xinlonghu Mountain and became a Taoist. Now I am going down the mountain to travel and slay demons and eliminate demons.

name: Tavern Crawl
summary: Tavern Crawl is a alcohol-fueled adventure starring Fish, a young mouse on a quest to save his kingdom’s supply of booze from a gang of thieving rats through combat and crafting cocktails.

name: Taisen Hot Gimmick Kairakuten
summary: The second game in the Taisen Hot Gimmick series, with art based on Japanese men's magazine Kairakuten.

name: Taikou Risshiden V DX
summary:
A remaster of the classic "Taikou Risshiden V" with new features! You take on the role of Toyotomi Hideyoshi and other real-life historical figures who lived through the war-torn 16th century Japan and aim to realize their dreams and ambitions.
This HD remaster features more than 100 new characters, new scenarios, new events, new endings, new skills, and many other new elements and quality-of-life features such as an auto-save function and an ending list.

name: Tanks in Labyrinth
summary: The point of this game is to have a great time with your friends on the same computer! You play as a tank. Every man for himself. You can play with a top view, or you can play in the first person! Interesting bonuses: health, hammer, rocket, machinegun, blast, wall.

name: Taxi Life: VIP Vintage Convertible Car
summary: Take your clients on an unforgettable ride through Barcelona in the VIP Vintage Convertible Car, a top-end car inspired by the most beautiful jewels in automotive history!

name: Tavuti
summary: Tavuti's adventure to regain the power of the Whale God and rescue the kidnapped COCOSI!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Doki! Shinkyoku Darake no Haru Matsuri
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Aoi Me no Ryuu
Tap the Road
summary: Do you like a smell of petrol in the morning? So it’s your time to drop the hammer in this old school racing madness!

name: Tank Souls
summary: A fun souls-like game in which you will kill your time in hundreds of dungeons, pumping your skills and knocking out randomly-generated things.

name: Take town
summary: Urban Planning Simulator (puzzle) build and manage your city! You are the mayor of a small town develop it and earn money.

name: Tactical Assassin
summary: In Tactical Assassin the player takes on a role of a stick figure sniper, eliminating fellow stick figures for a secret organization. One of the original "Sniper Stick" games.

name: TankDestruction
summary: TankDestruction is a multiplayer game with a focus on fast-paced action. Select 5 special abilities and battle on large-scale maps with up to 20 other players! Destroy tiger tanks, other players, and automated turrets that stand in your way, to capture enemy towers to win the game!

name: Tanhaji: The Lion Maratha Warrior of Ch. Shivaji
summary: The first epic 3d RPG game on Maratha History and Marathi Culture.

name: Tao Feng: Fist of the Lotus
summary: Clothes will tear, blood will spill, and bones will break in the brutal fighting game Tao Feng: Fist of the Lotus. On the vicious streets and back-alleyways of New China, two fierce fighting sects battle in a race to uncover a valuable prize. During your fights throughout interactive environments, your fighter reflects all the physical damage he or she receives from opponents. You can either heal yourself from the beatings or build your powers to unleash devastating Chi attacks.

name: Tails and the Music Maker
summary: Tails and the Music Maker is game that feature Tails "Miles" Prower as the main character. It debuted on the Sega Pico.

name: Tales of Carmelot: The missing pot of gold
summary: Something is rotten in the kingdom of Carmelot and the good king Ethriel instructed you to investigate a missing pot of gold. Your searches will carry you into a fairy tale where you'll have to use a flying carpet, learn an Irish dance or do a water ride. Ryan O'Brien is counting on you to help him complete this beautiful adventure available in many languages.

name: Tales of Yore
summary:
Tales of Yore is a free online multiplayer RPG with oodles of items, quests and monsters to discover. It's all about finding and beating everything in the game. The game is in active development and has been since Spring 2021.

At time of writing the world contains around 20 hours of gameplay, 100+ NPCs, 100k tiles to explore and many random story lines along the way.

name: Tatakae! Harmonia Ongaku-tai
summary: Tatakae! Harmonia Ongaku-tai is a RPG in which you fight battles with the instruments belonging to famous classical composers. With calming classic music as running as bgm, you will find hints and events referring to classical music all over in the game. Aim to take your country back from the evil queen with the power of classical music!

name: Tamagotchi mix: Melody mix ver.
summary: Tamagotchi m!x is a color-screened Tamagotchi released exclusively in Japan on July 16, 2016. It introduces the m!x feature which allows the user to create Tamagotchis that are a mix of their parent's features. The Melody m!x version features exclusively access to Melody Land and its characters.

name: Tankron
summary: Tankron is a top-down wave survival roguelike in which you fight an ever-increasing amount and variety of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades to stand a chance. Discover and choose between 21 different tank specializations to enhance your Build.

name: Tanks+: New Era
summary: Pew pew pew! Its ww3? No it's just some tanks fun. Multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) video game with positive and dynamic battles 5x5 format.

name: Tank Commando 3D
summary: Sneak around. Find weapons. Blow up tanks.

name: Tayal
summary: Tayal is an old-fashioned, mega style 2D platformer game. In this game you will follow a boy to find the truth of his father.

name: Tank Battle
summary: Drive a tank, destroy enemy, defend your homeland. Act alone or co-op with a friend and have fun!

name: Tarotica Voo Doo
summary: This is an unparalleled 2D puzzle exploration game developed for the 8-bit MSX computer. With 5 years in development, the over 600 frames of hand-drawn animation have been fine-tuned to perfection.

name: Tale of Starship
summary: Tale of Starship is a classic shoot them up, the objective of this game is to survive. Tale of Starship use RNG to generate enemy's wave. Moreover as the game progress, you can upgrade your starship through different ameliorations, each pool of ameliorations is generate randomly.

name: Tank On Tank Digital - West Front
summary: Tank on Tank Digital brings World War II tactical ground combat on Western Front 1944.

name: Tatsu no Ko Fighter
summary: A side-scrolling platformer featuring a bizarre cast of characters created by manga artist Akira Miyashita.

name: Talking Saban's Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Solar Stealers
Tales from the Under-Realm: After Midnight
summary: TFTU: After Midnight is a dark / gothic visual novel with multiple endings. Your choices matter and will determine who stays alive and who dies. Discovering the whole truth about the murders will require more than one playthrough.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 3
summary: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 2, featuring 19 new songs, the iconic Balloon notes, and a Battle Mode.

name: Table Tennis League
summary: Table Tennis League is the most realistic 3D Ping-Pong game.

name: Tapper World Tour
summary: An update to the classic arcade game, Tapper, made for iOS devices.

name: Tank Team
summary: A team based PVP game where groups of up to 8 players must work together to operate a tank!

name: Tanks VS Demons
summary: Go through the levels, collect photons, fight bosses and upgrade your tank. Buy new tanks to get more powerful weapons. Online table of records is included.

name: Tank Operations: European Campaign - Remastered
summary: Tank Operation: European Campaign - Remastered is a turn-based, tactical war game with a dozen nerve-racking historical scenarios on the various battlefields of World War II with more than 50 faithful, authentic military units. New graphics as well as an improved UI, revised sound effects and adjustments of the game based on community feedback adorn the remaster version.

name: Tales of Androgyny
summary: Tales of Androgyny is an erotic turn-based RPG featuring more than 40 characters, some male, some female, some... slime? You play as a feminine guy and get to meet with guys, gals, monster guys, monster gals, and... slimes? It's a stance-based RPG with rogue-lite elements written, drawn, and programmed by the Majalis team, consisting of two programmers, one artist, one writer — making in all, two! With the outsource help. It's a custom built game using libgdx.

name: Table Trenches
summary: In Table Trenches, your table transforms into the battlefield! Grab a friend, scan your space, and battle it out, wherever you are. You'll deploy your forces, capture towers, and fight to the last in this real-time tactics game, designed for AR. Smash the enemy with Logan's mighty walkers, or melt their towers to the ground with Mei's devastating flame tank - the choice is yours. The player with the most towers left standing will win the day!

name: Tabletop Simulator: Unearth
summary: Unearth is a bend-your-luck game of dice placement and set collection. Designed by Jason Harner and Matthew Ransom, it plays in under an hour with 2-4 players. Each player leads a tribe of Delvers, represented by five dice (3 six-sided, 1 four-sided, and 1 eight-sided).

name: Take Me or Leaf Me
summary: Take Me or Leaf Me is the world’s first digital houseplant dating sim (as far as we can tell), inspired by other wacky dating sims and set in the Kinder World universe.

name: Tactical Soccer
summary: Tactical Soccer is a Sports game, developed and published by Electronic Arts Victor, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Taffy Tales
summary: In “Taffy Tales” you will see the story of a regular guy with a split personality and his journey in a small town where almost every common citizen has his uncommon dark side. Dozens of characters with their families and relations, an original story, lots of side quests and a lot of adult art awaits you!​

name: Tangram Mania
summary: The most ancient puzzle known to mankind comes back in a new form on the most innovative console ever, the Nintendo DS! Play with the "seven pieces puzzle" anywhere you like, try to solve the puzzles already prepared for you, or create your own puzzles and challenge your friends to solve them! Old Game, New Fun!

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Rensa Suru Noroi
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Tsubaki no Yukue
Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Prism of Eyes - Inu to Yobareta Otoko
Tactical Control: Impossible Missions
summary: Can you win against the odds? Play the "Impossible Missions" series of practice battles.

name: Tap Sports Football
summary: A free-to-play mobile football game from Glu.

name: Tap Tap Fish: AbyssRium
summary: Tap Tap Fish - AbyssRium is a game that helps relax your nerves. Level up your Stone, create your own fish and make the Aquarium belongs to you! A beautiful ocean world waiting for you to explore! If you add VR Game mode you can watch the fish immersive!

name: Tachyon Dreams I: The Radiant Fish of the Apocalypse
summary: You're Dodger, a dish washer (a person, not a machine!) onboard Space Station Penrose, where temporal experiments are being conducted. One of them is about to go very wrong... Only you can save the fate of the timeline itself! With your, you know, stellar dishwashing skills an' all that!

name: Tamed: Chapter 1
summary: Platform game inspired by Little Nemo Dreammaster. Tame creatures and use their ablilities to navigate through each map.

name: Tarlis World
summary: "Tarlis World" is game where you rule the world with your own tactic or strategy to achieve your goals!

name: Take Care Of Mittens
summary: You're asked to go and take care of your neighbours fox, where you need to complete some chores so that mittens are fed, played with and more. It’s your choice to do so, just keep in mind that you don’t, you may not survive. So make sure you Take Care Of Mittens.

name: Tap Away
summary: Tap the blocks to make them fly away and clear the screen. But the blocks will only fly in one direction, so you’ve got to approach this brain teaser carefully! Slide your finger around the screen to rotate the shape and attack the blocks from every angle! As you progress, the blocks form bigger and bigger shapes, and the blocks themselves change form, so you’ll need to get your thinking hat on to solve the puzzles in this 3D puzzle game. And that’s not it! There are skins and themes you can unlock as you get further, as well as challenges to keep you on your toes. In this fun and colourful game, you challenge your logic, critical thinking, and precision. Do you have what it takes?

name: Table Top Racing: World Tour - Tropical Ice Pack
summary: Table Top Racing continues its world tour with the all-new Tropical Ice Pack. Introducing two new and exciting locations; 'Life's A Beach' the Brazilian juice bar and the luxury Alpine resort, 'Yellowsnow Piste'.

name: Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda
summary: Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda is the grand finale to the sci-fi comedy Tachyon Dreams text-parser trilogy! In his third adventure, Dodger explores a barren world, travels back in time to relive past moments, and then journeys to a dark forest on the edge of the cosmos. It is time to finally discover the fabled worlds of the Margdonians, which the greedy Tgorodians have searched for all this time.

name: Tabletopia: Zoom In Barcelona
summary: Travel around the city of Barcelona and take the best photos to win the game!

name: Talevania
summary: Talevania is an action-packed Metroidvania platform game with ever-changing Cards and intense action. The game won't let you relax 'cause you'll never know what to expect ahead.

name: Talking Phrasebook
summary: Don't get lost in translation when you travel! "Talking Phrasebook – 7 Languages" comes fully loaded with 780 useful expressions organized in 53 categories, to cover most situations you may encounter as a traveler.

name: Takeover
summary:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1982

Takeover is a strategy game where the objective is to capture your opponent's capital city. This is accomplished by a coordinated effort of the armies, fleets, cities and roads at the player's disposal. The game is played with five different scenarios and randomly situated capital cities which form constraints to each player's basic strategy.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Chibi Dragon to Fushigi na Orb
Tank Hero
summary:
Battle through dangerous arenas and become the Tank Hero! 
Fast paced 3D tank action on your iPhone. Take out your enemies with cannons, heat seekers, grenades, and howitzers. Battle against cunning enemies and become the Tank Hero.

name: Tactical Recon
summary: Battle your way through many levels in an epic journey to free your country from an enemy invasion in this 2D action game, gather gold and buy more stuff, that you probably would not buy in real life.. like a double barrel shotgun with split-in-two-fire-two-ways mechanism! Or even a Jet pack!

name: Tactical Suppression
summary: Our first-player shooter (Tactical Suppression) is an action packed, multiplayer which is designed for players to experience a whole different level to the first-person shooter genre. Syndicate Alpha Game Studio have made sure we give you the best quality all around- game play, maps and weaponry!

name: Tales of Blood and Sand
summary: Tales of Blood and Sand is an RPG set in the time of Roman Republic. Join Cassius and his brothers in their struggle to achieve glory and freedom. Enter the arena and see if you can survive to tell the tale.

name: Tabletopia: Pocket Investigations
summary: A series of cooperative investigation scenarios inspired by escape games, with a touch of alternate reality gaming. Inspect objects & documents and solve puzzles!

name: Taisen Bomberman 24
summary: The third game in the Taisen ☆ Bomberman series. It was named after its 24 players multiplayer support.

name: Tales of Memo
summary: Tales of Memo is a memory game where you accompany Memo and his friends on a journey through a frozen landscape, battling enemies by solving memory puzzles.

name: Tanks A Lot
summary: Tanks A Lot is a lot like Namco's Tank Battalion, a tank game where you blast through bricks and destroy enemy tanks while protecting a home base.

name: Tabletopia: Millennium Blades
summary: In a world very much like our own, Millennium Blades is the world's most popular collectible card game. With your starter deck in hand and a dream in your heart, the time has come to step boldly into the world of Millennium Blades!

name: Tall Poppy
summary: Tall Poppy is a fun-house horror experience where you must find your wife's purse and a way off the church property before the prankster ghost gets you!!

name: Tanki X
summary: Tanki X is a multiplayer tank-action game that's out to prove that when it comes to tanks, there's more than just thick shells and firepower. Get ready to strap on your seatbelt because you're in for some serious adrenaline!

name: Tamestorm's Virus
summary:
After unsuccessful experiment of the military AI control has been lost. To obviate the results there has been determined to annihilate AI with viruses. Nevertheless, endless attempts have failed. AI has learned to take control of viruses and in that way has become increasingly mightier. Nothing has been left but to create a virus, a man will take under his control. Your aim is to resist AI by means of viruses.

You will have to stand against AI almost on 30 levels. By way of constantly changing strategy and tactics you will pursue the single aim - to resist A

name: TAL: Arctic
summary: TAL: Arctic - In this game you need help an unknown creature to go in the magic portal across many mazes.

name: Taming.io
summary:
Taming.io is a 2D survival game taking place in the wild forrest. The player controls 2 characters in the game - yourself (human) and own pet of own selection. The game offers many pets to choose from while every pet has different characteristics.

The game is classic representant of .io games - easy to play, hard to win. The goal is to keep alive as long as possible while having the highest score. To do that, a strategy is reqired - there is need to collect strategical resources and do not do enemies from other animals.

The player's skills evolves with each age. The game also offers to build various buildings for protection as well as mining. Have fun.

Pet controls
Shield button: The pet protects you
Sword button: The pet attacks every animals it sees, except sleeping babies.
Hand button: The pet will stop following you and keep its position.
Skill button: The pet use its special ability.

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Shijou Saidai no Gekisen Normandy Koubousen
Tale of Rainbow 7
summary: In "tale of rainbow 7", you will lead a special bounty squad to take adventures in the cyberpunk-like sci-fi world. This game is a driven by story, turn-based tactics, squad-based rpg game. just enjoy it !

name: Tavern Crawler
summary: Slaying the dragon? Easy. Collecting your pay? Not so much.

name: Table Ball: Emotions Skin Pack
summary: Get complete access to the Emotions Skin Pack without spending any pings.

name: Taxi Life: Supporter Pack
summary: Start your company off with a wide range of exclusive items to customise your taxi, stand out from the competition, and catch the eye of potential fares!

name: Tales of Chandar
summary: Tales Of Chandar is a turn-based strategy RPG, where you have to survive the dangerous lands of Chandar, and take back the kidnapped princess to her father.

name: Tarot Realms
summary: Select three cards from a shuffled deck to get a spread for Past, Present, and Future. See how the chosen cards correspond to the Tree of Life sefirot. Provide your feedback as we work on interactive Tarot characters and locations together. Join us in making a meditative immersive Tarot experience.

name: Taxi of the Asteroids
summary: Asteroids game made for the Game Jam FR 8

name: Tantei Gakuen Q: Kyuukyoku no Trick ni Idome!
summary: Tantei Gakuen Q: Kyuukyoku no Trick ni Idome! is an Adventure game, published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Target Pinball
summary: Advergame for the supermarket

name: Tapgym
summary:
Are you ready, bro? Let’s get tapping!
We live for the gym, but what do we do when we’re not at the gym? We #tapgym!
Smash through push ups, lifts, lunges, sit ups, and so much more…
Do you have the muscle to reach #berserkmode and be the toughest bro alive?

name: Tamagotchi Connection
summary: The Tamagotchi Connection, or the Tamagotchi Plus is the first modern release of the Tamagotchi virtual pet, debuting in Japan on March 20, 2004 and in North America on August 15, 2004. The Tamagotchi Connection was the first Tamagotchi release to use Tamacom, an Infrared feature that connects two Tamagotchi pets, allowing them to play games, exchange presents, and give birth to offspring. It features characters from both version of the the classic Tamagotchi (1996) and the Mesutchi and Osutchi (1997), as well as several new characters.

name: Tandis
summary: Tandis is a 3D puzzle game where you discover mind-bending geometrical shapes.

name: Tanks2.DE
summary: Tanks2.DE is a 2D online multiplayer tank shooter, currently featuring 2 nations with over 30 tanks from the World War 2 era. The game is in a stable open beta state and receives continuous updates.

name: Tattoo Mania
summary: Tattoo mania is an iPhone game from Handy Games. Players trace tattoo patterns, earning points for accuracy.

name: Tangent Rush
summary: Tangent Rush is a casual game with unique controls and tricky levels. Challenge yourself through dodging obstacles and breaking records. Get the hang of throwing yourself around tangentially and getting to the goal in time!

name: Tackle Girl
summary: Platform game. You aim to clear over 60 stages use Jump , Dive and Tackle!

name: Tartaros
summary: An action-oriented MMORPG by South Korean developer, Intivsoft.

name: Tabletop Simulator: The Red Dragon Inn - Battle For Greyport
summary: The Battle for Greyport is the game of the adventurers after the adventure but before the pints. Maybe the big bad guy's underlings are seeking revenge, or maybe an even bigger bad guy is coming over to show the city who's the new boss in town.

name: Tartaron
summary: Tartaron is top-down shooter with an old-school art style and a variety of levels to beat. Engage in close-range combat, or snipe your enemies from afar, it's up to you.

name: Tabletop Simulator: The Great Dinosaur Rush
summary: In The Great Dinosaur Rush, players compete to grab bones from the best dig sites, and build new dinosaurs for prestigious museums, gaining notoriety in the process by stealing bones, sabotaging dig sites, and otherwise impeding your fellow paleontologists.

name: Tano's Fate
summary: An unknown arrival. A land disconnected from the world's society. Four heroes destined to change the past to save the future, and it's all thanks to the locked mind of one man. Jay-Cast Presents... Tano's Fate. A game built around unlocking your past to save your future.

name: Taikyoku Igo: Goliath
summary: Taikyoku Igo: Goliath is a Miscellaneous game, published by Bullet Proof Software, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Tasukemono
summary: A new style "strategy-like" puzzle game! Control multiple cute characters and navigate a little girl to the goal! As the girl gets deep into the forests, her secret will be revealed...

name: Tap Tap Builder
summary: Build the city of your dream! Tap to build the city, hire workers, earn money and become the greatest boss. But don't forget to deal with fires, crimes and unemployment. Let's start working right now!

name: Tale of Two Sardines
summary: Guide Miko through her daily life in alternate-universe Japan! Help her do her homework, clean up the dishes, re-arrange time and space, and more! And quickly, because the world may or may not be coming to an end!

name: Tank Attack
summary: A single-screen shoot'em up in which two players guide their tanks along the screen and try to blow each other up.

name: Tanks Logic
summary: A game in which you control a tank and solve puzzles.

name: Tales from Zilmurik
summary: High fantasy turn-based roleplaying game. Immersive story developed over 15 years. A beautifully crafted world rooted in refinement and discipline. Challenging and diverse combat potential.

name: Target Acquired
summary: A side-scrolling endless runner/action mobile game

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Commons
summary: Tales of Commons is a role-playing game that takes place in the world of Yupitel, and stars main characters Alvin and Sefina, along with their party members, Seiun and You. Like Tales of Breaker, it utilizes a variation of the Linear Motion Battle System. It was the first Tales of Mobile game to contain a theme song: Kana Uemura's Kiseki.

name: Tales of the Abyss: Mieu no Jikkenshitsu?
summary: Mieu no Jikkenshitsu? is a cooking game where the player gives Mieu various ingredients to have him make a dish.

name: Tales of the Abyss: Mieu no Daibouken
summary: Mieu no Daibouken is an action role-playing game starring Mieu, the mascot of Tales of the Abyss. A total of twelve dungeons are available to the player for download. Mieu, using his abilities gained from the Sorcerer's Ring, is supposed to reach the bottom of the dungeon, at which point one of the characters from Abyss will give the player a password. This password can be redeemed in Tales of the Abyss for items.

name: Tales of Card Evolve
summary: Tales of Card Evolve is a mobile social game for GREE that was first announced during the Tales of Festival 2012. It was launched on June 3, 2012.

name: Tales of Mobile: Klondike
summary: A Tales of Mobile take on the traditional card game Klondike, a game similar to Solitaire that can be played by only one person. While playing the game, the fairy character from Tales of Tactics offers her insight.

name: Tales of Mobile: Craymel Lab
summary: Craymel Lab is a puzzle game that consists of the player moving falling blocks of different colors and shapes into an arrangement and making them disappear, similar in many ways to Tetris.

name: Tales of the World: Material Dungeon
summary: Tales of the World: Material Dungeon is a spin-off game released on January 31, 2008 in Japan only for mobile cellphones. Twins Lene and Rio pursue a variety of quests in order to recover four lost elemental roots. The materials they receive at the end of each quest can be used to make costumes. When a character puts those on, they gain the abilities of the costume's related class.

name: Tales of the World: Dice Adventure
summary: Tales of the World: Dice Adventure is a web browser-based board game in the Tales series released April 26, 2012 in Japan. The game is a role-playing and board game hybrid, where the player rolls virtual dice to determine how much a character moves across the board. Through the course of traversing the board, the player can form parties with other characters, experience story events, and participate in battles.

name: Tales of the Abyss: Mieu no Fonic Gojiten
summary: Mieu no Fonic Gojiten is a text converter that allows a person to convert words into the fonic alphabet of Tales of the Abyss. There is also an option to attempt to decipher words without help. Success gives the ability to download an Tales of the Abyss-related picture.

name: Taboo Trial: 5.0 Weapon And Dark Gold
summary: The DLC5.0 for Taboo Trail.After enabling this DLC, you can open 5.0 game content, which is independent of 4.0 saves and allows you to freely choose different modes for a gaming experience

name: Tales of the World: Tactics Union
summary: Revalia is a world formed from the dreams of people from countless different worlds. As long as there are those who dream, it continues to exist; when they cease to dream, the world will die. Within Revalia resides the Rufres tribe, whose duty is to keep the balance in the world by purifying the nightmares of the people, the incarnation of the people's darkness in their hearts called Vuul.

name: Tank Commander
summary: Experience turret-tossing arcade tank combat like never before in Tank Commander! Test your skills against the latest military hardware including tanks, trucks, helicopters, drones, and more!

name: Tank Company
summary: Tank Company is a MMO tank battle game with 15v15 scale on your mobile devices.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Three Cheers For Master
summary: Three Cheers for Master is a fast-paced, multi-player card game where each player creates their own cheerleading tower of cards depicting Master's violent, war-hungry minions.

name: Tatsuno Quest
summary: A role-playing game from PinkMimic.

name: Tanks Endeavor
summary: Tanks Endeavor was designed to be a family-friendly adventure puzzler. Customize the color of your tank and jump right into the fun. Play through several adventure levels that are unique and challenging as you progress through the game mode.

name: TallyUP
summary:
TallyUP is a free Play-To-Earn game designed for everyone.

TallyUP redistributes a large % of its ad revenue to its players as a small but real financial stake. Players are then allowed to play simple and addictive minigames to try to win bigger and bigger amounts of prizes.

The game is free to play with no ways to deposit or risk a player's own money. All winnings are shared with charity (10% minimum, but you can always choose to give more).

name: Tanks
summary: Tanks is an online game for mobile phones! There are unique battles and thousands of tanks at a time! Tanks is battles in real time!

name: Tales of Arise: SAO Collaboration Pack
Tactical Intervention
summary: Tactical Intervention is a Free to Play tactical FPS with unique mechanics. Drive, bomb, rappel and shoot your way through eleven high octane levels. Command attack dogs, deploy breaching charges, perform drive-bys and control hostage situations!

name: Task Force Harrier
summary: Task Force Harrier was produced by UPL in 1989.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 6
summary: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 5, featuring 32 new songs and no other notable change from its predecessor.

name: Tails no Flying Get
summary: Tails no Flying Get is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. It was released just a day after Sonic Battle, with the intention that players could practice one of the mini-games.

name: Tahoe Dragon: The Beginning
summary: They warned us in the 1980s, "You don't want to know what is down at the bottom of lake Tahoe." The year is 2042. And earthquake beneath the lake removed rocks from underwater tunnels that set the beast free.

name: Tales of Kizna
summary: Tales of Kizna is a mobile social game that was released in Japan on November 22, 2011. The game involves acquiring cards of Tales characters, sometimes in special costumes, and assembling a team of four, just as the battle party in other games, to fight against monsters. Tapping the screen allows for attacking, and fights are won based on attack and defense being higher than that of the opponent's.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 13
summary: The 13th Taiko no Tatsujin, released on December 2009 just five months after the wildly successful Taiko 12.5. Taiko 13 takes the game to new heights, being the first version to be used in a nationwide (Japan, of course) official Taiko no Tatsujin tournament in April 2010. In terms of new features, again it doesn't introduce many new things, except a slight change in the Children/Folk genre name from Kanji to hiragana.

name: Tabbris Yor
summary: Tabbris Yor is a sci-fi TPS shooter (with switchable camera to FPS). Serving as a private security agent of a human colony on Ganymeade, the largest moon of Jupiter's largest moon, your mission is to find each of the aliens and eliminate them - before they eliminate you!

name: Tabletopia: Eight-Minute Empire - Legends
summary: Eight-Minute Empire: Legends is a standalone sequel to the area control game Eight-Minute Empire and does not require the original game to play. Build a small empire in a land of legends!

name: TangramsVR
summary: TangramsVR is a virtual reality puzzle game designed for Oculus and HTC Vive. Players face puzzles of outlined objective shapes. Players must move the provided blocks to fit inside the objective.

name: Tanjou S: Debut
summary: Tanjou S: Debut is a simulation game published by NEC Interchannel for the Sega Saturn. It is based upon the 1994 two-episode anime Tanjou: Debut.

name: Taisho Taxi Service
summary: Experience a first-person retro horror journey in rural Japan. Navigate in your taxi, picking up sketchy passengers, while vigilantly monitoring your map, rear-view mirror, and the treacherous road. Confront your deepest fears in this open-world nightmare where survival is far from certain.

name: Tak: The Great Juju Challenge
summary: The top teams from across the world have come to compete in the Great Juju Challenge. Representing the Pupanunu Tribe are Tak and Lok who will face great adversity in the form of Jujus, wild animals, and some menacing new tribes. Tak: The Great Juju Challenge is an innovative cooperative videogame that combines unique puzzles, time-based strategies, and a robust combat systems. Players will have to use all their skills to win this race against the toughest competitors and receive the grandest reward ever given by the Great Jujus!

name: Tank Hunter
summary: Wasteland sci-fi style light meat pigeon tank shooting game

name: Tapeworm
summary: You are to eat the fruits in the garden which in turn will grow you larger, albeit are not not to touch parts of your body or the surrounding enclosure.

name: Tahl: Uncover the Evil Within
summary: "Tahl": Uncover the Evil Within is an isometric action RPG dungeon crawler where the player fights against hordes of ghosts and demons from East Asian mythology using point-and-click controls. There is no safe hub, so the player has to survive using the loot gained from enemies alone. This makes the game close to a roguelike, even though the dungeons are not randomly generated.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Eigou-kai Jiken
summary:
July 1999 - The world situation has lost its balance and is in great turmoil. The circumstances and perspectives of the four characters become intricately intertwined, and the full picture of the incident soon emerges...
The meeting between Ikuo and Kibukawa is also now revealed!

name: Tank Golfing
summary: Have you ever played golf with a tank? Now you can. Tank golfing is a new twist on this classic sport. You try to shoot golf balls with your tank, sounds simple, but requires skill. Laid back, but not easy.

name: Tales of Nebezem RPG: Red Peril
summary: Magical RPG in a rich colorful world, with tactical battles and an immersive story

name: Taking Root: Academic Version
summary: Join a stone creature and its loyal plant companion in an emotional journey to escape their once-pristine home, now suffocated by a concrete metropolis. Solve mind-bending puzzles by shifting perspectives as they flee together and find a new sanctuary to forever take root!

name: Tabletopia: Euphoria - Build a Better Dystopia
summary: Euphoria is a worker-placement game in which dice are your workers. Four distinct societies, each of them waiting for you to rewrite history. What are you willing to sacrifice to build a better dystopia?

name: Tap Tap Radiation
summary: The touch music game franchise Tap Tap arrives on iPad.

name: Taishou Mebiusline Hitotsumi
summary: A Compilation of Taishou Mebiusline Teito Bibouroku Hare and Taishou Mebiusline Vitable

name: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii: Minna de Party Sandaime
summary: Third Taiko no Tatsujin game released on Wii, featuring ability to support up to four players and seven minigames.

name: Tabletopia: Wizard Kittens + Magical Monsters Expansion
summary: Wizard Kittens is a semi-cooperative set collection card game. Players are wizard kittens who have accidentally released a few curses from the library's restricted section. Now they must defeat the curses before they're caught by the librarian, Professor Whispurr.

name: Talismania
summary: Talismania is a puzzle game set on boards with different tiles.

name: Takumi 3
summary:
Takumi³ (spoken as "Takumi Cubic") is a rhythm game for iOS and Android. Notes are presented in a vertical-scrolling fashion from top to bottom and fall down in lanes; the player must hit these notes when they overlap the judgement line at the bottom to earn points.

It is notable for the dynamic nature of its lanes. Note lanes may move, widen, narrow, and may either disappear or extra lanes may spawn on the playfield.

name: Taisen Reversi
summary: An online game of Reversi (also known as Othello), featuring Bomberman icons to represent each player.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythmic Adventure 2
summary: Don-chan and his friends have a great adventure in the mystery spots of the world! Find out the secrets of a mysterious phenomenon occurring around the planet and save the world!

name: TapMon Battle
summary:
It's time to battle! Tap! Tap! Tap! Try tap a egg to hatch a Tapmon!
Do a battle with another tapmons using your hatched tapmons!

name: Tankroyale.io
summary: Online multiplayer fast-paced top down cartoon browser shooter, battle against people worldwide for a chance to earn a Season Prize!

name: Taxi of Miracles: Collector's Edition
summary:
This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Save Christmas for some friendly felines in the bonus chapter!
- Bring some holiday spirit to the neighborhood with the strategy guide!
- Downloadable wallpapers and music bring the holidays home!
- Lots of extra hidden objects to find!

name: Tang Chi
summary:
Reunite the Seven Pieces and Something Magical Happens

Tang Chi

Journey into a timeless realm where the power of the mind makes geometry take on form and substance--experience the mystical power of Tang Chi, the ancient Chinese puzzle that comes to life before your eyes. Master the power inherent in the pure simplicity of these seven classical forms. Follow the way of the shapes to ultimate mastery of the mystical puzzle known as Tang Chi.

Tang Chi is a challenge for agile minds of all ages. Play it alone, or play it with your family and friends. Play it at home, or use it at work for an invigorating mental break that's completely caffeine-free.

Tang Chi, the ideal challenge for the mind.

name: Taboo 5
summary: A otome game included in the Story Me app.

name: Tantalus
summary: You are a patrol staff aboard the spaceship 'Tantalus'. Explore a spaceship filled with mystery, uncover anomalies, and report them to the control AI.

name: Tabletop Simulator: Tiny Epic Galaxies
summary: Tiny Epic Galaxies is driven by an exciting dice-rolling mechanic that rewards thoughtful programming of the results. Players control a home planet and a series of space ships within their own personal galaxy. As players upgrade their galaxies they gain access to more ships and more dice.

name: Tap a Gap
summary:
Remove the rings by closing them. Gather the next highscore and share it with the world. A ring is build of bricks and sometimes bricks are missing. Incomplete rings are subject of your interest. Look at the rings! A complete ring adds points to your score. Be fast as the rings start to grow and the hole count increases. Unlock items freezing the playfield or shoot laser at all the bricks. Take your point count to be on fire and new highscore with us!
Developers Highscore is about 20.000 ... just updated right now: 30380
Highscore of a 9 Month old baby is 3142
Start tapping the gaps now.

name: Tayutama 2: You're the only one
summary: In the mountain town far away the ashihara chou, a brand new story about the coexistence of "humans" and "tayutai" is about to start.

name: Tape of the Ghouls 2
summary: Are you ready for the sequel? Tape of the ghouls 2 is a VHS found footage survival horror. This video tape was found in May 1999 in the state of Louisiana. This tape reveals the events that unfolded in the decrepit hotel Starlight. The Starlight was demolished in October 1978. The content is beyond explanation. The recording was code-named Tape of the ghouls 2. Whoever you are. Whatever you know. Nothing in your experience could ever prepare you for of Tape of the ghouls 2. Get ready to watch.

name: Tamagotchi Friends: Dream Town Digital Friend
summary: Tamagotchi Friends: Dream Town Digital Friend is an upgraded version of the original Tamagotchi Friends with added content and five new characters. It comes in six new shell styles, all of which have a different build from the original Tamagotchi Friends.

name: Tail io
summary: Become the biggest snake in town!

name: Talking in Circles
summary: Try and free yourself from the curse that's bound your bloodline for centuries! Piece together clues from ancient tomes and long lost spirits to confront the Demon that has plagued you for so long.

name: Tag
summary: Tag real-life environments using the PS Vita's camera. Upload your tags to allow other players to view them...and even tag over them.

name: Tabletop Hero
summary: is a roguelike deck-building game. With a variety of heroes and classes, hundreds of cards and treasures, and a rich array of genres to explore, there's plenty to discover. Additionally, card enchantment and fusion mechanics help you build a stronger deck.

name: Tap Romantics
summary: In this casual strategy game, become a clever warrior, eliminate monsters by clicking, accumulate attack power, battle against beautiful girl enemies, earn talent points and exquisite CG rewards, and challenge your decision-making wisdom and combat skills!

name: Tap Titans 2
summary: Tap to slay hundreds of Titans with your sword as you journey through the land in this clicker RPG adventure. Upgrade your blade for new gear, gather pets, and enter multiplayer clan raids with users across the globe to leave your legacy as the Ultimate Sword Master.

name: Taptiles
summary: Taptiles is a puzzle game developed by Arkadium and published by Microsoft Studios.

name: Tap, Click ‘n Destroy
summary: Tap, Click ‘n Destroy is free space mining simulator with core game mechanic of incremental clicker games with small additions of arcade elements. Tap to destroy asteroids, planets and even stars in your endless adventure across the universe. Earn money with your mining skills, improve your spaceship with various modifications and build your private space station with various modules.

name: Tank Rush
summary: Tank based twin stick shooter action giving 4 player PVE coop fun, or enjoy a hectic PVP battle in various multiplayer modes.

name: Taxi Taxi Sim
summary: Hello, Taxi? I urgently need to get to Avenue 14.

name: Takahashi Akiko no Mahjong Seminar
summary: Mahjong education game for Xbox

name: Tales of Arise: Collaboration Costume Pack
summary:
A crossover with Code Vein, The Idolmaster, and Tekken!
Features crossover costumes for Shionne, Rinwell, and Kisara.

name: Tamagotchi Connection V3
summary: The Tamagotchi Connection V3 is the third Tamagotchi Connection release that debuted in February 2006. It was the first Tamagotchi release outside Japan to interact with the TamaTown website. It has more characters than the previously released versions (52 total) and offers a password concept similar to the Keitai Kaitsuu Tamagotchi Plus and the Chou Jinsei Enjoi Tamagotchi Plus.

name: Tank Wars
summary: Tanks are the most popular units in the gaming world, and many won't argue with that. So the appearance of new Tank Wars game will undoubtedly cause a lot of people's joy. The plot of the game is not original - the defense of the headquarters. You can play alone, repulsive attacks endless line of enemy tanks, or two, trying to beat his friend in a tank duel. Before you plunge into battle, develop a strategy. Act deliberately to gain victory. Shoot your cannon into the brick walls, but leave something for cover, sometimes it's good to wait or ambush. The vertical panels on the left and right show information about the number of remaining enemies and lives.

name: Tank vs. Tank
summary: Battle of the Tanks: Aim, Ready.... Fire!

name: Taco Bell: Tasty Temple Challenge
summary:
Players control Baja Bill. Players go through the temple of a lost jungle civilization, battling snakes and scorpions with hot and wild sauce. Taco Bell can be consumed for health.

It was a free MS-DOS game that came with a Taco Bell kid's meal.

name: Tank and Roll
summary: Tank And Roll is an Action-Shooter game that challenges players achieve the highest score! There are features such as unlocking new vehicles, drawing your own vehicle, and importing custom avatars for your character! It offers both fun and a rewarding challenge for those who dare to master it!

name: Taste of Sweet Magic
summary:
Rushing to get ready for school, you take the first bite of your breakfast muffin… Only to find the sweetness seems to have been sucked away!

Washed away to the sweets kingdom and with time running out, you must work together with three beautiful fairies to bring sweetness back into the world!

name: Tarnsman's Projectile Hell
summary: Tarnsman's Projectile Hell, also known as TPH 12.3: Part 1A - The Prequel to Part B Galaxy's Brink!! The Super Incredible Bulgarian Necromancer of the East!! Fight for the Combined Justice of the Planet Sphere - Earth!! is a four episode megawad released in May 2021 by Richard Frei (Tarnsman). The mod is split between four episodes set in a wide variety of locales, and includes a completely overhauled arsenal, many new enemies, and several modifications to already existing ones.

name: Tangledeep: Dawn of Dragons
summary: The world of Tangledeep is in danger! The Ancient Dragons have returned, giving even seasoned adventures a host of new challenges to face, dungeons to explore, monsters to fight, items to wield, and powers to obtain.

name: Tale of the Kissing Bandit
summary: A game about a young man in costume who goes about a ball stealing kisses from young women.

name: Take a Look
summary: "Let's scold the troublemaker butlers!" Go on an adventure where you have to become a cat agent and get rid of the butlers.

name: Tankfight
summary: Put down all the enemy tanks coming towards you! Collect points. A tank game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

name: Tampopo
summary: Tampopo is a heartfelt RPG adventure with unique physics-based combat. It is set in a strange world with strange characters. It is a lighthearted game that will make you laugh but it has a hidden darkness to itself which will gently unfold until it wraps all the way around you.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin DS: Dororon! Yokai Daikessen!!
Tama: Adventurous Ball in Giddy Labyrinth
summary: Guide an intrepid sphere called Tama through a rather flighty maze.

name: Tamer: King of Dinosaurs
summary: A survival/action/dating sim with an interactive world based on the best selling harem novel series by Michael-Scott Earle. Fight, hunt, and tame dinosaurs, craft weapons and tools, build a fort to protect the alien women you love, and experience a romance story like no other.

name: Target Rush
summary: A bite-sized platformer where you have to break as many targets as you can within the time limit.

name: Tank Trace
summary:
Draw terrain as you go in this exciting infinite scroller with a new twist on controls!
You control the world, not the tank! Avoid missiles, helicopters and mines. How far can you get?

name: Takenoko
summary: The most-talented gardeners in Imperial Japan are competing to see who is worthy of taking care of the sacred panda. Cultivate your plots, grow bamboo and complete objectives in the official digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game.

name: Tasking
summary: "Tasking" is an idle monster-hunting game. You will start as an archer and recruit your own team members, use gold coins to purchase powerful skills, challenge formidable bosses, and defeat them one by one, gradually conquering each continent.

name: Tales of Guards Elves
summary: This is an RPG with novel combat gameplay. combat random. Players can capture their favorite Weilings, roll dice for movement, place and upgrade Weilings for layout, and fight under novel rules that allow the protagonist to unleash skills.

name: Taekwon-do
summary: Taekwon-do is an Action game, developed and published by Human Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Tadeo Jones
summary: Video game based on the award winning Spanish series of computer animated movies.

name: Tantrix Quiz
summary: A simple yet addictive puzzle that may challenge your skills of deduction.

name: Targeting Maths Lab Launch Pad
summary: Targeting Maths Lab Launch Pad is the first game in the Targeting Maths educational series of games.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 4
summary: Targeting Maths Lab 4 is an educational maths game developed for kids aged 9-10.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 6
summary: Targeting Maths Lab 6 is the final entry in the Targeting Maths series.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 2
summary: Targeting Maths Lab 2 is an educational game made to teach Australian kids math.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 3
summary: Targeting Maths Lab 3 is an educational math game compilation made for kids aged 8-9.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 1
summary: Targeting Maths Lab 1 is the second entry of the Targeting Maths series of educational games, which is targeted towards kids aged from 6 to 7.

name: Tamagotchi Connection
summary: The Tamagotchi Connection is a virtual pet released by Bandai Namco Toys & Collectables on July 10, 2024. It is a relaunch of the Tamagotchi Connection line made to celebrate its 20th anniversary. It was first teased on April 25, 2024, before officially being revealed on May 13, 2024. The device contains a hybrid of features from both the Tamagotchi Connection Version 3 and the Keitai Kaitsuu Tamagotchi Plus.

name: Talisman: Origins - The Eternal Conflict
summary: Try to survive one of the most epic battles that the land of Talisman has ever seen! In this expansion for Talisman: Origins, decide which side shall emerge victorious between the ancient forces of good and evil.

name: Take Command: 2nd Manassas
summary: Your quest for the true immersive Civil War battle experience ends here.  Voted in PC Gamers list of Best 100 Games of All Time,  Take Command is an RTCS "Real-Time Combat Simulator" and you've never played anything like it!

name: Tales from Mars
summary: Tales from Mars is a collection of 2 maps based on E1M1, a classic Knee Deep in the Dead ﻿ma﻿p and E1M2 with latter leaning more into﻿ The Shores of Hell. It's got all the monster types and a couple of traps that will hopefully stress you a bit.

name: Tales From The Under-Realm: Hazel
summary: A tale from the Nameless God full of magic and mystery

name: Tantrum
summary: Lots of different brick walls and corroded metal.

name: Tanker
summary: Tanker - logical puzzle-game in which player moves boxes in the labyrinth to place them on fixed finish positions.

name: TaxingTiles
summary: Shape your realm. Conquer chaos. Unveil mysteries. Deck-building roguelike fun!

name: Taisen Net Gimmick: Capcom & Psikyo All Stars
summary: Psikyo and Capcom's top dogs clash in an epic battle of... mahjong!?

name: Talking The Simpsons: Bart vs. Homersaurus
Tales of Vogar: Lost Descendants
summary: Go on an emotional adventure in the kingdom of Vogar, a once beautiful land filled with magic but now devastated by war. Discover the secrets behind the Ascension, reclaim your homeland and take revenge in this story-driven RPG with a turn-based battle system. Free the people of Vogar from tyranny!

name: Talking Gina
summary:
From the creators of Talking Tom comes Talking Gina, your talking pet giraffe!

Say anything to Gina and she will speak your words back to you the way only she knows how. Take good care of her and she will be the best friend you ever had! Make sure not to neglect her or treat her badly or she won’t be as cheery. Not to worry though, you can be sure to keep her happy by playing 48 levels of Patty Cake, an addictive hand clapping game that will improve your reflexes, your hand-eye coordination and your friendship with Gina! She’ll thank you for it!

name: Tap Cats: Battle Arena
summary: Cards. Battles. CATS! Collect hilarious cats, assemble their teams, and battle for glory! Use skill and strategy to earn pawesome rewards, uncover new heroes, and dominate PVP and PVE. The ultimate deck is waiting for you!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 14
summary: Taiko 14 is the first arcade to feature the alternate scoring method, Shin-uchi Mode, which awards points based on the number of notes you hit and not the notes you hit in a row. You can alternate between regular and Shin-uchi Mode, however the high scores for both modes are different, and Shin-uchi Mode scores are not recorded.

name: Tamagotchi Connection V4
summary:
The Tamagotchi Connection V4 is the fourth Tamagotchi Connection virtual pet. It was released in October 2006 for Europe and January 2007 for North America. It is inspired by the Chou Jinsei Enjoi Tamagotchi Plus, while retaining features from previous Tamagotchi Connection models.
The Tamagotchi Connection Version 4 features new connection options, which allow the Tamagotchi to go to school or work, besides the option of connecting to other Tamagotchi pets. It could also be used to access TamaTown.

name: Tap Football Star! 20-21
summary: Become a football player and lead a legendary career. Evolve in 250 teams spread across twenty different championships !

name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo Series No. 9: Kind of Blue
summary: The 9th installment of the Tantei Jinguuji Saburo series. Jinguuji is bored and tired after several months without any cases. He gladly returns to work when the Kanto mafia requests the investigation of a certain individual.

name: Tasmanian Devil
summary: Tasmanian Devil is a cancelled SNES game based on the Looney Tunes character of the same name.

name: Taygeta
summary: The sequel to Maia

name: Tap Zap - Endless game
summary:
Tap Zap is a simple tap game and also the most addictive game.    
   
Tap on the screen to change ball direction. Try not to fall off from the edges. Collect as many gems as you can.    
   
- Easy user interfaces with interactive Animations and Sounds.   
   
- Endless turns & endless fun.

name: Tabby Cat's Great Catventure
summary: In this simple 2D Platform autorruner you and your friends can play as both Tabby The Cat and TibTub the Balloon Kitten who go in an adventure after the evil Wizard of The Mice. This bad sorcerer doesn't want any cats having fun in his land and released his mice minions all over the Kat Kingdom to steal the cat's toys.

name: Tap Strike Boom!
summary:
Give your brain the next big challenge with "Tap Strike Boom!"

Your goal is to go through the "Mystical Gate of the Heavens", but it won't just let anyone in!

Heavily influenced by the 'Voltorb Flip', a minigame in the Pokemon series, Tap Strike BOOM! challenges yo to solve the puzzles that the gate will throw at you. You will have 10 levels that will get more difficult as you advance!

Clear each level by finding a number of crystals, but only Double and Triple Crystals will do! If you find a bomb, you will lose a life!

Can you find out what's behind this gate?

name: Tap Knight: Idle Adventure
summary:
Tap Knight is a mobile idle/clicker game that brings together your favorite elements from many genres. With eight unique worlds to explore, increasingly difficult boss fights, and new allies to discover and train, there is always something to keep you “tapping” while finding your own way to play and master the game.
Stuck in a level? No Problem! In true “Idle” fashion, Tap Knight collects experience while the app is closed. Each time you will open the game stronger and better prepared for the adventure ahead.
Help defend the lost kingdom from the evil monsters that have banded together to destroy humanity. Fight alongside Tap Knight, he cannot do it without your help!

name: Tactical Retreat
summary: Tactical Retreat is a Wave Based Survival Shooter with some basic tasks to perform between each wave.

name: Tale of Wuxia
summary: Tale of Wuxia is a role-playing and single-player PC game, made by Phoenix Games and Heluo Studio.

name: Tales of the World: Narikiri Dungeon 3
summary: The third in the "Narikiri Dungeon" series of Namco's "Tales of" franchise. It includes a number of crossovers with previous Tales games, including Tales of Symphonia and and Tales of Eternia.

name: Tamale Loco: Rumble in the Desert 2
Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 2
summary: In this sequel to the Tales spin-off, 50 characters from different Tales games will appear, and several new classes will be introduced.

name: Talisman: Challenging the Sands of Time
summary: Talisman: Challenging the Sands of Time is a text adventure set in the Persian Empire where players, saved from execution by King Darius, must defeat a destructive genie to earn their freedom. The game features full-sentence parsing and graphical elements, following the protagonist and their companion Abu the vizier on their quest. Players navigate the world using natural language commands while managing resources provided by the king. The physical release includes themed items like an "Arabian Express" credit card and a fictional market advertisement featuring flying carpets.

name: Tank Squad
summary: Tank Squad is a tactical-combat action game. Take part in big tank battles during World War II. Play single-player or coop (4 players). Repair your tanks, replenish supplies, manage the crew and get back to the action!

name: Taiyou no Yuusha Fighbird
summary: Taiyou no Yuusha Fighbird is an Action game, developed by Tamtex and published by Irem, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Tap Shap
summary: Tap Shap is a unique, free-to-play, addictive game & the world's first multi-platform reaction game!

name: Tank Elite
summary: Take the role of a commander by operating one of thirteen armored tanks spanning from WWII to the modern day and Use a variety of strategies to defeat your adversary in thirteen deadly missions.

name: Tank Game
summary: Tank Game is an online multiplayer arena tank battle game. Drive tanks, shoot friends, and don't die.

name: Tavern Brawl: Tactics
summary: Love turn-based strategy games but don't have much time playing? Try Tavern Brawl - Tactics! It's easy to handle and very charming!

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour 3
summary: What will you eat? We have fresh cakes and delicate ice cream, juicy burgers and hearty breakfasts, dinner parties and romantic dinners for you. No need to wash your hands before the game!

name: Taiwan 2013
summary: Taiwan 2013 is a parody game of Hong Kong 97 and Taiwan 2001 that's based around Ma Ying-jeou, the president of Taiwan at the time. The game was released for browsers and mobile.

name: Tasogare Sakaba: Uwabami Breakers
summary: Tasogare Sakaba: Uwabami Breakers is a free-to-download danmaku game released at Comiket 76. The game is most notable for its development involving sole known Team Shanghai Alice member, ZUN, of Touhou Project fame.

name: Taisen Hot Gimmick 3: Digital Surfing
summary: A very meta game, it is an arcade game that mimics playing a game of mahjong on a PC. It also received a PC port, only increasing the mind screw of its concept.

name: Target Plus
summary:
Target Plus requires the Gun Stick accessory, a light gun. The game consists of two parts that can be played independently, all related to shooting ranges.

In the first part, you will have to shoot flying plates, and in the second part of the game your goal will be to protect a cooked chicken from being relentlessly attacked by spiders or wasps.

name: Tantrum 2
summary: Sweet level with bricks and corroded metal as its main texture theme. Some wood and marble too.

name: Tailor Tales: Dimitri Plus
summary: Tailor Tales: Dimitri Plus adds a longer epilogue for Dimitri. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Take As Needed
summary: Assume a lead drug development role at Mazer- the foremost pharmaceutical company in the world! Create groundbreaking drugs for your customers, work hard to impress your bosses, and try not to ruffle too many feathers...

name: Taken Away
summary: Taken Away is a non-linear strategic horror game. Following a car "accident", you have been abducted. Explore your surroundings, don't get caught, and figure out a way to escape if you don't want to perish in a gruesome death.

name: Tank Wars
summary: Protect the Radar Base and yourself from being hit by various enemy tanks, and further trace to defeat every enemy you confront. In this game, you fight by five of your own tanks against 20 enemy tanks in each scene.

name: Tales of Winds: Tomb of the Sol Empire
summary: 冒険者業を生業とする家族が向かったのは古代の遺跡。一行はそこで歴史に埋もれた大国の謎に触れる。拠点となる街の人達と関わりながら遺跡を探索し、さまよう幽霊や魔物を相手に最奥を目指そう！豪華声優陣によるパートボイスも注目の探索RPG。

name: Tag with Ryan
summary:
Do you have what it takes to outrun Combo Panda? Tag with Ryan is the coolest endless runner game for ALL AGES!

Combo Panda, the ultimate gamer, has challenged his friend Ryan to an endless game of tag! Combo Panda has hidden Ryan's different costumes all over the game, and Gus the VTuber is helping guard them. It's up to you and Ryan to unlock them all!

name: Tank Battle Royale
summary: Video game about tank battles. Fight against opponents in multiplayer or in career mode. Earn points and upgrade your tank. Unlock new levels to complete together in cooperative mode.

name: Tales of Esferia: Araxis
summary: A story-driven puzzle adventure with a shared spotlight between two intergalactic freelancers who get dragged into a series of peculiar events happening on a strange alien planet.

name: Tactical Vanguard Saga
summary: This story-driven, single-player, 2D turn-based strategy RPG in a sci-fi setting tells the story of a child from Earth, Audra, who is inspired by a trendy video game to break special agent Beaufort out of captivity on Mars, against the wishes of their shared enemy; the Space Frontier Colonies.

name: Talparun
summary: 3 levels for Hexen in under limit removing ports for Hexen

name: Table Tennis Infinity
summary: In this exciting portable version, move your paddle with the touch screen to hit the balls. The speed increases as your score goes up - endless fun for everyone!

name: Tappy Word 3
summary: The easy way to boost your English vocabulary skills!

name: Talking Tom Cat 2
summary:
The legend is back! Talking Tom Cat 2 – the epic sequel to Talking Tom Cat – is better, cooler, and funnier than ever before!

With over a billion downloads and counting, Talking Tom Cat 2 is popular with families all over the world. Don’t miss all the fun this cool, family-oriented game has to offer. Get your own cute and funny virtual pet now!

Talk to Talking Tom, play with him, poke him, and dress him in cool outfits. Customize his home. And make funny videos and share them with your friends! Adopt him as your very own virtual pet and get instant fun in return!

name: Tales from Candlekeep: Qawasha the Human Druid
summary: Put an end to the Death Curse with Qawasha the Human Druid. This DLC includes: Qawasha, his custom d20 and wallpaper. This DLC also unlocks the possibility to play with 5 Heroes at the same time.

name: Taikyoku Igo: Heisei Kiin
summary: Taikyoku Igo: Heisei Kiin is a board game, developed and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Tabula Rasa
summary: A creepy blend of a visual-novel and a platformer.

name: Take on Helicopters: Hinds
summary: Take On Helicopters: Hinds puts players in the seat of the most iconic and revolutionary military gunship ever: the Hind.

name: Talon City: Death from Above
summary: You’re a clever owl lawyer out of your depth, searching for a missing client. With enemies at every turn, can you survive and save the day?

name: Tap City Tycoon
summary:
Make money and build the city as much as possible. Prove you’re the rich man!
You have a great chance to control the cities and countries. You just need to start by tapping the screen as much as you can. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you.
Hire valuable Managers to unlock special business bonuses, and use Ondelz resources for even more cash bonuses!

name: Take
summary:
You are battle-weary. Your armor is scanty and your countenance is loathsome; you tire of the swords flicking at your neck. But you have a duty. There is nothing you can't take.

A game written by Katherine Morayati (as Amelia Pinnolla) for the 2016 Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Taisen Hot Gimmick
summary: The inaugural edition of Psikyo's well-received mahjong eroge.

name: Tank Masters
summary:
Take on the role of a tank engineer, designing and developing new, armored vehicles for the army. Take a dive into the history of armored vehicle development of the middle of the 20th century!
Start with four basic elements, and use them to create new components, whilst learning about legendary designers and historic events.

name: Tastrion
summary: Pilot the all-powerful cell destroying Desolazor gunship and eradicate the mutagenic genotoxic pathogen before it consumes the entire galaxy. Soar through waves of threatening enemies and bosses beyond 6 stages packed with action, explosions, and lasers!

name: Take the Dream IX
summary: What would you do for the person you love? Are you sure you're actually in love with them? They say love is all about sacrifice. What are you willing to lose for the one you supposedly love?

name: Tanggal
summary: An atmospheric horror game and story-driven experience, inspired by Filipino mythology.

name: Tap the Frog: Doodle
summary: Tap the Frog Doodle features hours of gameplay, diverse mini-games filled with light-hearted humor and achievements to keep you coming back for more. Easy to pick-up yet challenging to master, Tap the Frog Doodle will have your fingers begging for more alone time with the cutest frog on your device.

name: Take a Little
summary: Smash-Bros like action multiplayer game where you consume your fellow food in a hectic city scape. Become the last winning food on top and claim your crown. Movement is similar to Joust and will how you gliding around with a jetpack while dodging opponent advances.

name: Tap Tap Dash
summary: Tap Tap Dash is a very simple but highly addictive game! Tap to jump and switch direction and just don't fall off the path... That's not too difficult, is it?

name: Tail Drift
summary: Tail Drift is a fast action racing game where you zoom through fantastic environments. Compete while flying around floating islands, ancient temples and desert canyons, with a fleet of unique planes to take through a variety of game modes.

name: Tap Cat RPG: Simple Emoji Cat Idle Game
Talisman: Legendary Deck
summary: Make your adventures even more legendary than before, with new, extra challenging cards for Talisman: Digital Edition.

name: TankLab
summary: Operate the tank to fire bullets! Defeat your opponents and claim victory! Choose your favorite skill and conquer the field! A pop and simple shooting game.

name: Tank Kingdoms
summary: Medieval world RPG, large scale tank warfare.

name: Tales of Hongyuan
summary: As a Chinese RPG game, our story happened in a land called Ground Hong where you can experience wars between two kingdoms, make your friends and uncover a dust-laden history.

name: Target of Desire: Episode 1
summary:
Target of Desire is about 2 characters: Maia and Maria.

The video game follows the story of Maia.

The story of Maria can also be found in her blog. Maria has a blog under the username of "I am named Maria", and she is on social media under the same username. Her blog helps to explain what is happening in the game.

name: Tales of Anturia: Hejstos
summary: Survive in the harsh world of Hejstos. Build a camp, defend it against orcs and other threats. And if you feel strong enough, discover the secret, hidden in the mountains and save your homeland from civil war.

name: Tayutama 2-you're the only one- ENG ver.
summary: In a mountain town far away from Ashihara-cho, a brand new story about the coexistence between "Humans" and "Tayutais" is about to start.

name: Tanggle's Magic Square
summary: A puzzle game released for the GamePark 32 in 2001.

name: Tails Quest 2: A Tale of Love
summary: The last of the handful of fangames made by Magnus Andersson aka mightydillo using Kilktopia.

name: Tales of a Viking: Episode One
summary: Tales of a Viking: Episode One is a small-scale turn-based strategy game with rpg elements.

name: Tapering Tower
summary: Tapering Tower is a casual arcade game for accuracy. Build the tallest tapering tower.

name: Taijitu: A Game About Balance
summary: Inspired by the Chinese mythology of the Yin and Yang. Taijitu is a puzzle game about balance and harmony. The goal is to interchange shapes colour and make the colour balance on each side. The white line separate each different world by top and bottom or left and right. This puzzle game combine the art of geometry with beautiful transitions and ambient music. Plug in your earphones and enjoy the experience.

name: Tamatown
summary: Tamatown was an interactive website for the Tamagotchi Connection Version 3, and later for the Version 4 and Version 4.5. It was an extension to the virtual pets, and allowed players to connect to the site and earn prizes for their Tamagotchi device.

name: Tales of: Sena
summary: What does a lonely soul do, beyond the life that we know? Does it move on? Does it stay? Or does it enter the afterlife?

name: Tappy Cat: Rhythm Collector
summary:
A rhythm game that consists of tapping notes to the song. The cat plays a stringed instrument made of two strings attached to a tree stump that has been split in half. There are many songs and cats to unlock.
This game is a free to play available on iPhone and iPod.

name: Tac Tiles
summary:
A colorful and challenging puzzle game for smartphones and tablets. 
The target is to change a board of multiple colored tiles to a single color with a limited number of moves. A progression of increasingly hard levels await players, and the only tool available is a set of colors for modifying the board. Players must use them intelligently, and create chain reactions to connect as many tiles as possible before running out of moves.

name: Tales Of Polygonia
summary: Tales Of Polygonia - a 2.5D souls-like RPG with crafting and survival elements.

name: Taiji
summary: Explore a mysterious and detailed world full of puzzles. It is important to think hard and to pay close attention, as vital clues are sometimes hidden in plain sight.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 11
summary: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 10, this new title tried to enhance the quality of life for the users by adding the Ura Oni difficulty for the expert players and the Papa Mama Support mode for the young players, it also added the ability to change the sound of the Taiko which already was a thing in the console games, and they removed the Revival Roulette to replace it with the Revival Drumroll minigame.

name: Tap Souls
summary: In a demolished world a hero was born from the debris to fight the dark lords. He wakes up without remembering his story but he must defeat enemies and defeat the dark lords...

name: Taisho x Alice Epilogue
summary: This is the final installment of Taisho x Alice, a fairytale visual novel in which you must save your Prince Charming! Take on the role of the heroine in order to rehabilitate your chosen love interest and guide him to his "happily ever after" once and for all!

name: Tank Battle
summary: Tank Battle is a tactical competitive game in which you need to collect resources, strengthen weapons and equipment, and eliminate opponents to survive in the end to win. Good luck, eat chicken tonight!

name: Tales of Shinobi
summary: Tales of Shinobi is a single-player adventure game where you get to play as a powerful Shinobi who must save the world from evil!

name: TattooVR
summary: TattooVR is an immersive art experience that brings the ancient art of tattooing into the cutting edge of VR. TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.

name: Taarradhin
summary: Taarradhin is a visual novel about a country suffering from famine and the only way to appease their gods is by sacrificing 2 beautiful slaves. It was created by Cyanide Tea.

name: Tamagorudo
summary: Tamagorudo is a simple, answer game to "Egg & Hen Paradox".

name: Tabula Rasa
summary:
Richard Garriott's Tabula Rasa was an MMORPG developed by Destination Games and published by NCsoft, designed in part by some of the creators of Ultima Online including Richard Garriott. The game was a role-playing video game that blended certain shooter aspects into the combat system. It was officially released to retail on November 2, 2007, with customers that pre-ordered the game allowed access to the live servers from October 30, 2007. The development team released updates, called "Deployments," nearly every month following launch. The game required a monthly subscription.

Tabula Rasa was about humanity's last stand against a group of aliens called the Bane.
